zla pa ye shesakyi 'od kun tu snang ba zhes bya babasnyen bkur to// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi 'od kun tu gsalabachos kyi grong khyer rab tusnang ba zhes bya babasnyen bkur to// de ltar
rigasakyi bu sangs rgyas brgya bo 'di dag la sogs pa bskal pa mdog dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la/ de bzhin gshegs par reb kyi rdul nitu phra bsnyed cig byung ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin

tshagshegs par rab kyi rdul shan tu phra bsnyad po de dag thams cad kyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi byings kyi grong khyer ye shes kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byungabar gyur te/ de ltar

rigs kyi bu 'amos de bzhin gshegs pa rareb kyi rdulashin tu phra bsnyad po de dag las chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi debyangs 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs ba thamachos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer ye [>
shes kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba'i par de dag thams cad khomos mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la kho mos rim gror byas so// thams cad kyis chos bstan pa'i ng thos so//
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi bstanapa la'ang khomo rab tu byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi bstan pa'i ng kho mos yongasasu bzung ngo// byang chub soms dpa'i rnam pa
thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang/ rnams 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las 'thob pa'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag

thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung de'ang kho mosasems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su smin par byas so// detshun chad du bskal pas nags rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phrab snyed la/ de bzhin
gshegs paji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad nakho mosachos kyi nan tan gyis mchodapa byas to/ rigs kyi bu dephyin chad du khomosasems can 'khor ba'amun pan 'khod cing ma'eshes pa'i
gnyid kyis log pa thams cad kyi mal tsar byas so// de dag gsems kyi grong khyon yang los su bsrungasaso// de ngag khams gsum gyi grong khyer nas gyen du bskyod cing
thams cad mkhyen pa nyidakyi grong rdal du'ang rab tu bkod do// rigs kyi bu khomos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa zabamo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten
gyi tshig bkyal ba rnamapar bzlog pa gzhis su smra ba med pa la rab tu 'god pa bden pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' dag gi lam gyi rang bzhin
thams cad thogs pa med par shes pa sems kyi skad cig re re la chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar dbang sgyur ba// sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang tshig rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ skad
rgya mtsho h+phams cad mngon par 'du bya ba lamakhasab chos thams cad kyi grangs dang ming rgya mtsho'i tshul dang cho ga la mkhas pa// chos thams cad kyi yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs rgya mtsho
zla la dbang sgyur ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyisprina mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa// sems can thams cad yongs su smin bar bya ba dang gdul bar spyod pa'i
mthar phyin par byed pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod ba 'am/ sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nan tan shes par bya ba 'am/ bya chub sems dpa'i las blanamed par brtsams
pa'i sbyor ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shesashin tu phra ba khong du chud pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gtam dngamadzoda rnam par 'byed pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu 'am/ byang chub sems
pa'i chos kyi gtam lasang ge'i khri yongasasu gnan par bya ba shes par nus re skan/ deci'i phyir zhen/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni chos thams cad kyi sa'i dekyil 'khor gyi gzungs su gnon pasha
stag ko song rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi dung 'di nyid du/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shang thams cad kyi ma tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba
'dug ste/ kho mo dang rgyang ma ring ba zhigan 'dug gis/ de'i gan dusod la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa dang/ ji ltar nan tan du byed cing/
chags can Thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'god par byed pa dras shig/ donas mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis/ de'i tshe byachub
sems ba'i rnam par thar pasgra yid du 'ong ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa nyid bstan te bstan pa'i phyir// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa// rnam
thar gang gis dus gsum rgyal bam lus dang// chos dbyings kun tu 'bum klas mtha' dang dbus med pa// shes byed mtshan nyid kun gyi gzhir thug rtogs pa yi/ rgyal sras rnams
kyi rnam thar zab cing blta bar dka'// tshogs las byung ba'i rnam thar tshul na mtha' yas te// chos de thob pas tshad med bsam du med pa yin/ yongs su 'phel zhing/
kun tu chags med shugs drag par// dus gsum byams pa'i tshul gyis lam la 'jug par gyis// 'di ltar sangs rgyas zhing rgyud rdul phran rab snyad kyi// bskal pa 'das pa'i snga rolaM
sngon gyi nango byung ba// 'jig rten khams na chos 'od sprin gyi grong khyer dpal/ bskal pa byung ba du midamadog tu 'od chen no// bskal pa de gcig rgyal ba'i gdung na rgyud ma chad// sangs
rgyus ri rab rdul phran rab snyad byung bar gyur// bde gshegs chos kyi rgya mtsho 'od dbyangs rgyal bon// thog mar byung sa de dag bskal pa dad bo pa// rgyal ba chos spron grong khyer 'od snang rgyal
bo na dbade gshegs de dag kun gyi tha ma 'jig rten byung// de dag kun gyi spyan sngar phyin te kho mos mchod// de dag kun las chos kyang dga' ba chen pos thos/ kho mos thog mar mthong
ba gser mdog 'od mnga' ba// rgya mtsho'i chol 'od sgrog pa'i gsung gi rgyal po ste// mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis yongs brgyanar bo 'dra// mthong nas bdagan bde gshegs 'gyur
snyam blo gros gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho mos mthong mod la// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'byam klas 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen gyis// mkha'i dbyings rnam yangs de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin
can// rgyal ba'i sems kyi dang po stobs ldan rab tu skyes// snying rje bdud rtsi mtsho che las byung ba des// dus gsum gshegs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun// rgyal sras rgya mtshos bskor
ba ma lus thams cad dang// sems can rgya mtshor bcas pa'i rgya mtsho'i zhing yang rgyas// lus kyis zhing rnams thams cad ma lus khyababya dang// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa bzhin du lus bstan
phyir/ zhing rnams ma lus bskyed cade snang bar bya ba dang// 'gro ba smin bya'i don dub dag gis sems kyang bskyed// rgyal ba gnyis pa'i sngan sngar kho mo phyinenas kyang// zhing rnams rgya mtsho
bzhugs rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong// rgyal ba tha ma mthong nas zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rdul phran rab stod bzhugs pa mthong// de yinu rol bskal pa zhing rgyud rdul snyed du/
rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sgronam jisnyad skyes gyur pa// de dag thams cad spyan sngar kho mo phyin gyur to// rnam thar rgya mtsho'i tshul 'di sbyong mchod pa byas// de nas tshod dpon gyi bu nor
bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa thob pa/ de de 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/

gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho rgya chen po las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems pa'i mngon par shes pa'i snangabachen bo rab tu thob pa tha da pa yang dag par shes pachen po rgya mtsho lazhugs pa/
@#// dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal 'dzul
dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod kyis shes rab chos yangs rgya mtsho kun la spyod// srid pa'i rgya mtshomatha' dbusamed par khyod kyis spyad// yon
lus mchog skyid po tshe ring skrun 'brel ba// lha mo khyod ni 'khor 'dir byon cing rnam par mdzes// chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur thugs chud de// dus gsum kun kyi tshul yod
chags med thugs chud mdzad// thugs kyi skad cig gcig latshad mad bsam yas pa'i// dmigs nga thams cad rtog pa mi mnga' 'jal ba mdzad/ ye shes spyan mnga' chos nyid
sems can med gzigs kyang// sems can rgya mtshomatha' yas thugs rjes gzigs pa mdzad// thugs kyi rnam panashin tu yangs la 'jug mdzad cing// sems can tshad med 'dul zhing
yongs su smin par mdzad// khyod ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dpyid tshulamkhyen te// chos kyi rang bzhin shesabya'i tshul la rnams ngs rgyas// 'phags pa dri ma med pa thams cad yongs
bsgoms te// 'gro ba ma lus rnam par sbyong zhing yongs su 'byung// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yashis dri med rtogs mdzad pas// khyod ni sems can rgya mtsho'a mchog las mngon par
skyes// khyod ni chos dbyings khong dudasems can kun khyab par// chos rab bstanacing 'jig rten 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad// khyod ni rnam par snanga mdzad smon lam lam tshul kyis// yang dag
bzhud cing chags med blo yangs dri+id ldan// thams cad bgrod pa'i rgyal ba'astobasan thugs chud cing// zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa gzigs/ khyod kyi thugs mkha'
'dra thub par dka' ba ste// nyon mongs kun gyi drimasam gos sn gnas dag/ der ni dus gsum byung ba'i zhing rnams thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa sems can kun bacas
'dus// skad cig gcig gis nyin mtshan phud du zla ba dang// skad cig yud tsam lo dang 'du 'dzog bskal pa dang// bskal pa rgya mtsho ming grangs rgya mtshor bcas pa dang// 'gro ba rnams
kyi 'du shes rgya mtsho'ang thugs su chud/ phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can skye 'chi ji snyed dang// gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med 'dushes yod med kyi// rnam spyod bden pa'i tshul ni
shugasasu chud mdzad cing// de dag lam bstan byang chub mchoka tu 'akod pa mdzad// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam dra ba'i rigs las byung// bde gshegs kun gyi sku gcig tshul las yang
dag 'khrungs// khyod ni tshos sku yongs dag thugs la chags mi mnga'// 'jig rten kun tu sku gzugs yid bzhin ston pa mdzad/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// mtshan
[·/ ]@#// mo'i lhamogrong khyer thams cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal latshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams

tsad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzibarjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la snga bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thamasacad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
phyogasasubaskor ba byas te yang dang yang bltas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer tham sa cad bsrung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nasasong ngo/// shing
zla shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sas rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdod pos brgyan pa'i le'usta/ bam po brgya gsum pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dad/ rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la 'jug pa dang/ de bas kyang rgya cher bsgom pa dang/ yid ches par bya ba dang/ shin tu rgyas pa 'byed
zlacing/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shud thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mtshan mo'i lha moshade thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas paspos nipo che

thams cad kyi shing gi yal ga'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhigan/ seng ge 'i khri rin po che'ashinge gi myu ku'asnying po can zhig la 'dug ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa
mthong ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi ba nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shing thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pa'i rkang ba gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas
thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces saso// lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang/ ji ltar
spyod pa dod/ ji ltar sbyod/ ji ltar slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang// mtshan mo'i lha mo shade thams
cad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzas la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho mo'i mthusanamo madrod kyi 'jig rten kyi khams na nyi ma nub tucha ba'i

tshe pad+mo shan tu rgyas pa'i rnams kyang rnam par 'dzum par 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang bud med bza' shing gi rab n gnas shing dga' bar rtse ba la brtson pa dag kyang khyim du 'dong ba'i blo spyod do//
lam dang srang na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams kyang zhag gi gnas sems shing tshol te/ 'gro ba'i gnas thams cad du mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ nags tshal dang/ gsab dang/ phug
la rten pa'i sems can rnams kyang nags tshal dang/ gseb dang/ phug du 'dong ngo// shing la gnas pa'i soms can rnams kyang shing gi gnas la rten par mngon par gzhol lo// khud
na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang lung du 'dong ngo// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs dad/ yul la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang grong dang/ grong khyer dad/
ljongs dang/ yul du 'dong ngo// chu na gnas pa'i soms can rnams kyang tshur 'dong ngo// phyogs gzhan kyi yul du phyin pa'i sems can rnams kyang/ nubamo bde zhing da ra par gnas pa'i don
du rang rang gi yul gyi phyogs kyi bsam pa skyed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khomon skyes pa dang bud med gzhon nu dar la bab pa/ dar ba'i kem drod kyis myos pa dang/ klu dang/
gar dang/ rol mos dga' bas myos pa dad 'dod pa'i yon tan la dga' zhing brtsonapa rnams la skye ba dang/ rga shi ded/ gtumug gamun pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i gnyen po dag ba'i
rtsa ba yongasasu bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus legs par bsngags pa byed do// sems can ser sna dang ldan pa rnams ni sbyin pa la rab tu sbyor ro sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams/
ni tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ngan sems dang ldan pa'isoms can rnams la ni byams pa'i legs pa rjod pa byed do/ sems 'khrugs pa'i sems can rnams ni bzod pa la rab tu
'god do// le lo can gyi sems can rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus brtsam pa la rab tu 'god do/ sems rnam par myos pa'i soms can rnams ni bsam gtan la rab tu 'god do//
shes rab 'chal pa can gyisoms can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs susbyor ro// theg pa dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god do// khams
gsum la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams ni byeng chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa srid pa lamakyi rgyud mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor la spyad pa la rab tu 'god do dmigs pa'i
dbang du gyur pa'i sems can las dang nyon mongs pas rab tu mnar ba/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tuphun pha la rab tu 'god
do mashes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i soms can bdag tu bya ba dang/ bdag gir bya bsam rig pa'i mun nag tu'athoms pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i ya shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
rab tu 'god do// rigs gyi bu gzhan yang khomo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba thob pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras
pa lhamo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od 'phro ba yang dag par 'byung ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ sbasapa/ rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa de ni/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi sems can yongasasu smin pa'i yoshes dang thabs snang ba dang ldan pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi bde ba nyams sumyong ba ji skad
[p]// cig yod pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyimathus byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag gi tshul gyis byung ba'o// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gsung la nan tan du byas pasabyung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslabs pas byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'ibyin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs
pas bstan pa 'i lam la nan tan du byas pas byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang tshul 'dra ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i mthun pa'i rgyus
ts+tshA byung ba'o// de bzhin gshags pa'i yisakyi nyi ma snang bas byung ba'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bas ni/ sems can rnams
kyi bde ba yongs su 'byung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dka' pa'i 'od spro ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di la 'jug pa'i tshe//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyisdon gyi byang nubasems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rjesasu dran par byed cing 'jug pa'i
khong du chud par byed pa'i rtswa/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs bas/ sems can bdag tu bya ba dang bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa/ ma rig pa'i
ba chun pas 'thoms pa/ ltab thibs po'i bas dgon par 'khyams pa/ srid pa'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'dod chags kyi bcings pasaklags pa/ zhe sdang gis khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
gti mug gis sems kyi rgyud 'khrugs par gyur pa/ phrag dog dang ser sna kun nas 'khor ba/ nyon mongs pas rab tu dkrugs pa'i soms dang ldan pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su
myong bar gyur pa/ 'khor ban 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rab gzir ba/ sangs rgyas blta ba las phyir phyogs par gyur pa thams cad gzigs nas thugs rje chen po'i sbrags rgyas par
gyur to// sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gro ba thams cad la yo byad dang rin po ches yongasasu bsdu zhing yongs su bstud pa'i shugs dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i yo byad
yongs su bsgrub pa'i thugasadod/ dngos po thams cad la chags pa ma mnga' ba'i thugs dad/ yul thams cad la ye brdam pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs dad/ dga' ba thams cad la chags
pa mi mnga' ba'i shugs dang/ longs spyod thams cad la yongasasum zhen pa'i shugs dang/ sbyin pa thams cad la rnam par smin pa lar bamed pa'i thugs dang/ 'jig rten gyi phunasumatshogs
pa thams cad la bzhad pami mnga' ba'i shugs dang/ rkyen lam rmongs pa'i thugs dad/ legs par btsal ba'i chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i thugs dang//
ga// sems can thams cad kyi don la gzhol bar bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i thugs kyang skyes par gyur to// de de ltar chos thamasacad kyi rang bzhin la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
thugs dad ldan pa// sems can gyi khams thams cad du byams pa chen pos snyoms par zhugs pa// 'gro ba thams cad thugasarje chen po'i sprin gyis rgyas par ngagang ba'i sbyor bamanga' ba/
sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad kun nas khebs pa'i chos kyi gdugs chen po'i dkyil 'khor mnga' ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i yashes rdo rje'i
mtshon cha mda' ba/'gro bathams cad kyi bde ba yongs su bsgrub pas dgyes pa'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ sems can thams cad la bde ba phul du phyin pa la mngon par bsgrung
pa'i smon lam gyi thugasamanga' ba/ bsam pa dang smon pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad lanor gyi chen rab tu dbab pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ somasacan thams cad yongasasum gtong zhing
snyoms par sbyor ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ 'phags pa'i non gyisasems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che phul du dri ma med pa thob par mdzad
pa'i klogs mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs dang shugs rab tu brnyes pa de/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyisngon chen pos//
tsa sems can gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can thamasacad la mngon par gyur par bzhugs shing sbyin
pa'i dmigs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char chen po rnam pa thams cad du dbab pa dang/ rinapo che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pa mdzad de/ 'di ltar sems
can thams cad so so'i tshul dang ji ltar mthun pas longasaspyod par bya ba'i phyir/ dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa yongasasu btad bdad/ yo byad rnam pa tha dad pa tshadamed pa laspyad
bar bya ba dang/ sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul dang/ dngos po yongs su gtang ba rnam pa du ma la yongs su spyad pa dad/ yo byad kyi rnam pa dang/

rgyan gyi 'du byed brjod du yod pa dang/ sbyin pa'i tshogs rnam pa snatshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya ba'i sbyin pa'itshulamatha' yas pa blugasau chud
pas sems can gyi bsam paji lta ba bzhin du yosasu tshim par bya ba mngon pa bsgrubs pa'i dngos po thamasacad gtang ba dang/ yongs su gtong ba dang/ sbyin par bya ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi

'du byed kyi sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa las yongs su bskyab pa'itshul du bya ba rnams Msems can thams cad la lan re ba mamanga' ba dang 'gro ba thamasacad lamanyam pa nyid du 'byungaba'i thugs mnga'
ma rgyug/ bas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rin po che yongs su sbyong ba med cid/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba rgya mtshog cig tugyur pa las byung ba'i yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul 'go
bathamasacad kyi bsamapa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad kyi chor dbab pa/ 'grob thams cad lathams cad mkhyen pa'i phesod nams rgya mtsho'ashugasa rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pas/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la
sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba kacig nasagachig du brgyud pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa dang/ thugs kyi skad cig re re zhing

rgyu ga ca gnas agacig tu brgyud pa ma lus pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs med cing blanamed pa'i rkyen rnam par dag pas rnam par klub cing rab tu brgyan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
dang thugs kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtshom lus pa thams cad rgyas par dkad bar rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ thugs kyi skad cig de re la nam mkha'i dbyings kyigatogs ma lus
ba thams cad rgyas par dgad pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang thugasakyi skad cig re re lasems can dang dus malus pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i yeshes kyi tshul rnam par

dag par bya ba dang/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad rnam par 'dul ba'i yishesakyi tshul snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la dusam lus pa thams cad/
du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang/ thugs kyi skad cig re'i la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs lamakhas pas lus par yongs su bstan pas/ 'gro ba thams/
cad la phan thogs par bya ba dad/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i grongs su bya ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par 'thon pa/
'jigyi rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba/ 'jig rten khams 'byam klas pa sna tshogs brjod du yod pa// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pa sna tshogs kyis mtshams

rnam par 'dul ba/ gzhi sna tshogs dang lhun du mar brjod du yod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa bstan du yod pa// kun nas nyon mongasashing rnam par dag pa dang/ rnam par dag
cid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ gcig tu yongs su dag pa dang/ gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ che ba dang/ yangs pa dang/ tshad med pa dang 2 dog pa dad/ pha ba dang/ rgya che ba dang/
gzhi mnyam pa dang/ snul zhi dang/ spyi'i tshugs dang/ phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams su mngon par ltas pa dang/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su yongs su gzhol bsgo sna tshog sanasabastan

cing/ sgomatha' yas pa'i debyibs rnam pa snatshog sasu 'dug pa'i rnam par phye bsna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/ byang chub
@#// sems dpa'i skyon med pa yongasasu mnan nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus gsum rgya/
[+ ]sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin lasam lus pa thams cad sems can pha rol gyi sems dang bsam pas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i
shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad de/ mngon par sgrub pa mdzad par gyur pas mngon par shesaso// rjesasu dran no// rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
mdzad ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gnas pabasod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba sems can byas pa drin du mi gzo bas yongs su gang ba/ mishes
pa'i mun pas chod pa/ bdag tu bya ba dang bdag ka'i bya ba la mngon par zhen pa// ma rige pa'i mun pa rab rib kyis bsgribs pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa la rnam par rtog pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba
thibs po bas dgon par mgo rnag pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo rmongs pa/ nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i mya ngan chen po'i sdug bsngal kyisa'i 'og tu lhung ba/ 'khongs

pa 'asdug bsngal sna tshog sanyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ pha rol tu phyin pa sbyad pa'i sprin chen po mngon par bsgrubs te dge ba'i rtsa ba lau0f8brtan par gnas pa/ yongs su
[d/ ]bsngags pa dad/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor 'a'i 'phos pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog pa dang/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la mngon par mos par bya ba dang/ rgyu'i dkyil ]/
'khor gyi phyogasa mngon par bstan pa dang/ las dang chos su mi 'gal ba'i phyogs rab tu brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsdu ba'i phyogs snang bar bya ba dang/
sems can thams cad kyi mos pa'i phyogs rab brjod par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi zhid yongs su bskyab pa'i phyogs legs par bstan pa dad// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad
kyi rigs mi gcad pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa'i phyogs yongs su gzung ba dang rnam dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par bzlog pa dang/
thams cad mkhyen pa tId kyi tshogs kyi phyogs yongasasu brjod pa mdzad de/ pha rol tu phyin pa'isprin chen pos sems can gyi khamasathamasacad rgyas par bkang sta/ mngon par bsgrubs nas bsam pa ji
lta ba bzhin du sems can tshim par 'gyur bar chos kyisashin tu bsdu ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa mdzad do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la yang dgo par bskul to// byang
chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po la rab tu btsud do// 'phags pa'i nor thams cad rab tu thob par bya bas nye bar bstan to// thams cad mkhyen pang du 'dun pa'i shugs kyis sems
can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phags par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgor yang de dag rab tu btsud de phung po shin tu zhiba'i bde
bas yongs su bsdu ba yongs su bsdus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyidache ba nyid la mngon du mos par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa yongs su bzung ba'i yoshes la rab tu
bkod do// nor bzos kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu yang dag par zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
rgyu gnas 'di ni yod ches par dka' ste/ shes par dka' ba'o// mosapar dka' ba'o// 'jug par dka' ba'o// brjod par dka' ba'o// khong du chudapar dka' ste/ lha dad bas
pa'i 'jig rten dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang khong du chud par mi nus so// gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang dge ba'ibs gten gyis yod+ma
rgyu su bzung ba ma gtogs te/ gnas 'di ni soms can 'khor ba'i bde bathams cad la mngon par 'dod pamed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ibade ba la lhag par dmigs pa/ngems can thams cad kyi sdug
bsngal dang yid la bde ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la mdon par mos pa// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa/ nam mkha'i

[ ]spyod yul dang ldan pa/mos pa yangs pa'i lam gyis rnam par dgapa/ 'khor ba'irgyun las phyir phyogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon par mos pa/ chos kyi grong khyer du
'gro bar gcig tu chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su gnon pas brtson 'grus can/ sangs rgyas kyisa'i rgyud rnam par gnon pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la
mngon par mosaM pa/ stobs banu rab tu thob par bya ba'i mthar thugapa rnams kyis bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs yangs pas ke bar bstan pa'i sems dang/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang/
ma zhum pa nyon mongs pa med pa dang (ma yo ba dang/ ma nyams pa dang/ ma 'chums pa dang mun pa med pa'i sems dang/ ye shes kyi snang ba kun tu snang bas snang bar gyur pa'i sam sa dang/

sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba shin tu 'dun pa'i sems dang/ bdud kyi 'khor dad rtonamongs pa thams cad mkhyen pa da kyi yeshes thob par bya bar skabs phye ba'i sems kyis kyang khong du
chud pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ yid ches par bya ba dang/ gzung ba dang/ rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am// shes par bya bar nusaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
ye shes kyi yul te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongasasu ma non na/ sems can gzhan thamasacad kyis lta ci zhigs/ 'on kyang sems can cad shes rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs/
pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba dang/ khyod kyis bsam pa thag pa nas yos su
sa pa'i lung bstan pa 'chos 'di nyid rab tu 'byung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyis bstan to/ de nas mtshan mo'i lhamoshing thams cad kyim togargyas
bas bde bar gnas pas de'i tshe don de nyid bsnan te bstan pa'i phyir/ dus gsum du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par bltas te tshags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sas
rgyas sras po khyod kyis gang dris pa// danabasam yas zab mo sangs rgyas yul/ bsam yas zhing gi rdul phran rab snyad kyi// bskal pa mang pos de kun brjod m nus// sems can 'dod pa'i
sams ldan sdad ba dang// de bzhin gti mug mun pas bsgribs pa dang// 'chab dang dregs pas bsam pa nyams gyur pas// rgyal ba'i chos nyid zhi ba shes mi nus// phrag dog 'jug pa'i
dbang gis rjes 'brang dang// g.yo sgyus bsam pa rtogs par gyur pa dang// nyon mongs las kyis sgrib pas bsgribs pa yis// sangs rgyas yul 'dapes par minus so// phung po khams dad
skye mcheda gnas pa dang// 'jigatshogs mang la gnas par gyur pa dang// ltasems 'du shes phyin ci log gyur pas// zhiba'i sa 'di shes par mi nus so// rgyal ba'i yulami shes dka' zhi ba ste//
bang bzhin dri med rnam par rtog ba med// srid par brten cing 'khor la chags pa yis// sa 'di yang dag shes par ma nusaso// sangs rgyas rigs su gis ldan gang skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa/
kun gyis byin brlabs shing// chos kyi rgyal po'i gdung rabs yongs 'dzin pa// drang srod de dag yulani 'di yin no// dkar chos rgya mtshos mi ngoms sems ldan zhing// gang rnams dge ba'i bshes
kyis yongs bzung ste// thub pa'i stobs la dmigs pa'i sems n can/ de dag 'di thos bzod pa thob par gyur// gang rnams bsam pa dri med rnam rtogamed bar snangamakha' bzhin phyogs dang
phyogs mtshams su/ mun pa rnam bsal zlo gros sgron ma'i sprin// dri med de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// snying rje'i bsam pas 'gro ba rgya mtsho rnams// dus gsum byung ba gang rnams rgyas byed
cing/ sems can m lus rjes 'brang byams pa can// de dag rgyal ba'i tshul 'di 'jug par 'gyur// gang rnams 'dzin med dga' ba'isims ldan zhing// rtag par bdog pa thams cad sbyin
brtson la// sems can kun la mnyam par zhugs gyur pa// chags med do dag spyod yulas 'di yin// nyon mongs med sems skyo med spyod ldan zhing// gang rnams 'gyod pa rnam bsal sems
ldan te// sangs rgyas gdams ngag nan tan byed ldan pa// drimed de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// gang rnams mi bsgul sams ldan m spyod sems// chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'isims ldan zhing/
ba' rgyu// las kyi rgya mtshor mi 'gal sems ldan pa// mi bzad de dag rnam thar 'di yin no// gang rnams mi skyo'i sems dang mi ldogasanas// brtson 'grus mthu dang rtsal du ldan/
pa'i rnams// thams cad mkhyenatshogs brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa// brtul zhugs bzang ldan de dgayul 'di yin// zhi ba'i sems ldan mnyam par gzhag pa gang// shin tu zhi gyur
rims dang bral ba'i rnams// kun mkhyen bsam gtan yan lag mtshor spyod pa// rab tu zhi bde dgatshul 'di yin// gang rnams chags pa kun lasasems grol zhing// chos kyi rang bzhin
khong du chud sems can// rgyal ba'i chos dbyings rtogs par khong nud pa// shes rab sgron ma de dag tshul 'di yin// sems can rang bzhin rtogs sems ldan gyur cing// gang rnams srid
pa'i mtsho la chagasamed sems// sems can soms la gzugs brnyan zla 'cha' ba/ lam mkhan de dag rnam thar 'di yin no// dusagasum byung ba'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/ smon lam/
gang chen mtsho yi rgyud skyes pa'i// zhing rnams kun tu phyimaba mthar spyod pa// kun tu bzang po de dkatshul 'di yin// gang rnams chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho yis// 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'du/
dang 'jig pa yi// bskal par bcas pa bod du chud pa'i rnams// rtog med de dag rnam thar 'di yin no// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran thams cad la// sangs rgyas grangs med shing rgyal drud
bzhi bzhugs shade// byang chub 'tshad rgya 'gro 'dul mthong ba yis// chags med mig can ng dgatshul 'di yin/ khyodan bskal pa rgya mtsho rgya chen du// dge ba'i bshes gnyenamadapo bsnyenang kur
chos 'dod chos tshol mi skyo 'dir phyin pas// thos nas de ni yongasasu bzung bar nus// khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir// bder gshegs byin rlabs bsamakyis mi khyab pas// rnam par
snada mdzad tshad med lul 'di yang// 'o ma'i tshig las chags pa med pa 'byud/ rigs kyi bu sngon byud ba'i dus bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyi pha rol de'i

yad ba snga zhig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri spos rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba byung// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten kyi khams rgya mtsho gsar rin po tsho'i ri sbos rnam par snang ba der/

de bzhin gshegs pa ye shesazhi bo'i 'od kyi dbyings su snang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongashes kyi ra ba'i bod chos kyi dbyingesasusnang ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po

de sngon byang chub sems dpa'ispyod pa mdzad pa'i / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser rin po che'i ri sbos rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i so dang ra rdulashin tu phra ba
skad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klasapa bstan du yod pa dang ldan pa// 'ag rten gyakhamasakyi rgyud re re zhing yang bskal pa'i grangs shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdulashen
byabya// tuphra bsnyad dang ldan pa// bskal pa re re zhing yang bskal pa bar ma shin tubastan pa dum dang ldan pa bskal pa bar ma re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad du
bya ba bstan pa du ma dang ldan ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byungab dang rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan du yod pa// de bzhin gshags pa byung bar re zhing yang mado sde yang dag par bstan pa/ 'jig rten/
gyi khams kyi rdulanatu phra bsnyad brjod du yod pa// mdo sde re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa// 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyad bstan du yodapa/
sems can 'dul bamatha' dang dbus med pa shin tu bstan par thar pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho phul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'dul ba dang ldan pa yongs
su sbyalta/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gser ni po che'i ri spos rnamapar snang ba der 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud phyogs kun tu mngon par ltas pa'i sgo/ rgyal

mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya babyung ste/ 'gos kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams bdama'i rgyud phyogasa kun tu sgo mngon par ltas nga/ rgyalamtshan rgyas rnam par brgyan pa der 'jig rten gyi khams na

po tshe thams cad kyi mdog kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khamasakyikazhidang/ mtshamasakyi rgyan rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba las byas

bad+dani po che sna tshogs kyi me tog rgya mtsho la gnasapa/ lhun nipo che'i rgyalapo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa las bsgrubs pa/ lha'i grong khyer gyi dbyibasasu

'dug pa/ rnam par dag cad kun nas nyon mongs byung bar gyur te/'jig rten gyi khamasader gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasar reb kyi rdulashin tu phub snyed byung bar gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i'ireb kyi rdul

shin tu phra ba skad bode dag gi klong bzhi po dbu mkhan po sna tshog sakyi rtse mo'i rgyalamtshan zhes bya ba byung// gling bzhi pa'i 'dzig rtenakyi khoms rinapo che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan der gling chu zhed du dpag

tshad brgya phrag stong yod pa bzhi byung nas/ glu de'i don yang grong khyer chen po stong phrag re re byung ngo// gling bzhipade'i gling gdebus su rgyalapo'i gnas rin po che'i sa las rnam bar brgyanapasprin gyi sgronam zhes bya

bgrong khyer stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan par byung ngo// de'i tshu 'dzam bu'i gling de'i mi rnanasakyang tsha'atshad lostong phragabcu thub par gyur to// rgyal po'i gnas ni po che'as las rnam par

brgyan pa sprin gyi sgronam der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos thams cad kyi daro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya babyung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyalapochos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi

dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i blon po ni lo brgya byung ngo// btsunamon stong phrag drug byung ngo// srasan kun kyang dpa' ba/ brtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ blta na sdug pa/gzi
byaa/ brjid chen bo/ stobs che babargya phrag bdun byung ngo// rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugasakyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa de'i tshol 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang gdugs
gcig gis bskyangs par gyur te/ pha rol gyi 'khor dang dgra thams cad kyang shin tu choms par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams der bskal pa bar ma ni zad du cha/
rnyog pa lnga 'jig rten du byung/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni nub par gyur nas/ sems can ma dge ba bcu'i lam laspyod pa phal cher ngan sod du'ang 'dod bar gyur pa de dag mi dge
bkacu'i lasakyi lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyusatshe thung ba dang/ longs spyod chung ba dang/ gzugs ma legs pa dang/ kha dog mi sdug pa dang/ lus ma legs pa dang/ bde ba'i
rnam pa kud ba dad/ sdug bsngal nyams sumyong ba'i rnam pamang ba dad/ phan tshun sku zhang 'dud pa'i rang bzhin can dang/ phanatshun dbye ba la zhugs pa dang/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig la spyod
rdzu pa dang/ 'chal pa'i tshig tu smra ba dang/ 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyisanon pa dad/ zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rtog pa dang ldan pa// lta ba thibs po sna tshogs kyi mya ngan du 'khyams par

gyur nas/ de dgachos m yin pa'i 'dod chags la zhen cing 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyisanon la/ log pa'i chos kyis kun nas 'khor bas/ sa la shing rtsi dang lo zasaskyo bar 'gyur ba'i char yang dus su me/
'ab ba par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang rtswa dad gol ba dang/ smanadad/ nagasatshal dad bza' shing g ra ba dang/ sdong po dag kyang bskams par gyur nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis thebs
shing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su skyabs med pas phan tshun 'bod ma myong zhing g.yen spyo bar gyur to/ de dag kyang gcig tu 'dus nas/ rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'as las rnam par brgyan pa spra
gyi skyonam gangan ba der dong sta/ kun tu bskor nas la la ni lag pakyen du bsgreng/ la lan sngol mo sbyor/ la lan lus shin tu 'angar/ la la na gyin/ la lan dub/ la lan lus thams cad kyis
phab cing phyag tshal/ la la ni pus mo sa la 'dzugs la la ni lag pa nam mkha'i dbyings su g.yob/ la la ni gos med kyang skyon mor 'bod/ la lan khamigami sdug par gyur cing rgyal po
chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la mngon du ltas shing/ snying rje rje skad du 'o dod chen 'bod do// lha chen de bdag cagan/ma thagano/ bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug
bsngal gyis rab tu gzir to// gabris pasna tshogs kyis g.yon phyo'o/ bdag cag la skyabs su mamachaseso// bdag cag la mgon dang dpung gnyenam mchis so// sdug bsngal gyi shing
thags kyis 'khor to// srog chad la thug go/ 'chi bar gyuram 'dango zhes te/ smasdags snatshog sasu blang zhing dbyangs kyi rnam pa sna tshog sakyis kha dog masdug par gyur par 'du shes dang/ tshig
@#// sna tshogs kyi tha snyad dang/ cho 'bring dang/ skad kyi gdangs don snatshogs rjod pa'i tshig dang ngag gis 'o dod bosaso// rgyal po'i gnas de'i skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/
khye'u dad bumo bkres pa dang skom pas mnar ba/ lus la rgyan med po// sgron mo gosamed pa// kha dogam sdug pa/ lus gs shing rtsub pa/ sdug bsngal zhing yid m bde la mi dga' ba de
dag thams cad kyang bde bana mngon par 'dod/ sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pas nai blamakhyer nas/ rgyal po shes pa'i skyes bu chen po chos thams cad kyi daro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu skyug
tshapa de la bde ba thams cad thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang/ 'tsho ba'i sdug pa thams cad dang 'grogs par bya ba'i 'du shes dad/'tsho ba'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing gtor thob par bya ba'i 'du shes
dang da mu stags mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes dang/ lam chen po lanan tan du bya ba'i 'du shes dang/ gru chen po'i 'du shes dang/ ye shes kyi gling chen po'i dushes dang/ don chen po rab tu
thob par bya ba'i 'du shes dang/ mtho ris kyi dga' ba dang bde ba thoms cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i 'du shes kyis mgon dang skyabs tshol bar gyur to// rgyal po chos thams

kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas 'khor kun nasaslong ba mang bosnying rje rje skad du 'bod pa'i 'o dod chen po de thosanas/ desnying rje chen po'i sgo brgya stong krangs med pa phrag bcu la

par gyur to// de snying rje chen po'i tshul yid la bab pa'i sems su gyur nas yud tsam zhig rtse gcig tu bsams te/ snying rje chen podang ldan pa'i tshig bcu brjod do// bcu gang zhen/ kyi hud kye sems/
can 'di dgan 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen por ltung yang skyabs med pa lta na/ bdaganam zhig 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen por ltung ba'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'god pas
gnas su 'gyur/ kyi hud kyi sems can 'di dag tonamongs pa'i gnod pas gtses shing skyabs med pa ltan/ nam zhig bdag sems can nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang gnod
pas gtses te skyabasamed pa rnams khanam tho ba med pa'i las kyi mtha' la 'god pas skyabasasu 'gyur/ kyi hud kyi sems can 'di reg 'jig rtenan rga shi'i 'jigs pas tshar tshod tsang mgon
med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigasapa thams cad rnam par sel bsamagon du 'gyur kyi hud kyesems can 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs
pa snatshogs kyis gtses te rten med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa snatshog sakyis gtses pa rnams shin tu bde zhing skyon med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la
dgod pas rten du gyur/ kyihud kyesems can gyi 'jig rten nam rig pa'i mun par 'thoms te/ the tsom dang yid gsakyi ba rib kyis bsgribs pa ltan/ nam zhig bdagasems can thams ]
cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel bas sgron mar 'gyur/ kyi hud kyesems can 'di dag ni snang ba dang bral ba ldan/ nam zhig bdag ye shesakyi sgo rab rib med pa yongs
[+ ]su ston pas yashesachen po'i snang ba byin par 'gyur/ kyi hud kyi sems can 'di dgan phrag dog dad/ 'jungs pa dang/ g.yo dad sgyu'i rtog pas bsam pa rog pa can du gyur te
ye shes kyi mdog gsal ba medapa lhan/ nam zhig bdagasems can thams cad shin tu dag pa la rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ kyi hud kyi sems can gyi 'jig rten na 'khor ba rgya
mtsho'i yul gyi rgyud du zhugs shing 'dren pa med pa ltan nam zhig bdagasems can chos thams cad chos rgya mtsho'atshul la 'dzud par gyur cid 'dren par 'ong/ kyi hud kyi sems can
gyi 'jig rtenam dul zhing rnam par 'dren pa med pa lta na nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongasasu smin bar bya ba dang/ rnam par 'dul ba la de bzhinagshegs pa/
byin gyi rlabs kyis dus las 'da' zhing rnam par 'dren par 'ong/ kyi hud kyi sems can gyi 'jig rten na dmus long du gyur te yongs su 'dren pa med pa lta na/ nam zhig bdag sems can
thams cad kyi sgrib pamed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i yoshes kyi tshul la 'phrod cing yongs su 'dren par 'gyur/ de skad du des snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig rnam pa bcu brjod nas/ rgyal
bo'i gnas der dri ba chen po bsdus te/ gtong b chen po'i rnga bo tshe'ang yongs su brdungs nas sku ru 'dod pa de la de sbyin gyis/ 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su tshim par bya'o zhes sgra brjod nas
des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas thams cad dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang ljongs dad/ yul dang/ grong rdal thams cad du yo byad thams cad kyimadzod phyo ste//
lam gyi mdodang/ lam gyi sum mdo dang/ sad thams cad du'ang yo byad sna tshogs kyis rnam pa mang po bkod de/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bskabs so// mdzod dad bang pa thamasacad
kyad phye ste rin po che'i gter chen po dang tshogs kyang yongs su bstan to// rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po du ma 'ad srungs so// zas dang/ skom dad/ gos dang/ ba zhon pa dang//
me tog dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi mdzod phye nas khang pa dad/ gzhal med khang dang khyim mad po malacha dad/
stan dang/ gosakyis yongs su brgyan te/ nor dang dbyig thams cad yongs su tshogs par byas nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang pa'i gzi brjid rnam par bkod pas mun pa rnam par sal
ba bshams nas/ des sems can de dag mi 'dod pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ khyim de dag re rer yang rung gi lus dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i lus mngon par sprul te kun tu
@#// bkod do// sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad gso ba'i phyir sman pa dang/ sman dang/ rim gro dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad sna tshogs kyi rkyen phun sum tshogs pa
gongasasubashams so// rin po che snatshogs kyi snod rnam pa tha dad pa yo byad snatshogs kyis mi rigs su bkang ba dag kyang nye bar bkod de/ 'di ltar rin po che rdo rje'i snod ni sros kyi nor bu rin
bo che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang/ sngos kyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod ni gos kha dog dam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ngo// shing rtamang po dbyibs dang mdog sna tshogs su 'dug/

ba rin po che sna tshog sakyis rab tu brgyan pa/ rtadang/ glang po dang/ ba glang cad shes bcus pa/ rin po che'ashade rta sna tshogs rgyal po'i rkyen du rung ba ni po tsho thams cad kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod dang ldan

pa/stan sna tshogs bting ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bla re snachogasabres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bris pa/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgrang bas brgyanapa dag
gisakyad yul gyi phyogs gang bar bkod do// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs dang/ yul thams cad sbyin par yang 'dod kyis bsko'o// bza' shing gi re ba dang/ kun dga'i rob dang/ dka' thub kyin g

zatshal sna tshogs yongs su gtang ba dang/ khyim dang/ chung ma dang/ bu dang/ bu mo thams cad yongs sugatang ba dang/ rin po che rin thang med pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang/ rang gi snying dang/ skad
dang rgyum dang/ mkhal ma dang/ tshel dang/ sha dang/ khrag dad pags pa dang rkang lag dang/ rna ba dang/ mig dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ so dang/ mchu dang/ mgo yongasasu btang ba nas/ phyi
nang ka dngos po thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su gtang bar yang 'o dod kyis bsko'o// des yobyad de lta bu yongs su gtad ba'i rnam pa mang po bshams te bsogasanas/ rgyal
ba'i gnas ni po che'i sa las rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin gyi sgron ma de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer rin chen rtse mo'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i mdun rolanas gzhi mnyam pa'i phyogs yangs pa/ chu
zhing du rgya che zhing mnyam pa// mtho dman med pa/ rnam par dag cing gzhi mnyam pa/ngam grog dang/ g.yang sa dang/ sdong dum dad/ tsher ma dang/ gseg ma dad/ gyo mo thams cad med ba/

nipo che thamasacad kyi khams las grub pa/ gzhi rin po che thams cad las byas shing rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad bkram pa/ nor bu ni po che'irgyan rnam pa du mas brgyan pa shArin po che'am tog sna/

tshogs kyisagang ba/ phye ma sna tshogs drishin tu zhim pa'i rdul ldang ba/bdug spos sna tshog sakyis bdugs pa// rin po che'i sgron ma dpal gyi gzi brjid can rab tu 'bar ba/ spos dang bdugasbos thams cad

kyi na bun dang sprin kyisanam mkha'a kun tu khebs pa'i rgyan dang/ rin po che sna tshog sakyishing ga 'phreng ba legs par bkye bsams par brgyan pa/khang pa dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ khang pa brtsegasapa sna
tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i snam bu ldang ba rnam par snang bo/ rin po che sna tshog sakyim tog gi dra bas kun

sa khebs pa// rin po che spos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i gdugasakyi dkyil 'khor can/ gser gyi dra ba las rin po che dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa/ bla ro rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa'i madzes

bar byas pas khebs par bresab/ spos kyi rgyal po sna tshogs kyi phye ma rnam par gram// rin po che sna tshog sakyi me tog sil mas dga' dga' ltar gang ba rolamo brdung ba dang dkrolab bye ba khrag khrig

rgyu brgya stong gi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lasa rnam par smin pas mdon par grul pa zhig yod pa de'i
dbus susengago'i rdo chen po sna bcu las grub pa'i sa'i gzhi tshogs la gnas pasa'an po che'i khri 'phang sna tshogs bcu'i 'khor gyis rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i shing yal ga can bcus
stags bu'i mtshams rnam par klubs pa'i rkyen mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i sa'i gzhi mi shigs pa la rkang pa rab tu rten pa/ ni pom thams cad kyi gakhrugs dong mdog yongs

su 'dzin pa'i stan gyi 'khor locan/rin po che du ma las byas pa'i bog ri'i rgyan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa/rin po che snatshogs kyi tshom bu rnam pa tha dad pa'i rkyen gyis shin tu brgyan pa rin po che'i

[4 ]rgyalamtshan kun nas rnam par phye ste 'phel bskyang ba'i rin po che sna tshog sakyi ba dan sbyangs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'adra bas brgyan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rin po tshesatshogs

dang gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs rnam par bres pa/ ne po chosna tshogs kyi me tog gi dra ba dang/ rin po che'i rgyal bo chen po'i dri ba dang/ gos rin po che snatshog sadang/ ngani bonu'adra ba ci'igasukun n kab

cad madzes par byas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa sbos ne po che rnam ba tha dad pa'i tshogs lasasnyim pasabcus shing spos kyi sprina mngon par gar ba/ranapo che'i rgyalapo kha dog dang dri bsamakyis mi khyab pa byung ba'i

dbyibs yid du 'ong ba snatshogs dang/ spos thamasacad kyi na bun dang sprin 'phyud bgam yo nas lha rdzasakyi sngos dang bdug sposasna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i stan reg na bdeb

kha dog bzang bo dumacan legs par btidi ba/lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang klusnyan ba yid du 'ong babargya stong du ma'isgrokun nas 'byung ba 3na po che snatshogs kyi them skasakyi 'phrang ba pan kyisa rnam par klubs pas btu

brgyanapa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/rin po che'i 'bru'i gzugasarin po tshesnatshog sakyis smras pa/ rnam par 'phrul pasnatshog sakyisa rnam par snang bar byed ba'i 'od dang ldan par mngon pa grub ste// de la

rgya ba bo chos thamasacad kyi de rdo'i bedugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pagazugasabazang ba/shin tu mdzes pa// bltan sdug pa/ 'a dogabazad bo dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/mchinapo'i mtshan rnam par dag par ba tu thob ba
rin po che rnam par snang ba'i dpanacan/rdo rjemathu bo tsho ltar mkhregs shing mashegs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ rtsibama'i mtshams thags bzang zhing brtan par 'brel pa/ yan lag dang nying
[A ]lag thams cad yongasasu bzod ba/ kun nas bzang ba/ kun nas mdzes pa/ kun nas sdug pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa// mosakyi rgyalapo chen po'i rigasasu byung pa/ yo byad thams

cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbang shin tu rnam par dag nga/ rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba/ tshig gi dkyil 'khor kham bab pa/ mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/chos kyi sbyor ba ma nor ba
shin tu brtan par byas pa/ yon tan dad legs pamatha' yas par brjod du yod pa de 'dug pa'i gyur to// rgyal po chos thamasacad kyi daro'i gdugasakyi dkyil 'khor rab sgog padeseng ge 'i khri chen po la

'dug pa dang/ stang ka spyi bo'i thad ka'i bar snang la gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rin po che'i sna tshogs rnam par 'phel ba'i yu ba can/nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod kyi snying po dang ldan pa/'an po che sna

zla tshogs kyishar bu brgya stong legasapar bres pa/ rin po che du ma'i 'od 'phro ba dpal gyikawibarjid 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa/'dzamabu chu klung gi gsar 'od 'tshir zhing gsal la rnam par dag pas bla

kha bkabapa/ran po che sna tshogs snga bar labs spras pa'i gsar gyi dra bsanang shun gyiskrun byas pa/mu tig snatshogs kyi se mo do mngon par sbyangs pa/na po maM sna tshogs kyi re bas kun nas bkab pa/ ni/

bo che'i dril bu du ba las gsan ni bo che'i dril chen rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldil brgyusapa mngon par sbyangs pa/ nor bu rin po che dam pa'i 'phreng ba kun nasa mngon par spyas pa'i rgyan dad ldan pa/ lha rdzasakyisgra yod

du 'ong ba'i gdangs grag par 'khyudabasems can thams cad dgaba'i lasakyi lam la skul ba'idrilagyisgra rnam par grag brgyud bar gyur te/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyidagyil 'khor rab tu

sgrog pa de rin po che'i rdul yab kyis mngon bar g.yab cid/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bas kyang lhag par gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bas shin tum dzasaso// de seng ge 'i khri de la 'dug m thag tu 'gro bamang bo

de dag thams cad mngon du gyur te// thalamo sbyar nas rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rgyal po chos thamasacad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab sgrog pa de'i drung du slong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong sna tshogs yodas su len pa/ yo byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa// 'gro ba'irgyud snatshogs su gtogs pa/'dod pa sna tshogs kyisoms dang ldan pa/smon pa dang bsamapa sna tshogs tshan/ phyogs
sna tshog sas 'dus pa/ yul gyi spyod pasnatshogs la gnas la/longasaspyod sna tshogs la mngon par smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa// bsamapa dang yongasau rtogs pa snatshogs can/ mi'i sasnatshogs su
gtogs pa/ rigs kyi skya gnas snatshogs su skyes pa/ yul snatshog sanas 'ongs pa/ sgra skad dang tshig gi'adu byed sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor snatshogs 'byin pa/dngos po sna
[n ]@#// tshogs kyi don du gsol ba 'debs pa/ tshig dang dog sna tshogs rjod pa/ bsod namasakyi ri rab chen po de 'ba' zhigagi gdong du lta ba/ 'di 'ba' zhig shes pa'i sabu chen bo/

[+ ]yin zhes nges par soms pa bsod nams chen pos brtan pa'o// skyes bu chen po'i zla ba'o// gtong ba chen po'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis rtog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam
gyi sems kyiso 'dus pa byang chub sems dpa'ismon lam kyisams kyisasprul pa'i slongamo pa'i tshogs chen po de mthong nas/ slong mo pa de dag la sems dga' ba dang/ sems mos pa dang/ sems spro bdung/

rgyu dge ba'i bshes gnyena mthong ba'i 'du shesasu gyur to// snying rje chen po'i shugs drag po shin tu yangs pa'i ng byung bar gyur to// phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa slong mo pa thamasacad yongasasutsham par bya ba las phyi'i

mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po'ang skyes par gyur to// 'gro ba thams cad du snyoms pa'i sbyor bas yongs su gtad ba'i sems kyis rgyas par dgad ba'i sprin kyang mngon par byung bar gyur te/

rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'agodugasakyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pades slong mo pa de dag mthong ba'i mod la de'i rgyus ches dga' bar gyur kyi/ bskal pas mtshams med pa'i mthas klas par stong gsum

gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pas naam yin no// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong mang po'i mthasakas par brgya byin gyi dbang la gnas pas naam yin no// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mad po'i

mthas klas par dbamatshoma'i lha'i rgyal po'i dbang la gnas pathob pas naam yin no// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i mthas klas par rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po'i debang la gnas pas nam yin

no/ dbaskal pa tshad med pa'i mthas klas par rab 'phrul dga' lha'i rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi dbang la gnas pa thob pas ni ma yin no// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mathas klas par dbang sgyur gyi lha'i
rgyal bo'i debad rab tu thob ste/ lha'i bu mo bzhin bzang mo yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur bsanam yin no// bskal pa brjod dumed pa'i mthas klas par tshangs pa'i gnas kyi bde bas tshangs pa'i thabs la

gnas pa thob pas na ma yin no// bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i mthas klas par gyanom snang ba'i lha'abade bathob pas naam yin no// bskal pa dpag tumed cing ma thod par dge rgyas kyi lha'i bde ba thob pas naam

yin no// bskal pamu med pa'i mthas klas par gnas gtsang lha'i rnam par thar pa zhiba'ibade ba la rnam par sbyod pa thob pas naam yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na skyes bu rtsodapa laspyod pa pha ma dang/
bunu dang/ bsad dang/ mdza' bodang/ blon po dang/ gtan bshes dang/ bu dang/ bumo dang/ chung ma dad yun ring mo zhig tu bralanas 'brog dgon par 'khyams te// de dag mthong bar 'dod 'dod pa las

de dag dang phradan de dag mthong bas mi ngomasashing dga' ba dang chags pa chen po skyo bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas slong mo ba
]bya@#// de dga mthong bar gyur pa'i mod la dga' ba'i shugasachen po skyes so// sems kyi dga' ba'i ro bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// sems spro ba'i shugs rab tu byung ngo// rab tu dga'

[+ ]bachen po'i shugs yosasuskyes so// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu dad pa dang mos pa'i shugs kyis stobs chen po 'phelato// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsa ba brtan pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel to// sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi chos la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs mngon par 'phel to// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po las su rung ba yongs su byung ngo// sems dga' bas rgyas pasamos pa'i
shugs chen po skyes par gyur to// sems spro bas shugs yangs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dbang po dang bsam pa shin tu gus par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi dpo'i

gdugasakyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa thomasacad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam dang skyo la mngon du ltas pa// 'gro ba thams cad shAni'u tshams par bya ba'i yid la
ba la brtson pa/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la 'dun pa bdud dang/ las dang gzhonamongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi ra rnam par 'thor ba la brtson pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdams ngagamathun par blang ba la sta gon du gnas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho sgrakun nas yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa 'asnying po can/mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phagrwa

[d]]pa'irgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i spyod yul can des slongamo pa de dag la bu gcig pa'i 'du shesabaskyod pa'i phyir ro// pha dang ma'i
'du shes dang/ sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang/ dge ba'i bshesaganyen gyi 'dushes dang/ dkon pa'i 'du shes dang/ dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes dang/ ang po byas pa'i 'du shes dang/ phan 'dogs pa dam
pa'i 'du shes dang/ byang chub kyi lam nye bar bstan pa'i 'du shes dad/ mkhan po'i 'dushes dang/ ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar des slong mo pa de dgadon ci la 'ongs pa dang/ don

ci la phyin pa dang/ dus ji tsam na 'dus pa dang/ yul gang dang gang na kAnas pa dang/ dngos po tsa dang chu slong ba dang/ rnam pa gang 'dod pa dang/ bsam pa ci 'dra ba dang/ chu dang chu lasmon pa dang/ nyi ngod chu la 'dod

pa dang/ dngos po gang dang gang tshol bde dag thams cad tshul bzhin du mi dka'abamed pa'i byams pachen po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ slongamo pa'i 'gro ba las phyin phyogs sum ltas da 'gatod ba chen ngo 'i 'od zer
dang sems can thams cad lasnyoms par sbyor ba'i gtong ba'i sgos yongs su tshim par byas so// des zas 'dod pa lan zos sbyin no// bskom 'dod pa lanaskom byin no// gos 'dod pa la ni gos

byin no// me tog 'dod pa laname togabyin no// de bzhin du spos dang/ bdugaspos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang ba dan dang/ rin po che dang/ rgyan dang/
stan dang/ mal dang/ khyim dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang/ kun dga'i re ba dang/ dka' thub kyi nagasatshal dang/ rta dang/ glang po dang/

shang rtadang/ rkud tad dang/ dgal ba dang/ khyogs dang/ gzhon pa dang/ gsar dang/ dbyig dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ dud dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang/ sa le sbram dad/ dngul dag kyang byin par

gyur to// rang ga de khyim dad/ gzhal medakhang dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ g.yog 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i mdzod thams cad kyang phye ste bkos nas rab tu gzhung bar gyur to// su ni 'dod pa de dag de khyer cig ces dag

yu la 'dod pa dag kyang yul byin no// grong 'dod pa dag kyang sprod byin no// grong khyer 'dod pa dag kyang grong khyer byin te/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par zhugs pa des slong mo pade dag thams cad la
ci bdog pa yongs su btang ste/ dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas mngon par bstad do// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdosadasargyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong
pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/bam po brgya bzhi de// de'i tsho tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya ba bu mo drug cu'i 'khor dang ldan pa/gzugs bzang zhing mdzesal blta na sdug ba/ kha dog

bzang po'i dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pa// skra mthonamathing du 'dug pa/mgo dkar nag 'byes pa/dri zhim po yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ gos

bzang ba/rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rig pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ ngo tsha bshes pa dang/ spyod pa dang/ ma lugs phun sum tshogs pa/ bla ma la sri zhudang ldan ba/

shes bzhin gyi dam pas spyod pa/ byed dgu zab pa tshos blang ba dang/ gzung ba dang/ khong du chud par bya ba la yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par byas pa/ chos kyis mngon par bskrun
pa'i samasakyi rgyud rab tu dang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa/ mos pa yangs pa/ nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ gzhan la phan par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i
phyogs la rnam par bltas pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesalaman par 'dud pa zhig mchod sbyin ra ba chen po rer 'ongs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya ba de rgyal po chos thams cad

kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi rekyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i sing ka'i khri chen po'i g.yasarol cad ma ring ba zhigun 'dug 'dug ste/ rgyal po de la phyag 'tshalanas phar ci la'ang len pamed do/ de phyogs gcig na

gdug cing sems 'di ltar bskyed par gyur te/bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di ltabu mthong zhing 'grogasau yod pan bdag gis thob par bya ba legs bar thob bosnyam ste/ des rgyal bo chos thamasacad kyi nga ro'igadug

kyi rekyil 'khor rab zhu sgrog pa de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang/ ston pa'i'adushes dang/ snying brtse bar byed pa'i 'du shes dang/ phan 'dogs pa'i 'du shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed de/g.yo
sgyu med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ spro ba'ashugs rab tu yangs pa thob pas/ rang gi rgyana rnams lus las dkro'[']/ rgyal po chos thamasacad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi

[+ ]kyil 'khor rab du sgrog pa gang na ba der mngon par bltas tagator ba dang/ de dag de'isang ge'i khri'i'od khri 'phang gisa'i nga du kram par gyur to// des rgyun de gde ltar gtor nas smon lam chadzad

bo chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dekyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa 'disoms can mgon med cing mun pa'i nang na 'thom pa rnams kyi mgon skyabasasuk+tan pa de ltar bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'gyur
bshog cig/ 'disachos gshes pa de dag kyang shes pa/shog cig 'di theg pa gang gis 'byung ba des bdag kyang 'byung bar shog cig/ 'di lam gang na zhugs pa de nas badag kyang 'jug par shog cig/ thilan

'di gzugs bltan gtang mi bra la zad mishesapa'i longs spyod dad ldan ti/g.yog 'khor mtha' yas lagazhan gyis mi thub cing thub par dka' ste thub pa med pa de bzhin bdag kyang shog ke/ 'di gang dang gang

duskabar 'gyur ba der bdag kyang skyo bar 'gyur bar shog cig snyam pa dang/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la brtson pa rgyalapo chos thamasacad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu skyog pasashesan
'baltas te 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod la ci dgos pa khyer cig/ bu mo nga ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste/ sems can thams cad yongasasu tshim par bya ba la zhugs pa'o// de skad ces
byas pa dang/ de'i yid la'ang bdag ni rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugasakyi dkyil 'khor rang du sgrog pas thugs su chud par gyur to snyam nas/de bas kyang mos par gyur to// de de
ltar mos pa'i sems su gyur to/ dgaba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i shugs yongs su skyasanas/ rgyal po chos thamasacad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa la de'i tshe tshogs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngon chad rtsa las rnam brgyan sprin 'di// rgyal po seng ge khyod 'khrungasam gyuratshe// mdangs dgar ma gyur gzi brjid ma mchis te/ yi dgas 'jigs pa'i
gnas dang ci mi 'dra// mi rnams kun kyang srog gcod mos par gyur// ma byin len latshul dang sbyor mamachis// brdzun du smra zhing brlang ba'i tshig kyang brjod// phrom bkyal pa'i tshig kyang rab tu
sna/gzhan gyi nor lachags pa'i soms dang ldan// gang zag gzhan lakun kyang ngan du sems// lta ba'i rnam gnas sdig to'i spyod yul can// log pa'i sbyor bas nganapa'i 'gro bar lhung/ chos
ngane chos la spyod pa'i m yo rnams// maragi gtamug mun pasabasgribs pa dag/ lta ba lo gzhugs phyin ci log mthong nas// dgung lomang por dgung char babam gyur// dgung char ma babasabon
chab 'chal te// lo togami 'khrung zhugs shing 'khungasam gyur// mtsho dang lum tshu ban rgyud kyang bskams/ nagasatshal rtsi shing kun kyang de bzhin te// rnamadag spyan khyod 'khrungs par ma gyur
pas// chab klung kun kyang ma lus bskams par gyur// bza' shing ra bkun kyang ra dgon 'dra// rus pa dkar pos dogs bltams par gyur// gang tshe khyod la slong ba mang
'dus te// slong ba thams cad yongs su tshima mdzad nas// phyogs bzhikun nas sprin chen 'dus par gyur// thad dang gshong rnams kun kyang ngoms par bgyis// slan chad rkun chom g.yon can
chad par 'gyur// dgum pa ma mchis su yang gzungam mchis// mgon med gad yin 'akum par ma 'gyur// khyod ni 'gro ba mgon med kun gyi skyabs// srog gcod pa la mngon par mos pa'i mi//
gzhan rnams bkum nyid de yi brag 'tshal la// gcig la gcig ngasha 'tshal gyur pa dag/ khyod kyi sbyin pa chen pos byams sems gyur// brgya stong kladasasu bgrangs par gyur pa las/ de tshu
'ga' zhig rad pa 'tshal gyur kyi// gzhan n rtswa dang lo ma dad pa 'tshal// de tshe kun kyang yi dgas bkres mnar bzhin// 'gro bamagon med mgon du khyod 'khrungs nas// sabon ma babam rmos
'bras kyang byung// dpag bsamashang lasamadzod rnams gang bur 'thon// skyes pa bud med mkhas pa gda' bar gyur// zla ba zla phyed don du sngan chad ni// lamanor gnas pasogs shing sra zhu' bgyid//
deng sang rad pa rab 'tshalargyanamang ldan// dga' ba'i gnas ni rtse ba'i lha yang 'dra// sngon chad log pa rnams lam bzad zhugs// chos don 'dod chagasam rnams zhen cing chags// na chud gzhon nu
[d ]gzhan gyis bsus pa'i rnams// nan gyis phrogasarloms chab 'tshalam dung pagyis// lha mo bzang mo'i kha dog gzugs ldan pa// sos bzung brgyan ldan dang sada mthong 'gyur te// gzhan gyi bud

med sbos dra gda'amachis kyang// dga' ldan rdzobazhin mchis brang rkyen gyis 'tshal// she ba brlang ba phrum bkyal pa'i rnams// sngan chad g.yo sgyu'adebang gis ngan du rjod// ding sang tshig gnongs pa

bzhes ngs shing// lta ba ngan sangs chos la kun kya spyod// tshangs dbyangs ka la bid ka'i sgra byung ba'i// khyod kyi gsung mchog 'di yi cha shas la'ang// rolaso'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa dang// lha rdzas
gru dpyangs 'di dag nyer ma gyur// khyod kyi spyi gtsug dbu stengs gdugs lding ba/ rin chen rgyus bgyis gsan gyi dra bas bkab// dpal gyi snying mdzod yu babi cha na// kun nas rin chen mchog gi dril
gyis 'khor// dril las byung ba'i sgras kyang ma lus pa'i// 'jig rten sgra dbyangs ma lus khrilaganan cing// sangs rgyas gsung gi yan lag 'dra bar 'khrol// dam pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs zhi bsgrog/

dablosasems can nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid// ma lus phyogs kyi zhing rnams brgyud ba ya// bskal pa rgya mtsho'i bde gshegs rgya mtsho dang// blo ldan rgya mtsho'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo rnams// sngon ma 'i zhe

mas gcig nas gcig bargyud du// gangamtshan gang dang gang lags ma bzhin dang// ma lus phyogasasu mchos 'khor lo yang// khyed kyi byin gyis drila rnams btusgrog/ khyod kyi dril sgra thogapa mamachis par// tshadas

dbang lha dbang 'gro ba'i bdag po rnams// rang rang lasakyi tshulani kun brjod cing// 'dzamabu'i rgyal mtshan khyab bam kun tu sgrog/ dril kyi sgra las lha dang mi rnams kyis// rang snang las kyi tshul//

[A ]rgyud thos gyuranas/ sdig to rnamasngangs dge ba'i spyod par gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la kun kyang gnas// khyod kyi yab mibadakaskarama'i 'od// de yi btsunamo pad+mo khyod kyiyum// rnyog pa lnga rnams gna'u/

rgyas gyuratu// chos 'gribs rgyal srid des ni bozhes bar gyur// de yi bza' shing rab yadas byung ba// me tog rgyas brgyan rin chen sgronam ste// shing mang brgyas bskor rjed bu lnga brgya yis// de ni shin

tubargyan pa byung bar gyur// de dag so so'i'i'i ngogs su yang// ka ba stong ldan gzhal med khang bzangasubyung// stegs bu bzang po sna tshogs stong gis brgyan//zla gam du bas kun nas mdzes par bgyis//
chos ngan stobasanarab tu 'phel gyur pas// dgung lo mang por dgung char babam gyur// rdzing bu kun gyi chan dang zhugs shing rnams// de tshe lomamadog dang bcasato bskams// dkud bdunanani khyod bltam

'gyur pa'i tshe// de tshe ngomatshar rmad byung ltas byung ste// de dga mthong nasasems can nges rtogs par// bdag cag skyob pa nges bar 'byung zhes mache// dgung gi gung lababanas rnamajug tu//khams kyi dogs

yongasasu g.yos par gyur// ma smad shin tu bzod ba'i rdzong de yi// dbusasu gdugs dang mnyam pa'i 'od cig byung// chab bzang yan lag brgyad ldan rgyas par gyur// rdzing bu lnga brgya kun kyang de bzhin te// zhugs/

[s// ]gdi kun kyang lam 'khrungs bar gyur// me tog 'bras bu kha dog mdog dang ldan// rdzing bu de rnams chab kyisabaltams gyur pas// nags tshul ma lus de dag ngoms bar bgyis// chab chen de las byung ba'i
rgyud 'phros pas// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan chab kyisabaltams par gyur// zhugs shing sman dang lo tog ldumabu yang// 'khrungs gyur zhugs shing me tog 'bras bu rgyas// dogasa'i snyinganamachis/
dgu'i sa bon rnams// kun da chab kyis brgyan pas rnam par 'khrungs// chab kyisabadasagyur dogasa'i phyogs rnams kyang// de tshe thams cad rab mnyam par gyur// skad gshong dogasa'i
phyogs rnams rjesnyad pa// de dag kun kyang de tshomanyam par gyur// g.yang sa klog po mabade'i phyogs kyi rnams// de tshe yud kyis kun kyang mnyam par gyur// tsher ma gseg ma la sogs mamachis
gyur// rinachen bzang po'i 'byung gnas yongs su 'thon// skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur// skom pasagadungs pa kun kyang chab la 'tshal// kye ma de ridi bden sumathu zhes// snyan par brjod

bde skad ched du brjod// dogasa'i mnga' bdag skar 'od sras dang bcas// srasamo blon po'i tshogs bcas de yi tshe// skye ba bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te// bza' shing ra bar dgyes par gshegs pa mdzad/
mdangs dga' rdzong chen yongasasumaslad pa// spos chus bltams pa dbusanamachis gyur pa'i// de yi dbus su chos stags bzang po yis// pho brang steng gshegs btsunamobacas pas bzhugs// dkung
bdun lon par gyuranas de yi chab// dgung gi gung la gyen du ltud par gyur// re dang gzhalamed khang ga 'phrad bcas pa'i// degasa'ang de'i tshe g.yosau g.yos par gyur// yongs su ma smad

de yi dbusanas kyang// pad+mo chen po le ma stong ldan 'khrungs// gdugs stongamadog gsalasprin gyi dra ba can// ra reb rtse mo man chad 'od kyis 'gengs/ chu ba rdo rjenang madri bda'aste// rin chen dbang po'i lo ma
rnam dag yangs// 'dzam bu chu klung gser bzang snying po can// ze bsros rab 'bar ba phun sum tshogs// mgon po khyod ni de yi snying po las// skyil mo krung bcas skun byung bar gyur// mtshan gyis rnam
brgyan yan lag shin tums/ lha mad brgyas kyang mngon pa mchod pa bgyis// rgyal po'i gung sang 'od gshegs te// phyag gnyis brkyangs legs par khyod blangs nas// btsunamo'imago la

thogazhag sku 'di skad gsungs// khyod kyi bu 'di yin gyis dkar kyis shig/ 'jig rten mgon khyod de ltar bltams gyuratshe3/ bye ba'i gter rnams rab tu 'bren par gyur// zhugs shing kun kyang mngon par kha
'bus te// stong gi mkha' las rolamo'i sgra yang byung// 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan sems can thams cad kyang// khyod la mngon lta 'dud cing phyagakyang 'tshal// thalamo sbyar cade kye mamagon med pa'i//
mgon zhig byung zhes dga' ba'i tshig kyang brjod// khyod kyi sku las 'od zer ma byung bas// dogs kun tu rab tu snyad bar gyur// 'gro ba'i mun pa kun kyang rnam bsal nas// nad mang ma lus
rab tu zhi bar gyur// gnod spyin grul bum sha zamang bo'asogs// rnam par 'tsho ba de dag bsal bar gyur// gshin gdug pasasems can 'akums pa yi// sbrul gdug kun kyang de tshe yod mi rgyu[;]
thob med sman pa mastan sdug bsngal dang// nad bladasand mad kanod par 'tshe ba dag/ mdor bsdus kun kyang zhi zhing ma mchis gyur/ 'jig rten kun tu rob dka' 'byung bar gyur// phan/
tshun ma dang 'dra ba'i 'du shesakyis// khong nas byamasapa de tshu 'gro kun gyur/ shar gter sams bral 'tshe ba ma mchis ta/ thams cad mkhyen lamanan tan ldan par gyur// ngan sod rgyud rnamA
rnam par rab tu bzlog/ mtho ris lam chen kun kyang btod par gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam yang shin tu bstan/ de ltar khyod kyis 'gro don yangs pa mdzad// rgya mtsho che 'dra yongs su
gtong mdzad pa// khyod mthong bdagan thob pa dam da thob// yun rid 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mgon bral du// khyod na rmad du byung ba'i ma'o na zhig gshegs/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od
kyis/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi da ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrogapa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod do// snyan pas bkur nasarab tu bsngags te lan brgya phrag stong du yas
phyogs su bskor babyas te/phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gci+ed gusapa'i tshul gyis 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po chos thams cad kyang ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas tshod dpon kyi
bumo rin chen 'od la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ dbu mo de ltar khyod sems can pha rol kyi yon tanakyikhyad par shes pa'i mngon par shesapa la zhugs pa legasaso legs so/
[A/ ]bu mo 'jig rten thams cad na'ang sems can gang sems can pha rol gyiyon tan la mos pa de lta bu ni dkon te// bu mo sems can mun pas bsgribs pa/phan gdags pa la drin du ma gzo ba/ sgo phyin ci log
la zhugs pa sems la khrugs par gyur nga/ rgyud 'dzings par gyur pa/ mun pa'i sems dang ldan pa// bsam pa ngang gis log pa/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa/sems can pha rol gyi yon tan gyi khyad par
mdon par ma shis pa rnams kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la brtag par bya ba 'am/ yon tan thams cad shes pa'i khyad par mngon par shes

pa thob par bya bar mchus so// bumo de ltar khyod sems can chen po mngon par shes pas byang chub sems pa'i yon tan rnam pa de lta bu la 'jugapan gdonam thobar byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'o// de
ltar da'i khams su khyod lta bu bshes de 'dra ba dang ldan pa skyes pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling du gsasems can yongs su bsdus pa'i mthu don yod do// de nas rgyal pomos thams cad kyid ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil

'khor 'badu sgrog pas/nor bu rin po che chen po rinathang med pa dang/ nor bu rin po skar ma'i 'od sna tshogs dang/ gos rin po che ni thadamed pa bdag gisalagadar te// blangs nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo ni chen 'od la byin mo/
de 'a khor gyi bumowams cad kyang gos gnapo che sna tshogs kyis khyab pa'i byin nas 'di skad cas smasaso// bu mo gos ni po che 'di khyed la bdag gis yongasasu spyad pagyis shig/ de nas

tshong dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od 'khor dang bcas pasalus mo gnyis sa la phab ste/ gos rin po che dag lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nasaspyi bo la blangs te phyi'i byung nas rin po che de dgabagos so// de'i 'khor

gyibu mo thams cad kyisakyang so so nas rang rang gi gos ni po che de dgabagos nas/ des gos ni po che de dag bgos pa'i 'og tu rgyal po chos thamasacad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa
la bdag gi 'khor du mod dkadang bcas pas g.yas phyogasasubaskor ba byas so// de dag thams cad kyi gos rin po che de dag la rgyu skar dang skar ma thamasacad kyigazugs brnyan snang bar gyur te/de dag

mthong nas 'gro ba'i tshogs mang po 'di skad ces 'dzor ta/ bu mo khyod kyi 'khor bu mo 'di doganamtshan mo'i lha mo skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa la shin tumadzes pa ste/ khyod de dag gisabaskor bsagya nom
pa'i madzes so// de nas r tshanamo'i lhamoshing thamasacad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas tshod dpon gyi bunor bzangs la 'ad skad ces smras so// 'gesakyilu de la ji snyam du sems/

de'i tshe de'adusan rgyal bo chos thams cad kyi ngaro'i gdugasakyidakyil 'khor ba sgrog pa zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhigayin patsam dusems nanadi ltar mibalta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
gya@#// bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di ni de'[ ]/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'basgrog pa zhes bya bar gyur to//

gas kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus nargyal po skar ma'i 'od kyi btsunamo pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba/rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'agadugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'badu sgrog pa'i yum du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam

du sems na'ang de ltar mibalta ste/ lha mo sgyu ma 'din de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo pad+mo'i 'od ces bya bar gyur te/ rdzus te byung ba'i gzhon nu shu bar len len pa'o// yad rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i

dusan rgyal po skar ma'i 'od ces bya ba/ rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pa'i yang tu gyur pa byung ba dekazhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na'ang de ltar mi blta ste/ rgyal bo

zas gtsadaman de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po skar ma'i 'od cesabya bar gyur to// 98da rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dusan tshong dbon gyi bu mo ni chen 'od ces bya ba byung bde gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na'ang de

ltar mibaltaste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'adusan tshod dpon gyi bu mo rin chen 'od ces bya bar gyur to// yad rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can 'dzam bu'i klong der skyes shing/ rgyal po chos thams cad

kyi nga ro'i gdugasakyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrog pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa tsam du sems n nade ltar mtholtaste/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
'dinyid du 'dusate/banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyis ldog par byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bkod de la la ni sa dang po la bkod/ la ba nis gnyis pa lo//
la lan so gsum pa/ la la nasabazhi pa/ la la ni selnga pa/la lanas drugapa/ la lanas bdun pa/la lan se brgyad pa/la lanas dgu pa/ la lanabyed nubasems dpa'i sa bcu pa la bkod par gyur ba'i

byang chub sems dpa' smon lam snatshog sa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pasna tshogs dang/ tshogs sna tshogs dang/ yang dag par bsgrub pasna tshogs dang/ spyod pa sna tshogs dang/ 'byung ba

snatshogs dang/ lam gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa snatshogs dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ khyu mchog gimathu phyung ba snatshogs dang/ lam gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshog sakyis yongs su byung ste/ rnam par thar pa la rnam
bar spyod pa snatshogs kyis 'khor gyi dekyil 'khor 'di na chos kyi gzhal med khang snatshogs na rnam par spyod pas 'bod cing rnam par sbyod pa 'di dog yin no// de nas mtshan mo'i lhamo

shing thamasacad kyi me tog rgyas pas bde bar gnas pas/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od sngo ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byungab 'di nyid basman stabastan ba'i phyir/ tshod

bon kyi bu nor bzas latshigasasu bcad de smras pa/ rgyalaba'i sras po 'amo'i mgo yangs te// phyogs kun zhing mang rgya mtshosna tshogs kyi// sems can ts+tshachen gang chen matsho ya rnams// 'khor bar gyur te/
kun la rnam par lta// 'byam klas zhing rnams kun n bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba byang chub shing gang bzhugs pa// rdul med kun kyang phyogs bcu rgyas bkang ste// chos sgog rtag par 'gro/
a 'dul mthong bar byed// kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho yongs su dag/ sgra rnams m lus thams cad des thos te// bde bar gshegs pas chos gsungs ma lus par// thams cad dga' bas yang dang yang du blos//
khomo'i ye shes gnyis med chags pa med// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi yul la 'jug/ 'gro ba'i sems kyi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams// ma lus kun la mtshan nyid dngos kyis 'jug/ ston

ts+tshA gyim tha'i dran tid de 'dzin stobs kyis// bskal pargya mtsho tshad med kho mos shes// tshe rabs rgyud mang gang chen mtsho dag kyang// pha rol dag dang bdag gi'ang de bzhin shes/ rgya mtsho'i zhing gciko rdul
phran rab snyed kyi// bskal pa skad cig gcig gis ma lus shes// sems can 'gro rgyud dag na 'khor ba dang// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrulatshogs bcas de bzhin no// de dag thogama'i smon lam ci 'dra dang/

yang dgabasgrub tshul 'jugatshul ma yangs dang// spyod pa brten pas tshogs rnams yongasapasgrub pa// 'ag rtenamkhyen pa rnams kyi kho mos dran// mnyama med tshad med tshogs gyur yon tan mtshe mda' ba'i/
dbang bskur sa' byon dza snyad de dag dang// byang chub mtshang rgya'i tshul ni rnam yangs la// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis kho mo 'jug/ thamasakyi rnam pa gang dang gang dag gis// bdegashekA
dka7 'khor lo dam pa 'gror skor dang// mya ngan 'das pa yon tanatshad med dang// chos rnams kanas pa'idus kyang kho mos shes// dri med theg pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams dang// sems can rnams/
'dul rnam yangs ji snyed dang// 'gro ba' de dag gisanIgang bstan pa// so so kun lasna tshogs tshulagyis 'jug/ dga' ba'i gter dang mos pa dbyig gi rnams// kun tu snang ba rnam pa'i dzul
'di yin// kho mos bskal ba brgyamad rgya chen bsgoms// de tshul de la khyod kyang myur 'jug kyis// rigs kyi bu khe mas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba'i 'od sogs
ba yangs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drud du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la
zhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i smon lam yongasasurdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gcig non pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya matso

thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i stobs lamakhas pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mi thams cad sdod pa re rer yang dag par 'du ba'i smon lam dang sbyod pa yongasau dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnamapar

thar pa re re la byang nub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du bar rnam par spyad pa la dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pashes pa 'am/ yon tan spyod par sa'i skan/song rigs kyi bu snying po byang chub
