'tsho skya ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji skad cig yod pa dang/ las mngon par 'du byed pa'i yongs su sgrub pa ji snyad cig yod pa dang/
las rnam par smin pa sna tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// de dag galas yongs su blangs pa dag bar rab zhus so// mi dag ba dang/ 'byung ba dang/
mi 'byung ba dang/ nges pa dang/ ma nges pa dang/ log par ngos pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang/ bag la nyal ba med pa dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa
0 dang dag ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang/ dag ba dang ma dag pa yongs su zin pa dang/ de dag gi dag
ba'i chos yongs su 'dus pa dang/ sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su blangs pa'i ng rab tu shes so// bskal pas nags rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shen luphra
bsed po de dag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ja sud cig byung ba de dag ga mtshan rgyu mtsho'ang shes shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs dang
po bskyed pa rgya mtsho'ang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa 'od du zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'ang rab tu shes so// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ng rab
jushasaso// sngon gyisangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi drung du gshigs pa rgya mtsho'ang rab tu shes so/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas l mchod cing 'am grong mdzad pa'i sbyor ba rgya mtsho'ang rab tu
shas so// sngon byang chub sems dpa' skyed pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho'ang rab tushes so// 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho'ang 'a pa khyushes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag gis sems can yongasasu smin par mdzad pa dang 'dul ba rgya mtsho'ang rab tu shes so// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad pa rgya mtsho'ang rab junas so// chos kyi 'khor bskor
bya// ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i ng rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba dag kyang rab tushes so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dgan nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu
rgyugashis so// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang rab tu shes so// lam bsgoms pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing+ge rnam par dag pa'i bya
brag kyang rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyus kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tushes so// rang sangs rgyas

dadag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chupa khong du chud pa ji snyid cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu
gas so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par sbyod pa la rnam par rtsa ba'i rnam par thar pa'i skyo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zla 'phrul
gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyid cig yod pa de dag kyang rabo tu shes so// yang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can ji srid rig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so//
(rang sangs rgyas de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par byed cing rnam par thar
ba rnam kha sna tshogs kyis rnam par rtsa ba ji snyedatsag yod pa de dag kyang rab tushas so// sangs rgyas pacom ldan 'das de dag ga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ja spyod pa de dag kyang rab/
shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyad pa de dag kyang rab tushes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
thog ma dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thog ma sems bskyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so// smon lam rnam par drag pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu
shas so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rab 'byung ba'i rgyan thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i ng rab tu shes so// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs
rnam par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i ng rab tu shasaso// byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa'i ng rab tu shes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa
yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i ng rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i shugs drag po rnam pa tha dad pa'i ng rab tu shes// byang chub sems
ga/ dpa'i sa lagazim pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa'i ng rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yongs suganan
bas rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa
rgyudag kyayonatushes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bsgom pa'i rgyud dag kyang rab tu legs so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyang ba'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang
chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i
dbang dag kyang rab shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sam raphar ba'i ya shas kyaparab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsdu ba'i yashes kyang rab
bshes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su smin par bya ba'i shes kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'ang
rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dapa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya'ang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rnam par rtsa ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub bamag
da bar ting nga 'dzani rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'id dag sams kyi skad
cagar ra la ting 'dzin rgya mtsho snatshogs thob par byed pa dug kyang rab tu zhus so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul blob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shesaso/ mas
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi snang ba'i sprin dag kyang rab tu shes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa 'thob pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
'jug pa'i yi shes kyi rnam par gnon pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing rgya mtsho rjes su bgrod par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// chos rgya mtsho'i tshul
la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can rgya mtsho'i mtshanod tha dad bdag kyang rab shas so// byang chub sems dang 'a rnam par spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyi rnam
par 'phrul pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shas so// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa dag
kyang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu kho ma ji ltar mamajed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs tekhong du chud pa da bzhin du/
phyi ma'i mthar gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun ma 'chad pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tushes so// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
bskal ba rgya mtshoji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag
kyang rab tu shes so/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs par 'dzatshe rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ ma mdzod kyi
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i de khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi'adzin
kyi'ajig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i 'os su chud pa'i 'jig rtamakyi 'ams gcig nas gcig tubargyud po thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du//
ma mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtshodag kyang rab tu shes so// ma mdzad kyi
'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten/
gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dgakyang rab tu shes so//
mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur 'dab chagasasu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams dza ltar shes
pa de bzhin du/ phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so//
phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar 'os pa de bzhin du/ phyogs kun tu
'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasakyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa drag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas gAcig tu/
brgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtshodag kyang rab tu shes so// phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang bar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig tu
brgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du/ gzhu dang sang po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho 'dare gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kyis pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab shes so// de bzhinadu 'jig rten gyi khams
[M ]tshul du bya ba rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams dkyil 'khor rnams dang/ 'jigarten gyi khams bye brag rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu
klung rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gleng+ka nams dang/ 'dzi tshanagyi rams yongs 4 pa sa ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa d+mo dang/
'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rta babs dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mang du bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams
gzhi dang sAng po me tog ga rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam
mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon kyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// rjes su dran no// sngon gyi sbyor ba rgyu mtsho dag la'ang
shes shing khong du chud do// sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing khong du chud do// bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par
bzhugs pa mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// zhang yongs su dag paro mdzadu pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sems can yos su snyan par mdzad pa'i thabs
kyitshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// ston gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad cing gshags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngonagyi
da bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i
tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu b.ros pa'i tshul dag kyang shas shing khong du chud do/ yo byad la dbang sgyur ba rab tu b.res
pa'i tshul dag kye shes pa khong du chud do// sngon gyi de bzhin gshags pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan du mdzad par tshuladrag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sbyin pa'i pha rol
phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shas shing khong du chud de// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang brtul ka zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i la ngag
kyang shes shing khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ kyang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po mtsho
dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do//
shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du sku'i gzugs bar nAyongs
su bstan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes
shing khong du chud do/zhung rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i mdzad pa dag kye shes shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul
rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las ya shes snang bar gyur pa rgya mtsho dag kye shesashing khong du chud do/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
kyi byang chub yongs su gnan pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu red pa'i tshul dag kyang shas shing
khong du chud do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shos shing khong du chud do// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrulatshapa

rgya mtsho dag kyang shas shing khong du chud do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog ga mthu dang rnam par rol pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag ga byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon gyi dag ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do//
thog ma'i smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtshodag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sems can yongs su snyan par byed pa dang 'dul ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du
chud do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byung chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ sems can rgya mtsho yis sa smin par mdzad pa de dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sams

can de dag gi sams kyi skad cig re re'i dag ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shas shing khong du chud do// ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtshodag kyang
shas shing khong du chud do// gzugs kyi sgo rab du thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// slebs pa'i ya shas kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dug pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag
kye shes shing khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// spyod pa'i dra ba mngon/
par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtshodag kyang shas shing khong du chud do// mthar gyis yongs su sgrub pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i ya shosakyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kye shes
shing khong du chud do// de dag gi dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug
pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// jaltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho chos kyi
dbyings thams cad kyang shes shing khong du chud do// mngon par bsgrub pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho dang
yo shas sgyu ma'i dra ba mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa nas sgo mtha' yas pa nas shin tu bstan par bya ba phyi ma'amatha'i bskal par gnas
pa la 'jug pas bstan par bya ba/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres
por shes shing khong du chud do// mngon par sgrub bo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul/
rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul gyi yul na de lta bu sta/ de'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i tshularab tu shes so// sams/
can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tshogs kyang rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i yo shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ sems can
thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so// nyan thosathamasacad kyi ting nga 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so// nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'ang rab tu
shes so// rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa'i ng shes shing khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya
mtsho'i tshul dag kyang rab shes so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ng rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes
bar thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par yang rab tu shes so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ shAkya'i bu mo go pa la 'di skad rus sbas so// 'phags ma
khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di b.res nas ji srid rig lags/smras pa/
rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba med kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me 'jags
[A ]pa byed pa zhes bya ba byung sta/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to// 'jig rten kyi khams de'i dbus su gling bzhi pa bde ba yod pa zhes ba bu byung ste

gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ra bo'i dpal zhes bya ba grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i phul du bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal
de'i grong rdal stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang so so nas sa gzhi d+d+him+masngon po las grub pa la gnas rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs sbos chus
yongs su shangakha/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu dang/ ma tog puN+Da ra ka shange rtare 'khor lotsam kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs shing dwazhim pas kun
nas khyab pa bdun gyis yongs su bskorab/ rin po che las byas pa'i stegs bu'i khri 'phang bdun las ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas dkrigs pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi
nags tshal gyi 'phrang ba 'grigs pas kun nas bskor ba/ steng nas gsar gyi dra ba bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par phye ba'i mig mangs ris mdzes par rnam par bros pas

sa'i gzhwapeshin tusnga bar gyur pa/ dngos grub can gyi tshogs rnam par rgyu ba/ bya btsun pa'i khyus sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa byung ba/ bza' shang gar ba bye ba brgya phrag stong gis
mdzes par byas pa/ shin tu skyid cing phun sum tshogs par gnas pa/ skyes pa dang bud med brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang ba/ sar bu bde zhing yid du 'ong bas bskyod de ma tog gi char mang pa
rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'brulab/ sa'i bdag po dam pa brgya phrag stong gi gnas su gyur pa dag ste/ grong rdal chen po de dag gi rin po che'i shange thams cad dang gsar gyi dra ba'i rgyan la sogs

pa rlung gse bskyod de rol mo mang po'i sgra skad snyan pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las yadi du 'ong ba'i tshoge 'ad skad byung ngo// gsolatsaka/ mnobs shagi/ chos la spyod cig/ byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ phyir mi ldog pa'is la

mnga' thob mdzod cig/ khyed rnams bde par gyur cig ces zer ro// rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ra bi'i dbal der khams kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag

brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod do// blon po brgya phrag lnga yod par gyur te/ rgyal bo ner gyi bdag po de la bu lnga brgya yod pa thams cad kyang dpa' ba/ brtul phod pa/ yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan ba/ gzhan gyi sde

rab tu 'joms pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po'i mchog shan tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de'i btsun mor dam pa na pad+mo'i dpal dam pa 'byung ba zhes
bya ba sta/ bud cesad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gnang nas gtso mer bya'o// de'i bu gzi brjid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ khalta na

[H ]lcag pa/ ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gas kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhagi yod pa gyur te/ de la ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'du dug yod par gyur to// de'ang 'di ltar rgyal bu gzhon

nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de rkang pa'i mtha'i shin tu gnas pa dang ldan te/ sa chen bo la rkang pa'i mthil 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la 'deg na mnyam par 'dug ste/ gzhog na rkang pa'i mthil kun gyis sachen po

la mnyam par regago/ de'ang pa'i mah+phale gnyis la 'khor lo rtsashes stong dang ldan pa lte ba dang bcas pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du shin tu tshang ba/ shani du mdzes pa blta na sdug pa dag

kyang byung bar gyur to// de'i rkang pa'i bol gtas kyang shin tu rgyas par gyur to// rkang pa'i steng gi mdog shin tu gso la shan tu mdzes te me tog dam pa bas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing gsal bar gyur to//

de'i rkang lag gsor mo dra bar 'brel bar gyur te/ shin tu mdzad pa'i rnam par phye bar bu ga yod pas zag pa med pa ni/ dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas srung lta bur gyur to// de'i nang pa'i rtang pa yangs pa shin tu

dag pa/ shan tu gsal ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed par grub pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i ser mo rnams kyang ring zhing zlum la tshogs bar mnyam zhing yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ de dag ma/ma

[z ]paras la 'jog go/ mnyam par sa las 'deg go/ de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i meg+hal yang ka tsa la 'da' bas kyang lhag par reg na bde bar gyur te/ des skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u dang/ bu mo gang

la reg kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad bde ba dang yadi dga' ba' dem pas tsham zhang yade bang ba dang yare dga'i ba' dem pas chami 'ang yade shan tu bde bar 'gyur ro// der byin par degs a rgya ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug
par gyur te/ rims kyis gzhol pa dang/ shani tu ma tshes pa dang/ legs par grub par gyur pas ra digs kyi rgyal po e na ya ltar de la sus kyang bsag pa 'am slebs par ma nus te/ 'gro bas ngal zhing dub

par ma 'gyur ro// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi dbang po de bdun shin tu mtho ba dang yang ldan par gyur te/ der rkang pa gnyis lashAn tu mtho ba zlum la shan tu rgyas pa dang/ tshigs mi snang ba dang 1 ni
tu yid du 'ong ba dang/ blta na sdug pa gnyis grub par gyur to// lag pa la gnyapa/ thal gong gi lhun la gas/ ltag pa la gcig ste/ de ltar bdun no// de'i mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa grub par
gyur te// de'i gsang ba' kenus sgrubs na 'dug pashani tum mngon la nang du nub cade kun nas yog par 'dug pa ste/ dperan glang po cang shes sam rta cang shes ltar 'jug pas/ de gos mgyon par 'dug kyang
bud mad dam/ skyas pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rgan pa 'am/ dar la bab pa rom/ bla ma 'am/ bla mar bya ba rnams kyis kyang ma mthong ste/ gzhan du na bdag lengs par spyod pa 'a mched bstan/
[z/ ]@#// par bya ste// 'dod pas spyad pa ni mi gtogs so// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de ro stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa dang ldan par gyur te/ las rim pas rgyas la ro stod shani/
tu yangs shang rdzogs pas/ ra dogs kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par dbyibs shin tu legs pa'i ri skyed dang ldan par gyur to// de'i thal gong rgyas shang lus shani tu rgyas pa/ lus rnam par phye ba/
lus kyi chu thams cad rkyen du 'bab par mnyam pa/ lus la dma' ba med pa/ lus la mtho ba med pa/ lus la zhum pa med pa/ lus la dgu ba med pa/ lus ran po che'i gtan pa shane tu phyas la bas

kyang lhag par gsal bar gyur te/ de dpung mgo shani tu zlum zhingashas rgyas la shan tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur to// des ma chen po'i mtshan lag pa shani tu ring ba thob par gyur pa/des lus

ma btud de lus drang por 'dug kyang pus mo'i lha nga ga/Tis la nyug skyid re go/ des ma chen po'i mtshan lus che zhing drang ba'ang thob par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan la/ lus tshul
dang 'dra par mnyam pa dang lus rab tu mnye na pa dang/ lus shan tu lci ba dang/ lus rab tu gsal ba dang/ lus shani tu sam par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to// des ma chen po'i mtshan mgul dud

lta bu nang thob par gyur te/ ma dmar ba'i mgul dang/ de'i mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang/ bzhin gyi 'khor thams cad ni rtsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shin tu mnyam par gyur te/ kun kyang rab

[za]tutshang bar gyur te// ma chon po'i mtshan song ge'i 'gram pa lta bu 'ang thob par gyur te/ za 'gram nyan tu mkhregs pa dang/ bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang/ bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu legasasharje

yongs su dag pa dang/ kha' sgo shan tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te/ ma chen po'i me tshan so mnyam pa bzhi bcu dang yang ldan par gyur te/ so ma tshang ba med pa la zas shagi za na'ang lan cag blad pas chung du na 'bras chan gyi

'bru 'ga' yang ma zha ba par za ba med do// so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa rab tu thob ste/ mtshamasamu sgo med pa dang/ shani tu mnyam pa dang/ skyon du sha'i dumadzes pa sta/ de kha zasangashagi za na'ang 'go ba dang/ 'chag

pa dang/ zhen pa dang/ ljan ljin du 'gyur ba 'am/ ma thogs par 'gyur ba 'am/ sem 'gang bar 'gyur ba med do// ma chen po'i mchin so mnyam pa rab tu thob par gyur te/ so mnyam zhing nga ngo med pa dang/

so lhag med pa dang/ so zhum pa med pa dang/ so gyes pa med pa dang/ so thog drung mnyam pa dang/ so rdzob mad par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i mchab shAni tu dkar bar gyur te/ mche ba gyonamad pa/ mche ba shan tu

gas la bo/ ma bshani tu dag pa/ mchab shin tu brtan par gyur to// ma chen po'i mtshan lce shani tu yangs pa'i ng thob par gyur te/ de' lcenashin tu yangs la sang tsang ma zhen te/ shin tu 'jam pa dang/ las su

rung ba dang/ yad du 'ong ba dang/ bsgyur na bde ba dang/ gdong gi ngakyil 'khor kun 'gebs pa dang/ bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i don dang/ ya gi dang/ ngag dang/ nges pa'i tshag thogs pa med par rjod par gyur to//

gzhon nu da tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang/ rel me'i sgra dang/ gru'i nga ro dang/ salasnyan gyi dbyangs dang sgra skad dang/ brjod tshangasmra ba' tsheg ga las

[+ ]yadi du 'ong ba brjod pas ngag ga lam mngon par dga' ba bskyed pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dun par 'gyur bar tshangs pa las kyang lhag pa'i dbyangs kyis ngag rjod de/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las kyang gud

tshe du ma 'da' bar thams cad kyi yede dang mthun par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu du na mgi dkar nag 'byes par gyur te/ mgi shani tu dang ba dang/ mag yongs su dag pa dang/ mag la 'od chags pa dang//

mgi rnam par gsal ba dang/ mgi mngon par mdzes pa dang/ mge blta na sdug pa dang/ mig yad du 'ong ba dang/ mig 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nung na rdza mkha' tshe ma ltabu dang ldan par gyur te/

! mgo ga skye mched rin po che pad+ma nAg ltar shun tu dag pa/ mag kaM pAni mnyam pa/ mag ga sngon mtshungs pa/ mag gi sbyin legs pa mag ki sngan yangs pa/ mig gi sngoni rdzogs pa mig gi sprin shin tu

brtan par gyur te// de'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes par gyur te/ 'jam pa/ las su rung ba shin tu ma zhen pa shang bal ltar reg na bde ba/ gsal tha 'od yodapa/ chab rom lta bu/ khaba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa 'od

rer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur to/ de'i spyi ba la gtsug tor mngon par grub par gyur te/ shin tu legs pa/ kun nas zlum pa dbus su bab pa/ skra'i skyon du gyur pa ro bo tshar pad+mo 'dab ma

[za ]bya ba brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa ltar snang ba/ kun nas cha mnyam par gnas pa// rin thang gdab tu tshad med pas gces nga 'a gtsug tu gyur pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de pags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te da de' lus/

la rdul dang dra ma 'am/ rdul lam/ser ka 'am gnyer ma 'am lhod nga 'am/ khums pa 'am/ 'phyang ba 'am/ spyod pag tu gnas pa med par gyur to// gzhon nu de ni mdog gsar gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/

'dzam bu chu klung ga gsar gyi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhang 'od kun tu 'dom gang ba dang/ gser ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rekyil 'kher gyis mdzes par brgyan pa dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhim pa'i 'od zer

'byung bas lus kyi rgyan pa rab rab med tsang 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de na ba spu re rer byung ba dang ldan par gyur te/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ba spu re re skyes par gyur pa/ ba DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog lta bu/

g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba legs par skyes pa mthang la zha bar 'jug pa'i n tu legs par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i spyi yan lag gyen du 'khyil bar gyur to// phyir ma rdzogs pa'i spu dang/ ma ldog

pa'i spu dang/ ma 'dres pa'i spyi dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de ma chen po 'i mtshan skam then mthang du 'dug pa thob par gyur te/ de'i sku nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthonam thang du 'jug ba/ 'jam pa/ snum

pa legs par 'khyil ba/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/ drung shun tu ngan nga 1 thad zed med pa/ 'jam 'jam ltar 'dug pa/ ma 'dzarib/ dbyabs mnyam zhing ma thun par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon
kunu de shang n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i ma chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te/ kun nas rgyun du ran pa dang/ kun tu bzang ba dang/ kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te//
[+ ]de na mdun nas bltas na'ang ngoms mashes shing blta na yad du 'ong la/ rgyab dang/ g.yas g.yon dang 2 'gro ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ 'greng ba dang/ nyal ba dang/ skya ba dang ma
bar 'dug pa la bltas na'ang ngo ma shes shang yang du 'or la blta na sdug par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu rgyal bu gzhon nu gza brjodikyi bdag po re ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gzhas ri de dag gsal
yongs su brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur to/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na yid du ma 'ong 'bag mang pa/ blta na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// phalta na samam nun
thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su 'byung ba de lta bu zhig skyes bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de nas lan gcig cig rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de yab kyis gnang nas/ rgyal

po'i gnas sdong po' re ba'i dpal gyi bza' shang gar pa spos kyi myu gu'i rtsa mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir/ bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan tsag tu bsod

nams kyi gzi brjid kyis dbal dang skal ba bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis byung na// skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshigs kyis kun nas dga' bar bya zhing/ 'dzam bu chu klung ga gsar gyi shing rta rdo rje

ni po che'i 'khor le chen po bzhi dang ldan nga/ rdo rje mkhru bo rmi srog shang sra ba/ tsan dan dam pa las bsgrubs pa' yu ba bzang po dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs kyashange thags rnam

par bskye ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi mi rtog sna tshogs kyis rab tu ma dzes par byos nga/ rin po che thams cad kyi dri bas kun nas yog pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa seng ge 'i khra ri ni bo che dam pa'i rgyan gyi
sAng po can dbus su bshams pa 1 bu mo lnga rgyas 'an po che'i srad bu'i lnga lta nas yongs su bzung ba/ nam mkha' la chags pa med pa'i rlung ltar mgyogs pa' rta cang shes stong la bcag pa la
zhon nas gdugs chen po' rim gyis gzhol zhing blta na sdug pa/ stang g.yog rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUr+ya dkar po las byas pa/ 'od dri ma med pa tshad mad pa 'byung nga/ rin po che khasam gyis ma

khyab pa rmad du byu ba ts+tsha tshogs kun ma cad kyis snga bar smras te rnam pa thamasachar du mdzomapar brgyun ba/ yu ba rin po che'i rgyal po be cha rlu sngon po las sgrung bas ni bskyabs/ srog chags bcu yong na nga tshe sa/

ni yongs su bskor/ rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi rabyangs yang du 'ong ba snyan pa dang ldan pa dag na rab tu blangs/ ma tog gi char chen po ni sengon par 'babe/ lha rdzas kyi sngos dri zhim pa' 'dug snos kyi
snong bye nga khrag log brgya stong gis ma rang tu bdug cing 'gro bar gyur to/ 'de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshalam yang rgyud brgyad dang ldan par gyur te/ mtho dman med pa dang/ gsag ma dang da
[zal ]bya// gyo ma med pa dang/ gsar dngul dang/ni po che'i rgyal bo sna tshogs kyi khams kyis sa gzhi reb tu bsgrub pa dang/ gsar gyi ma bkram pa dang/ rani pe che sna tshogs kyi mi rtog

sa la mas rgyal par gang ba dang/ g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'ashangag 'phrang bas dkrugs pa dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kharan bkye ba dang/ stong nas rin po che'i dra ba bres pa dang/ rin po che gnam
yol snatshogs kyis bkab pa dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa du ma bsrung zhing spyings ngangs mdzes par brgyan pa dang/ g.yas g.yon nas rani bo
cha'i stegs bu'i 'phrang ba rnam par bkod pas rnam par brgyan pa ste/ rani bo che'i stegs bu la la la na slengs mo pa'i phyogs la yongs su bstabs pa'i don du rin po che'asnod sna tshogs kyis yongs su
bkang ba bkod/ stags bu la la la ni rgyan 'dod pa'i slongs mo pa rnams brgyan pa'i don du rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa yongs su bkod/stags bu la lha lan sems can thams cad skya bsam

pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'aphyar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod/ stags bu la la la ni su ru 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don du kha zas dang/ btung ba dang/ bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba'i

snod mang po bkod/ stags bu la la lan rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang/ kha dog dang/ grwa dang brodang/ reg yad du 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi kha zas kyi rnam pa 'akod/ stags bu

la la la na ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi shing thog sna tshogs thams cad spungs/ stags bu la la la na gis 'dod pa rnams yade bzhan du spyod du gzud par phyi'i lha rdzas kyi gos ran po che kha dog

sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mdog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang rami sna tshogs shin tu snga bar rnam par bya ba shin tu btsun pa la 'os pa shani tu phra ba rab tu 'jam pa thags su ma btagasal bye kha/

phrag brgya phrag stong nyid longs su bkod par gyur to// stags bu la la la na byug pa 'dod pa'i sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzung ba'i phyir/ lha rdzasakya spos rnam pa
kha dog dang dri rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa dag bkod par gyur to// stegs bu la la la nasems can rnams bsam pa nga lta ba thazhan du yongs su spyod du gzud pa'i phyir yo byad thams cad
kyi phung po dag bkod par gyur to// stags bu la la la ni na chung gzugs bzang ba/ rab tu mdzes pa/ shin tu sdug pa/ cha lugs sdug gu sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs
ngang ldan pa/ yadi du 'ong ba'i gas sna tshogs gyon pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ byug pa sna tshogs kyis tshul sdug gur brgyan tsang mdzas par byas pa 'a lus dang ldan pa/ bud
med kyi bzo dang/ sgyu dang/ shes nyen gyi tshul la mkhas pa dag bkod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas sdong po rabo'i dpal de nyid na sprul 'tshong ma'i dam pa rgyal po'i longs
spyod du 'os pa blta na mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i bu mo dag ra ba'i 'od kyi dpal shan tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ shin tu mdzes pa 1 blta na sdug pa
ha cang ma rang/ ha cang yang ma thung/ ha cang yang ma sbom/ ha cang yang ma phra/ ha cang yang ma dkar/ ha cang yang ma sngo ba/ ska mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mgi dkaranag 'byes pa//
bzhan yad du 'ong ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa// 'dzam zhing snyan par smra ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ shes zhen kyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa// gtsug lag thams cad la
sa pa brtson pa/ le lo med par rim gro yod pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa// byams pa'i sems bdog pa/ khong khro ba ma mnga' ba/ ngalta na ma ngoms shing yid du 'ong ba/ 'dod chags dang/ nyi

sdang dang/ gti mug chung ba/ ngo tshashes bang khrel yod pa/ drang zhing mnyen pa/ g.yo dang sgyu med pa zhig yod de de ma dang lhan cig tu bu mo du ma zhig gis bskor te rin po che'i shing rta la zhon
nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal nas phyung ste/ rgyal pos bka' stsal nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gatha brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun nas phar rgyal bu gzhon nu de la klur len cing 'dong 'dong
pa las/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzing rjid kyi bdag po mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems shin tu mi bzad pa zhig g.yos te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po shAn tu yid du 'ong
ches nas rjes su 'brang zhing sems la rang dbang med pas/ ma blta na sdug pa la 'di skad ces smras so// ma 'ad ltar mkhyen par mdzod cig/ gal te bdag rgyal bu gzhon nu gaTha brjid kyi bdag
po la ma gtang na na 'gum pa 'am 1 srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal gcig tu 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bu mo ra lta bu'i sems ma skyid cig/ gzhon nu 'di ni 'khor los sgyur pa'i mtshan dang ltan
pa ste/ de'i yab nor gyi bdag po ma bzhug gas par gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod de/ de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bas/ de'i bud med
rin po che nam mkha' las 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyural/ bu mo bdag cag kyang sprul 'tshong ma dag cag ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byed pho yan gyi/ yu bus sems can 'ga'/
zhig la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsAn bkuram byar ma rung ba'ang med de/ yu bu ni rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'abakas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i rim gror 'dong 'dong bar zad kyis/ da lta
bu'i sems brtan par ma byed cig/ gnas de na thos par yang shin tu dka' 'o// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa
zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan

#/ @#// 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i snying po byang chub chos kyi sbyin shan tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'ang bza' shang ga re ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba

de'anang du byung sta/ dar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun len pa de bu mo de shang rta la zhon bzhin du yur zhing 'artog 'chog pa'i

rmi lam du mthong nas sad par gyur pa dang sngon gnyen gshes su gyur pa'i lha mo zhig gis bstan pa/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'am dam pa de na sAde po byang chub chos kyi spyanishAn tu sdug pa'i 'od ces
bya ba na rnam par spyod cing/ thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cade/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnon sbyin dang/ dra ze
dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ 'og min gyi lha'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing bzhugs te/ der sa'i

lha mo dang/ ma' lha mo dang/ rlung ga lha mo dang/ rgya mtsho'i lha mo dang/ chu'i klung ga lha mo dang/ ri'i lha mo dang/ mtshan mo' lha mo dang/ skya rengs 'char ka' lha mo dang nags tshal gyi lha mo dang/

'dang ga lha mo dang/ sman gyi lha mo dang/ lo tog ga lha mo dang/ grong khyer gyi lha mo dang/ rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha mo dang/ snying po byang chub kyi lha mo dang/ lus kyi 'od zer gyi lha mo dang/ sems can gyi
ral kyi lha mo dang/ nam mkha'i lha mo dang/ phyogs thams cad kyi lha mo dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das sku nya ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'jus so zhes nas/ de ltar ngas de bzhi
gshegs pa mthong ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thos pas bag tsha ba med par gyur te skabs su bab nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun du de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
smras so// gzugs kyi mchog gis 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// yon tan rnams kyis thams cad phyogs su yang// shes rab stobs kyis bdag dang 'dra ma mchis// sgyu rtsal dga' ba sgyu
ma'i tshul kun 'tshal// srog chags mang po stong phrag du ma yasi// 'dod chags dbang gas bdag la rab bltas kyang// gzhon nu bdag ni 'jig rten gang la yang// blo ba chags par gyurang
gag ma mchas// sems can gang la'ang zhen par gyur pa 'am// gang la'ang khong khrom bdag gi sems ma gyur/ gang la'ang dgra ma bgyid de zhe ma dang// bdag ni sems can sbya napar dga' ba
lags// sku zhon sku mchog yon tan rab mnga' khyod// gang tshabadag gas grasal bar mthong gyur pa// de tshe dbang po kun kyang nyams su bde// rgya che yangs par shani tu dga' bar gyur// khyod kyi
dbu bzang lcang lor 'khril ba 'am// rin chen rnam snang mdog tu mthon mthing gsal// zhal gyi smone sdug dpral bshangs su mdzes// khyod kyi zhal sngar lus 'di bdag 'bul lo// mtshan gyi
rab 'chang gza brjid che mnga' ba// sku gzugs gsar gyi ra ba bzang po 'dra// khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag lta mi mdzes te// zal du rlog pas snag tsa' gzugs kyang 'dra//
sbyan brtsal rang la dkar nag 'byas pas mdzes// shani tu zhal rgyas seng ge 'i za 'gram can// khyod kyi gsungan thogs pa ma mchis na// gsung mchog mnga' bas bdag na gzung du gsol//
khyod kyi zhal na ljags yangs mnga' ba ni// mdog dmar yangs pa ni chen mchog ga 'od// tshangs dbyangs yan lag mchog gi gsung mnga' bas// gsung zhing 'gro ba rab tu dga' ba mdzad//
khyod kyi zhal na thags bzang tshoms mnga' ba/ dung ltar dri med shin tu rnam par gsal// 'dzum zhing bzhad pa rnam par ston mdzad kyang// skyes bu dpa' khyod 'gro ba dga' bar mdzad// khyod
kyasku la mtshan rab mdzes pa'i rnams// sum cu rtsa gnyis dgachung 'od kyang gsal// sku gzugs bzang bo yongs su des brgyan pas// ma ya debang po 'khor los sgyur bar byon//
kA shani tu rgyas pa chen po' mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'asta/ bam po brgyabargyad pa// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjodi
kyi bdag pos/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shan tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ dbu mo khyod su'i/ khyod la yongs su srung ba na gang zhig yod/ bu mo nga la na gzhan kyis yongs su bzung ba'i
bud med bdag gir byar ma rung ngo zhes nas/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// blta sdug gzugs kyi yon tan legs ldan pa// mtshan bzang bsod rnams rnam par dag pa las/
khyed la dra ba'i don 'di nga la smos// lus mchog khyod ni su yas yongs su bzung// khyod la pha dang ma na yod dam med// khyim thabs mad dam khyod na su zhig dbang/ kazugasamadzes khyod la sems
can gzhan nam cagi/ bdag gi yan par 'du shes byed med dam// khyod kyi yodi na gsod la ma de ga' grang// gzhan las ma byin 'phrog par mi byed dam// 'dod pas log par g.yam la ma dga'
grang rdzun du brjod smar yadi na mi mis sam// khyod kyi blo gros mdza' dbyen ma 'jug gam// tshag bar ng gzhan la gnod par ma skya grang// gzhan gyi nor la chags par sems med dam// 'gro ba
rnams la gnod par ma sims grang// lta bar 'brog dgon lam du ma zhugs grang// las kyi rgyud la ye brngam sems med dam// g.yo bdog skya ya dbang du ma 'gro 'am// ma 'thad 'jig rten
gnod par ma byed grang// pha ma gnyanadang mdza' bshes bla ma la// sra zhu ram gro bya'i tshul 'chang ngam// 'thos par gyur pa yongs su bsdu don du// khyod kyi yid la sbyin par sems yong dam//
chos dang mthun pa dus su 'dems byed cing// lus dang sems yadi yongs su dag byed la// yang dag las su rung ba skyed byed pa'i// dge bshes rnams la dga' bar sems khong dang//
sas rgyas rnams la rami gror byed ldan nam// sangs rgyas sras la dga' mchog yod dam med// gang las bde gshegs sras rnams skur 'gyur ba'// chos kyi dem
[A ]de ni shes ma shes// chos yid mchog la gnas par khyod byed grang// chos min spyad pa'i blo gros meng grang ngo// legs pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho la// gus pa' su zhu dga'
sa mas mchog yod dam// skye bo mgon pad 'phongs par gyur pa ya 'baden pa'i rnams la byams pa' yad yod dam// ngan song 'gro ba'i las zhugs pa ya ]/shin tu nyam thag hAng
rjesams spang ngo// gzhan gyis phun sum tshogs pa mthong 'gyur na// khyod na dga' bas mchog dang ldan 'gyur ram// skya bo nyon mongs rnams kyis 'khol gyur la// shes bamathu bsnyad
btang snyoms byed ma byed// marigs gnyid leg skye bo mang mthong na// byang chub dam par smon lam 'debs byed grang// bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod pa na// smon lam dag pas skya bar ma
de nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyas pa' ma sprul 'tshong ma'agatso me blta na sdug pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so//

tshe gzhon nu bdag gi bu mo 'dan rdzus te byung ba pad+mo'i nang nas skyes pa ste/ sngon chad khyim gyi nang nas phya rel tu ma byung ngo zhes nas/ pa'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// bu mo 'dal khyod kyis
gang smras pa// de na bdag gis rim pas khyod la brjod// ji ltar bu mo 'ad spyis bskyad bskyed pa// bdag gis khyod la gsol gyis gsan du gsol// gang tshe dgungs ngas khyod na bltams gyur pa//
de tshabadag ga bu mo 'di skyes te// rdzus te dri med pad+mo'i sbubs nas byung// yan lag kun tshang mig yangs 'dayang skyes// dus kyi nang na sos ka dus mchog la// sman dang me tog smyu gu 'thon pa'i
tshe/ sA la'i re ba bzang zhing rab mchog tu// bdag na rtsa dga' de khrodamamamachi ste// sna tshogs yal ga' le ma rgyas gyur cing// zhugs shang me tog sdug rgyas sprin gyi mdog/ bya branasna tshogs
sgra snyan zhugs shing nang/ nags khrod mya na ma mchis dkar Na sa mchis/ rgyan dang ldan zhing shin tu yid 'ong la// rin chen rad sna tshogs 'tshal ba'i rnams// rol mo glu la shani
tu bslabs nga ya/ bu mo brgya phrag brgyad dang bdag kyang ldan// ltos mchog ldan pa'i pu tsA ra ka dang// rdzange 'gram me tog sil mas bltams pa ya/ sa phyogasad na bud med mang
po dang// bdag cag de na dga' bar mchas mchis na// chab dbus de nas rin chen pad+mo'i mchog/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa byung bar gyur// lo ma rin chen yu ba bai DUrma// sAng po 'dzam
bu chu klung gsar las pagyis// spos mchog rin chen dam pa'i re ba can// 'od chen 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan kun tu 'phro// de tshe dgung la gdugasashag shar tam zhes// skye bo kun kyang yade
nga// gas 'tshal bar 'gyur// dgung sangs gyur nas pad+mo chen po de// gdugs kyi 'od kyis rab tu rgyas bgyis nas// snang ba de dang sgra snyan rab kyang bkyi/ 'di 'byung de
sngon gyi ltas su byung// bud med rin chen 'di 'dra 'jig rten du// tshul khrims dam pa rnam par dag pas byung// sug las bgyis pa chab 'tshal ma 'gyur bas// 'di na sngan chad legs
par spyod pa'i 'bras// sku na mthon ma Tang mig yas ut+pa la// rmongs pa'i dbyangs ldan kha dog rnam dag ldan// 'phrang ba rgyun mchog lugs kyi dbyibs su bas 3/ dpal ltar dra med pa tsa'i
mchog las skyes// lus na rnam dag yan lag rkyen du mnyam// lus kyi dbyibs legs yan lag yongs su tshung// gsar gyi gzugs la nor bus phyis pa 'dra// phyogs kun 'od kyis
rnam par gda' bar gsal// lus las tsan dan rgyal po'i spos kyi dri// phyogs su rgyas par 'ad ya lus las 'byung// sgra snyan lha rdzas yadi du 'ong rjod tshe// kha nas ut+pa la yi ngang kyang
ldan 'dan gang tshe 'dzum zhing dgod pa'i tshe// rol mo'i sgra snyan de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur// bud mdarin chen 'jig rten 'dir byung ste// tha mal kun gyi dbang du 'gyur ma lags// khyod ma gtogs
par ma yi 'jig rten na// 'di yi bdag po gzhan na gcig ma mchis// mtshan rab brgyan pa'i sku gzugs mdzes mngar ba// khyod kyi zhal sngar bu mo 'di bzhes gsol// 'di ni ha cang ma
rang ma gling ste// ha cang ma sbom ha cang phra ma lags// lto na gzhu 'dra nu mngashas kyang rgyas// yan lag skyon bral 'du ni khyod la 'os// grangs dang yi ge shes bgyi tshul rnams dang// ga
brda'i tshul dang gtsug lag tshul la mkhas// 'jig rten kun na bzo rnams ji snyed pa// ma lus de la 'ad na pha rol phyin// mda' gzhu'i tshul la'ang rnam pa rgyus su mkhas// 'khong ga
tshog rnam par nges par rtogs// dgra yadi bzho zhing dbab pa kun la yang// 'di ni mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur// lus rnams kun nas rin chen rnam dag pa'i/ 'od ma chog 'khor rgya
gni tu mdzes pa ste// sngon gyi legs pas shin tu sdug par brgyan// 'di ni khyod kyi phyag rjed khyod la 'os// ma ya 'jig rten gnas rnams ji snyed pa// de dag gso ba'i tshul gyi tsho
'tshal// de dag ma lus thams cad zhar bgyi na'ang// ma nor sman gyi tshogs gsol mkhas// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan skad rnams thams cad dang// skye bo'i nges tshag ma lus bye brag dang//
'jig rten tha snyad brjod pa'i mtshams sbyar ba// sna tshogs kun la'ang 'di na pha rol phyin// dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par b+b+hagab pa'i tshul// de dag bye brag tshul la'ang rab tu zhugs//
'jig rman glu gar rnam pa ji snyed pa// ma lus de rnams kun gyi tshul yang 'tshal// rol mo sal snyan dag gi thabs rnams dang/ ' bzhi d gad rol mo'i tshul la rnam par mkhas// chags dang ma chags ma
bya@#// rnams mngon 'tshal kyang// khong khro chags par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// 'jig rtan bud mang sgra rnams ji snyed pa// khyad par nangs su de la ma lus ratsal// bu mad skya
bo'i skyon du bgyi ba'i rnams// grangs med de dag 'du la gcag ma mchis// thel gyis blta dang zur gyis blta ba dang// yan lag bltabs dang yan lag rnam bstan dang// shes 'on kun la
mkhas pa'i mthar phyin te// khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid// 'di na phrag dog ser snum mchus te/ 'dod pa chen du ma ldang sngog ma bgyid// bzod tsang drang la ma'an zhing

des pa ste// ma khri ma brlung shin tu mkhas pa lags// ldang ba'i ngang tshul yad du 'ong ba'i ngag/ rtag tu bla ma'i thugs dang sbyor ba ste// sku nyams gar bde la zhing sra tshuche// khyod kyi spyod
mthunarjes bsags tshul dang mthun// rgas shang gdug dang nad dang ldan pa dang// 'phongs pa shani tu sdug bsngal gyur pa rang// mag dang bral zhing mgon skyabs ma mtshes la// 'di ni snying
brtse rtag tu skyid pa lags// 'dra na rtag tu gzhan don sems la brtson// bdag la sman pa sems par bgyid ma mchis// 'jig rten kun la sman par dga' ba ste// rlabs chen sems kyi
yon tan kun gyis brgyan// mchis sam nyal lam mchi'am 'greng yang rung// smra 'amam smra 'dzum zhing dgod kyang rung// rtag tu bag mchas dran pa shes bzhin te// 'di ni 'jig rnan kun
kyis rtag tu bsngags// bsod nams ldan pas kun tu rnam par snang// 'gro ba kun kyang rtag tu dga' ba ste// 'ad la lta bas 'jig rten ngoms ma 'gyur// 'ad ni gang la'ang chags par 'gyur
ma mchis// dge bshes rnams la sa zhu 'dachi ste// de dag mthong bar rtag par rab tu dga'// rjes su ci 'byung lta zhang skyon med tshul// sems bdag brtan pa ra rab ra dang 'dra/ 'di ni
bsod nams mchog gis rtag tu brgyan// ma mdza' dgrar len 'od la yong ma mchis// 'di yang shis 'dra bud med gcig ma mchas// rgyal sras khyod la 'ad na tshul dang mthun/
de nas rgyal bu gatra brjod kyi bdag po bzar shang ga ra ba smos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sman 'byung bar phyin te/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpalashAn tu sbyangs pa'i ma sbal 'tshong ma'i
gtso mo blta na sdug pa'i mdun du bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ de

bas na ngas thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs na tshang med pa zhig bsags par bya dgos/ bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med pa zhig tu byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa sbyang de/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad na yongs su rdzogs par/
bya dgos/ phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mur thug par na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya dgos te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa ni yongs su gzung bar bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
'agla// cang na yongs su sbyang bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni ma gcad par bya/ sems can gyi rgyud thams cad na yongs su smin par bya/ sems can thams/
cad kya 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ni rnam par bzlog par bya// mtha' las rgal bar bde ba la na sims can rab tu dgong par bya/ sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mgi na longs su dag babya/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa la ni brtson par bya byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la na gnas par@#/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni yongs su
bsgrub par bya/ sems can gyi khams thams cad na yongs su sbyang bar bya/ sems can thams cud kyi 'drongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir bdag gi nor thams cad na gtang bar bya phyi

ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha zas dang btung ba'i sbyin pas na sems can yongs su tshim par bya/ yo byad kyi dngos po thams cad yongs su btang ba/
naslob ma'i tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par bya dgos te/ de ltar ng bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la nan tan nyams su lenapa'i tsho/ phyi nang gi dngos po gang ci'ang rung sta/ yongs su mi
N+NaM gtang bde lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang/ bu mo dang/ chung ma'ang sbyin par bya dgos/ mag dang/ mgo dang/ rkang lag dang/ yan lag dang/ 'ang lag thams cad kyang yongs su gtang dgos na/
zhi/ de'i tshe khyod gzhan la byan na nga'i than pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro/ bu yang du 'ong bu yongs su btang na yadi ma dga' bar 'gyur ro// lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal yang mang po zhig nyams su
myong bar 'gyur ro// nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar byas na ser sna'i sems su 'gyur ro// nga'i yan lag dang 'ang lag gtubs shing/ slongs mo pa rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/ yid mi dga'
par yang 'gyur ro// nam zhig ngas khyod bor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bar de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de/ de'i tshe'ang khyod yad ma dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/
rgyal bu gzi brjid bdag pos de'i tshe bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ngas ni 'gro kun sang rje rab bskyed de// yun ring mchog nas byang chub
rab bzhugs pas// yang dag byang chub tshogs chen rgya mtsho'i rnams// tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos// bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par// mkha'
ltar tshad med smon lam rnam sbyangs shing// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa' sa ya rnams// bskal pa mtha' yas yongs su sbyang yang dgos// rgyal ba dus gsum byung ba thams
cad kyi// pha rol phyin pa'i lam la sa bslabs te// ye shes bla na med pa' tshul chen rgyas/ byang chub lami mchog rnam par sbyang yang dgos// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams thams
cad kyang// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang ba' bya// 'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang// ngan song kun kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so// nyon mongs
bsgribs shing gtimug mun 'thoms pa'i/ sems can kun kyang ma lus rnam sbyang dgos// sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyang byas te// thams cad mkhyen lam tshul la dgodakyag
dgos// chags medus rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te/ bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya// 'gro ba ma lus kun la byams bskyed de// 'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos/
slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongasa mthong nas// thams cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson 'gyur na// de tshe khyod ni nga sems mi mthun te// zhumazhing dma' la 'jungs par mi 'gyur ram/ ngas
mgo 'dod 'ongs pa ngas mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodagyur na// de tshekhyongani sdugabasngalagadungs 'gyur gyis// 'di 'dra'i donadzes rab tu brtan par gyis// nga yi rkang lag gtubs

pa mthong gyur na// khyod ni mi dga'ade tshe dge slong la bud med ngang gi tshig drag mi bzod la// don 'dithos shing sams la yongs su soms// 'phangs pa'i dngos dang de bzhinab rnams dang// khyod kyang
slongaba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyis// den 'di thos te mi dga' medan lta// khyong ngaga' thams cad de bzhin bya la thag/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dang la
shin tu sbyangs pas/ rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu ji skad gsung ba de lta2bgyi'o// bdag ni khyod ci ngagyes pa dang/ ci bzheng par longs spyod pa dang/ gang
du dgyes pa'i mab dang/ thams cad du'ang sladon ma las par rjes su 'brang ba dang/ rtagangu zhama'ang sleb pa dang/ don thams cad la brtson pa dang/ thugs dang mthun par spyod pa dang/
mang par nyams su blang ba dang/ mi mthun pa mamachis par nan tan du bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o zhes nas// bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi ngapal shin tu sbyangs pas/ rgyal po'i
sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcang de smras pa/ bangagaka lus 'di sems can ngamyal ba yi// zhugs kyis yongs ka dungs zhu ba'agyur kyang rung// khyed spyongaskal ba mnyam pa'i phyagarjed/
du/ tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gis ljobar bgyi// tshe rabs mtha' yas skyes pa re re zhing// bdag gi lus ni shin tu gtubs gangashugs kyang 2 brtan ngam sems kyisa'ab tu spro bar bgyi/
ngang dge khyod kyis bdag gi khyim globs mdzod//khor tshug cu yis bskal pa la tha' yas su// bdag gi mgo ni yongs su btags gyur kyang// sems mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyi//
khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thabs mdzod// khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du// bdag la thugs brtan thugs kyis mnga' mdzad de/ de yan lagasha gtubs
gzhan la stsalab mdzod// khyed kyi chos la bdag kyang brtan gzhag gsol// bdag gi lus ni smad na ma las par// skyes buwa yi sras po khyod la dbul// bskal
pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshi// skye boslong ba rnams l dgyes par sel// sems can kun la thugasaN+Damatha' yasang// bskyed de sems can rgya mtsho bsdu slad du// byang chub dam pa
mchog tu khyod zhugs pas// de skad bdag kyang thugs rjes gzung ba mdzod// longs spyod don dang nor gyi don ma lags// 'dod spyod dga' ba bskyed pa'i don slad du// sems can mchog
khyod khyor 'tshalam lags kyi// khyod dang spyod pa mthun par spyad smad ngu'o// spyan gsal mdzes shing byams pa'i thugs mnga' ba// khyed ni 'jigarten gzigs par tshul las// thugs
rje che yi 'dod chags thugs mi mnga'// ngo las thub dbang 'gyur ba gangonami'atshal// khyod kyi zhagasakyis bcags pa'i sa rnams kyang// dri med rin chen 'od du gnas pa las// khams/
gsum kun tu 'khor los sgyur bar yang/ mtshan 'ab yongs kyis brgyanabyon ngon mi 'tshal// bdag gis g.yar las mthong ba dgung zhigal// chos bzang na'od byang rlung sAng po yi//
shing dbang drung na de bzhin gshog pa bzhugs// sangs rgyas srasamang du masamadun du bdar// rgyalaba'i dbang po sku mchog ldem de// 'dzamabu chuklung ni chen 'tshe'i ba 'dra// g.ya'a'am
mthong bar phyag gis bdag byugs to// de nas sad nas gro ba rab tu dga'// dga' ba'i 'od ces bgyi ba rnam dag bus// sngon chad gnyen bshes gyur pa'i lha mo yis// bdag la bstan pa
bde gshegs de klong ni// snying po yang dag byang chub yangs la bzhugs/ sngon yang gzhon nu gzibarjid khyed palta zhes// bdag gi sems bskyed de ltar bsams par gyung// mdang sum dgung la/
ldanod dge ba yis// gzhon nu de ni mthong bar 'gyur zhes bstan// bdag gi bde gshegs g.ya' lam rmis pas mthong// yongs su dag pa'i rims mno nga kyang mthong yong bzhanabasama'aphrib/
khyod dang bdag bcas pa sa// de 'ang rgyal ba de la mchod pa 'bagyi// de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyim ma pa'i ma tsha thesate sangs
rgyas blta bskabs byung nas// dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po skyes te// bumo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpa' shin tu sbyangs pa la nor bu zhe po che lnga brgyas mngon par gtor nas/ gtsug
lag gi rin po che dpal gyi 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba'ang de la byashe no// me'i mdog ltar 'dug pa'i no'abu rin po che dam pas brgyan pa'i gos 'anye po chos kyang de bkab bo// de de ltar 'am krer byas
kyang dga' bar gyur pa 'am/ 2mas bde bar gyur pa lta bu 'ang med la dga' ba dang mos par yong mgyur gyi/ gzhan ngun thal mo sbyar cing mig mi 'gebs par gzhon nu gzi ba rjod
bdag gi gdong la lta zhing gnas par gyur to// bdag gi gdang la rtazhangan/ de nas sprul 'chongama'i gtso mo blta na sdug pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzibarjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su/
khacang de smras pa// bu mo 'di ni khyod gsol bgyisnyam nas// yun ringesasnga nas bdag gis bsam bsam ste// gzugs mdzes de yang de ring khyod la phul// bsod nams legs brgyun
yon tan rab dang ldan// tshul khrims blo dang yon tan gzhan gyis kyang// bu mo dam pa 'di dang 'dra ba'i// mi yi 'jig rten gang na'ang ma mchis te// 'jig rten kun gyi bud med nang na mchog
pad+mo'i sbubasanas skyes pas rigs smosasu// skyon gyi dri sa ma gos 'thad ma lags/ de ma lus skyon gyis ma gos sems dang ldan// rtag par khyod kyi spyod tshul mthun par 'gyu5//
reg na bde la kun nas 'phags pas na// 'di yi lus shin tu'ang ma pa ste// bro'atshalan du pa gang la reg grub kyang// de yi mod la blo dang bral bar 'gyur// 'di yi lus las spos kyi ngad
'byung ba// spros mchog gzhan rnams mngon par zil gyis gnon// de yi dri zhim tsho'an rnam dgapa'i/ tshul khrims gnus par mi rnams kun kyang 'gyur// 'di yi lus gser
gyi mchog 'dra ste// pad+mo'i mchog ltar rnam par rab tu gas2// khos pas bltas na byams pa'i sems ldan par (sems tshanamalus kun kyang rab tu 'gyur// 'di yi tshig snyan
yid du 'ong ba ste// nyams su bde bar 'gro bat+tan par dga'// thos na de rgyus skyon gyimun pa 'angang// mi dgeTisug las bgyid pa mos ma 'gyur// 'di ni bsam dag yid la dri mang de//
la de la kun du g.yo dang sgyu mamachis// myi sna de dag yang la'ang de bzhin te/ tshig dbyangs nges ni 'gro b.rim par bgyid// sbya yisasems can 'drid par mi bgyid de/ nor gyi don du 'gro
yong sa mi spu// yid basdoms khrel gyis mdze dang ldan pa ste/[t48]ma gzhon lu'ang Na ga tu sri zhu du// rigs rgyud gzugs kyisadregs pa ma mchis// 'di ni 'khor gyis dregs
nga 'ang yong ma mchis// nga rgyal rlom sems yongasadang bral bste 'gro ba rnams la rtag tu kupar 'dud// de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bu mo ngaga'aba' 'od kyi
dpal shin tu sbyangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dung/ 'khor thams cad dang gnas par bza' shing gi na ba sos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo nas 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba dems byung sto/
stong po byang chub chos kyi 'phags pa'i 'od gang na ba der/[·]bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagangshegs pa sku zhi mdam pa gang na ba der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi mdum pa tsha zhal
blta ba dang/ de la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur ba'i phyirangong ste/ de rta bab sa'i bar du bzhon pa sasong nas babasati/ rkang pas bcom ldan 'angs do
bzhin gshegs pa sku 'um dam pa'i drung du song ngo/ de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyibadag pos rgyang nga zhi gnas / bcom ldan 'das de ba'i gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag bab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu bzang ba/ ba lta na sdug pa/ dbang po zhib/ thugs zhi ba/ dbang po bsdams pa/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/
mtsho ltard zhing rogapa med la// rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo// de ltar mthong nas de'i sems mngon par mos par gyurato// de ltar sems mngon par mos par gyur nas/ sangs
rgya sa mthong ba'i dga' ba dang mas pa'i shugasachen po rnam par spel te[） ]dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ blob chun pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das rjes brgya
stong du mar g.yas phyob sasu bskor byas nas/ bu ma dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal babadu phyes pa la sogs pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la spyi

bos phyag 'tshal te/rin po che ma pa'i pad+mo stong phrag lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par gtor te/ ro ldan 'das po'i gtsug lag khang lnga brgya nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po saMsalcatshogs las
byas pa/ zhi po ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa lnga brgyabartsigasaso/ dgatshug lag khang re re zhing yang nor bu rin po che'irgyal po stong phrag lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan to/
[z/]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas/ gzhon nugazibarjid kyi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ mdo sde sgo kun du lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yang dag pa bstan

do des de thos nas chos thams cad kyi tshul la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu thob par gyur te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin gyisnyo'abatu thob bo// dus gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab du thob po// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/

gyi sgo rab tu thob bo// sems sun 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu snang par bya ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo// 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i yongashes kyi snang bal

zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob be// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa snyang ba'isgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'gatu thob bo// 'gro ba thams cad

yongs su bskyab pa'i ye shes kyi sprin cesabya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba la mngon du gyur pa'i sgromam zhes bya ba'i tang ngo 'dzin
gyi sgo'abatu thob bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sku rnam par dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po// kun tu bzang pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil
khug/ 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam gyi sngad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'ab tu thob go/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa/ chos kyi tshul

thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu 'badu thob par gyur to// bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin du sbyangs pas kyang shesathub par dka' ba rgya mtsho tshosnying po zhes bya ba'i sems nges
par gzhag pa'i rab tu thob ngang gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyi'i mi ldog par gyur to/ de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa sku zhi ma ngam pa'i zhabs gtis la spyi bos phyag 'tshul te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasasu bskor ba byas nas/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dbal
tu sbyangs pa dang/ 'khor thams cad dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sn gnas dong ngo// de nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal gang na ba dang/ rgyal bo yab
ra gyi bdag po gangs ba der dong ste drung du phyin nas/ rgyalapo ma bskor gyi bdag po'i rkang paganyis la spyi bos phyug 'tshal te don 'di brjod do// lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyimadam pa zhes bgyi ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
00 smanamed pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ khyed kyi khams 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin/
shin tu sdug pa'i 'od na rnam par sbyodade mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas nga po ma lags so// de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces sa so//
gzhonan khyod la don 'di lha'am/ mi 'am/ su zhig gsan/ des smras pa// bdag la bu mo dga' ba'i 'od shin du sbyangs pas sbran to// de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag
pos sangs rgyas byung bar thos nas/ sangs rgyas skye bal ni gter rab tu thob pa tsam du sems/ sangs rgyas rin po che dang phrad par ni dka' bar sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa
mthong bas na ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par ldog par sems/ nyon mongs pa'i nad chen po rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang phrad pa tsamadu
sems/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grel pa yin pa'i sems/ shin tubade zhing ldan pa la ni rab tu gzhogapar sems/ rab rib med pa'i ye shesakyi snang ba'i yang
dag par ston par sems/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bal sgron me chen po byung ba tsam du sems/ 'jig rten mgon med pa las ni chos kyi tshulamakon dang phrad par sems/'jig rten 'dren pa/
gu/ med pa lasani thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pas 'dren pa skyes par sems shing sangs rgyas byung bar thos pas mos pa dang ljob chen po skyes nas/ rgyal
[+ ]rigasadang/ bram ze dang/ ljongs kyi mi dang/ yul mi dang/ blon po dang/zham ring ba dang/ gzhon nu ngang/ rgyal phran dang/ khams kyi bdag po dang/ 'khor thams cad kyang kun nas bsdus

nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i sgra snyan pa sgrog pa'i gzhon nu gzibarjid kyi bdag po rgyal po'i srid de'ang chos kyi dga' bar byin no// de ltar gzhon nu de rgyal srid la dbangabaskur nas/ srog chagasastong phrag
bcu dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku la dam pa gang na ba der song ste spyan sngar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das
de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rang gi 'khor dang bcas te 'khod de/denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
ba skat+tim dam bas 2 rgyal po nor gyi bdag po dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas/ de'i tshe mdzod rjes 'od zera'agro bathams cad kyi sgronam zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o//
des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon sum du bkod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mikhyab pa yongs su bstenate/
sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ lhag ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs nas 1 de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus/ sangs
rgyas kyi sku'ajig rten thams rud lasaman par 'phags pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyang sakyi yan lag rgya mtshothams cad dang ldan pas[？ ]gzungs kyi sgo chos thamasarud la rab 'ab
mad pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ gzungs kyi sgosangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdulangashin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to// de nas rgyal po noragyi bdag pos gzungs kyi skud
thos nas/ chos thams cad la chos kyi snang ba chen poskyes par gyur to// 'khor de'i byang bsems dpa' 'dzam bu gling ka rdulangashin tu phra ba sted kyis kyang/ chos thams cad la rab 'ab med
pa'i don gyi sgron ma'i gzungs rab du thob par gyur to// khrag khrig drug cus ninyi bar len pa mod par thag pa las sems rnam par grol/ srog chags stong phrag sa chos rnams la chos kyi
mog rdul dang/ bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur te// sems can grangs med pa zhig gsani/ sngon buma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed pa yongs su bskyed
de[：] phyogs bcur yang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasasu bstan pa des/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med patheg pa gsum kyis rdul bar
denas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po chos kyi snang bar ba tu thob pa de de'i yid la 'di snyam ste/ khyim na gnas pas ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyang khong du chud

[A ]par mi nus la/ ye shes rnam pa 'di ltabu'ang bsgrub par mi nus kyis/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'angasakyi zhamajing du rab tu 'byung ngosnyam nas/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag bos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces
rgyu gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'ab 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi tshul lamachis par ci gnang zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das des baka' stsal ba/
rgyal po chen po de'i dus la dbab par shesan rung ngo// de nas rgyal po lo gyi bdagaposrog chags stong phrag bdudang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pasku nyil dam pa'i zhabarang du 'ang tu byung ngo
de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gzungasakyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgronam zhes bya ba de 'khor dang bcas par yongs su bsgrubasaso// bsgoms so [”]shin tu
bsgomasaso// de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'ang rab tu thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu'ang 'ab tu thob bo// tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i tshul rgya mtsho/
la 'ang yang dag par zhugs par gyur te// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro bar thogs pa med pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa'i ng rab tu thob ste/ des
bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi 'khor la yang dag par blangs so// yongs su gzung ngo// gtam gyi skyes bu'ang byas so// chos sA ba chen po'ang byas so// bstan pa yongasasu
bzung ba'ang byas so// mngon par shes pa thob pa'i stobs kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khamasathams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems cad rnams la lus yongs su
bstananas/ sangs rgyas byung ba de rab tu brjod pa dang/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid mngon par brjod pa dang/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa de dag
yongs su brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i mathu de dag yongs su brjod par bya bas bstan pa yongs su bzung ba byas so// rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag

bos kyang de'i nyin par zla ba 'a ste rgyas pa'i tshe rin po che bdun rab tu thobaparagyur te/ de khang pa'i steng na bud med kyi tshog sakyis bskor cing 'dug pa'i mdun du 'khor le' po che chen po shugs
la thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba rtsibasastong phrag brgya dang ldan pa/ napo che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar las grub pa/ 'od kun tu 'byung ba rnam pa'i mchog

thams cad dang ldan pa byung bar gyur to/glang po rin po che sna chen po rdo rje'in po che'iri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byung bar gyur to// rtan po 'a sngo chung gi shugasashesabya ba byung bar gyur to// nor bu/
zhe po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po 'od sprin rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to// bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa de'ang bud med rin po che'abyung bar gyur te/

khyim bdag rin po che nor gyi phung po mang po zhes bya babyung bar gyur to// blon po rin po che'i mig drim med pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te de ltar bdun no// de de ltar rin po che bdunadang ldan pa'i rgyal po 'khor

los sgyur ba gling la dbang nga tshos dang ldan pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal bo rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ yul thu dang brtson 'grus su ldan par gyur te/ de la bdapa' la brtul phod cing yan lag
dam nga'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde thub tu 'joms pa stong yod par gyur te/ des sa chen po 'di skyon med pa dang/ dgra med pa dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ 'a ba med pa dang/
skyid pa dang/ phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo gas pa dang/ mdangs dga' ba dang/ skye bo'i mi mang pos yongs su gang ba'ang ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i chos kyis
mngon par rgyal te gnas par byas so// des 'dzam bu'i gling de'i gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag tu'ong rgyal po'i gnas te der gtsugalag khang lnga brgya lnga brgya byed du btsud de/ thams
cad kyang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go 1longs spyod dang yo byadakyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa bstag go/bza' shing gir ba dang/ khang pa dang/ 'chag sa
dang/ dus thams cad du bde bar spyad pa'i nags tshal kyi 'phreng bas brgyan pa sha stag go/gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs pa ni lhun gyis rgya
shin tu che bar byas pa ste te nang rin po che rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshog sakyis rnam par spras pa ngasha stag ste/ rgyal po'i gnas de thams cad du'ang bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa 'khor dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par bya ba'i phyer san drangs so// rgyal po'i gnas de dag kun tu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pas mchod de/ sangs rgyas grong khyer du gshegs pa'i 'phrul dang/ rnamakha' 'phrulapasasems can tshad med pa dag/
ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir gshegs su gsol te/ der yang sems can ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni dad pa thob par gyur te/ dud pa dang ldan pa'isems can rnams ni
sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phal bar gyur to/ dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'al ba'i sems can ni byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pathob par gyur to// byang chub
kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems can rnams ni snying rje chen posasems skyes par gyur to// sems can la phan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams nisangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong
su btsal ba la brtson par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams zhi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par khong du chud par bya ba'i
phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to// chos mnyam parted la zhugs pa'i sims can rnams ni dus gsum mnyamapanyid la 'jug pa'i phyir sems mngon pa'i gazhol ba'agyur to// dus gsum gyi
shes snang ba thob pa'i sems can rnams nisangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu ba rgyud pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i don du yugs snang ba la zhugs 'gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pasna tshogs
rnam par dmigs par bya ba la zhugs nga 'isams[44]mas ni 'gro ba thams cad yongasasubasdu ba'i don du sems mngon pa'i gazhol bar gyur to// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la
brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pa'i phya ba'i phyir lam skyed pa'i gyur to/ lamagyemanyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems[4] rnams ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir yoshes snang bskyed par gyur to// chos rgya mtsho rnam par dbye ba lamos ba'isamasacan sani zhing gi dra ba thamasacad

tshe/ rangagilus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i don du sems mngon par gzhol ba'agyurato// zhingamanyam pa khyed la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams nasems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pab bya
ba'i phyir na lam 'debs par gyur te// 'gro bathams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dapyad pa la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud/
par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa rnam bar dag par gyur to// semamana rnam pa de lta bu dugagi don rnam pa de lta bu dag 'grub par 'gyur ba mthong nas/ rgyal po gzi brjid kyi bdag posasangs rgyas kyi rnam
par 'phrul pa dang/ glo 'phrulabasam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pas/ sems can de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i don du rgyal po'i gnasadedag thams cad du do bzhin gshegs pa/
u rkyemadamabagshegs su gsol to// rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dusan rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur pade gzhan zhig yin pa tsam

du sems na ni khyed kyis de lta'amathalta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu gzibarjidakyi bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur bu'i rgyal
srid la dbang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pasku nyam dam pa la bsnyen gakun byed byed pa de yin no// rigs kyi bu de la dri snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyalapo nor gyi bdag po gzhon nugazi brjid

kyi bdag po'i yab du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems nani de ltar mi bltaste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od ces byab ni/ de'i tshade'i dus na rgyal po nor gying dag po zhes byabar
'gyur pa ste/ da lta0shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi

[+/ ]dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs bstanagyi sprin ces bya ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbu ma dus gsum rab tu snang ba'i 'an po che'i rgyal po yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyes shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi

khams sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi sgronamazhes bya ban/ nying po byang chub thams cad la dbang ba'i lus 'ab tu snang ba zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dumazho
par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis bskor cing saston to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rinapo che'i 'od
sa bya ba des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' gzugs bstan du snang ba'i sprin yongs su dag par mdzad de/ 'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho der de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po ches
togagi 'ongades sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'itsho bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smin par mdzad pa sha stag go/ rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du

ba la/sems/ de'i tshade'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun ma pad+mo dpal gyi snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba byungaSha/ gzhon nu gzibarjid kyi bdag po'i yum du gyur pa bud med stong phrag brgyad cu rtsabazhi'i
gtsumer gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam dusems n nidi ltar mi blta ste/ rigasakyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi yumalha mo sgyum byang chub sems dpa'i skyed skyed pa/ rnamobar thor pa kun du snang
zhing sgrib pa med pa la rab tu gnas pa/ 2 sngon de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrub nga mngon du gyur nga/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa 'di'i/ de'i

tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i btsunamo dam pa pad+mongang la gyi snying po 'byung gzhes bya bar gyur to// bags kyi bu de la drisnyam du sems/ de'i zla re'i dusan sprul 'tshong ma'i gtso mo balhan sdug
pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems n nide ltar mi blta ste/ shAkya lag na 'khar ba'i chung ma kho mo'i ma mig mdzes shes bya ba 'di ni/ tshedi'i tshe de'i dusanasprul 'tshong ma'i gtso
mo blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba'agyur to// rigs kyi bu de la jisnyam du sems/ de'i de'i dus na bu mo dga' ma'i 'od shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems nuni
de ltar mibalta ste/ kho men de'i tshe de'i dus na sprula'atshongama'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems 'i tsho de'i
dus na rgyal bokazi brjid kyi dag po'i 'khor nga rgyu' ba de rnams gzhan dag cig yin pa tsam du sems n ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar m bat+ta ste/ bcom ldan
[+ ]'das kyis byang bsems dpa' kun tu bzang bo'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba la dgongadagod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'di nyid na 'bod cing// 'jig
rten kyi khams thams cad du gzugs bstan rab 'byung ba'i lus/ 1 byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par spyodang las ma nyams pa'i sams dang/ de bzhi gshegs pa
thamasacad kyi ngal mngon du mthong bar rnam par dmigs pa'i migadang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lagagi yin nam mkha'i dang mnyam pa'i 'khor lo'abatu bsgrags pa'i dbyangs
! rnam bar dmigs pa'i rna ba dang 2 chos thams cad la rnam pa spyod par dbang sgyur ba'i dbugs phyi nang rgyu bdang/ sangs rgyas kyizhing thams cad rjes su grags pa'i ming ga sgra dang/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba rgyun mi gcod pa'ibyang chub sems dpa'i lus dang/ sems can thams cad la bsam pa ji lta babazhin du mngon par ston pa'i
lus yongs sus+saM nang 'a bya ba dang/ gdul ba la rjes su mthun pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang/ byang chub sems dapo'-i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa bdang da
yang dag par bsgrub pa phyogs kyi dra ba ma lus pa thams cad du 'dal ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa sha stag bcom 'das kyi 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor
