mawa skad cig brjod med pa'i// bskal pa zhing rnams sangs rgyas mtshan la rab bzhugs te/ shin tu yangs pa'i blo ldan pa// bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i mthul yang 'byin// 'dzin gnas
shing tshad med pa'i// bskal par sems rgyud gcig gis rab tu 'jug pa byed// yongs rtog bdu shes med bral yang// 'gro ba'i 'du shes dbang du ston pa byed// de dag ting 'dzin 'di/
gnas su// zhugs kyang dus gsum thams cad gsal bar mngon du mthong// skad cig yud la gnas brtan cing// rnam tho gnas la rnam par spyod pa mdzad// de dag rnam spyod gnas bab/
ma/ ma g.yos lus kyis skyil mo krung du 'khod bzhin du// zhing rnams thams cad kun tu yang// thams cad khyab pa 'a cig 42 yongasas snang// khyu mchogade dag 'dren gnas// bde
gangshegs rnams las chos kyi rgya mtsho yang dag 'thung// ye shes rgya mtshob thab tu zhugs// mi zad yon tan rnams kyi pha rol na/ 'dun zhing rnams kun gros dang// bskal pa'i grangs
dang de bzhin chos kyi grangs rnams dang rgyal ba kun gyimtshan gyi grangs/ sgriba medu sems pa rnam par dgongs pa mdzad// rgyal sras de dag 'di na gnas/ dus gsum zhing mang bkras
pa thams cad ma lus pa// de dag skad cigagacig gis kyang/ yongasasu 'byung dang 'jigapa rnam par 'byed// rgyal sras dengag 'di na gnas//rgyal ba'i spyod pastsa lam 'gro ba'i
dbang po rnams// gnas ni rnam par spyod byed kyang// rgyal sras blo la thogs pa med pas mthong// rdul phran gcig la gang yodang 'i// 'khor rnams rgya/
mtsho zhing mang sems can de bzhin du// bskal pa rdul phran khunamanyam pa// sgrib pa med par mthong ba rnams kyis mthong// rdul phran kun rtsor de bzhin du// 'khor dang zhing dang bskal ba
sgyu/ thams cad ma lus pa/ kun kyang gzugs bar n thabs tshul du// shin tu rnam phye yongs su mthong ba yin// 'di nas de dag chos rnams kyang// bab bzhin zhing rnams kun dang dus dang bskal
pa dang// yang dag sangs rgyas de bzhin te// rang bzhin dngos bral 'byung ba'i tshul gyis mkhyen// 'di nas sems nyan mnyam nyid dang/ chos rnams manyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas bzhaazhade
dang zhing dang smo nu'amamanyam pa nyed// dus gsum mnyamapa nyid la'ang de bzhin 'jug/ sems can khrag khrig rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas phregakhrig rnams kyang de bzhin gzhan mchod/
byed gzhan rnams chos la rnam par rtog/ 'on kyang brtan pa gnas mchog 'di na 'khod// bskal pa khragakhrig mang pos kyang// de dag smo na lam ye shesayul glo'i rnam pa dag/ bdag
gis brjod par minus te// mtha' yas blomapa'i rnams kyi shin tuyog/ de dag smad pa mi mnga' ba// bsgribs med spyod yul rab lashin tu dgyes pa yi// bo khrang 'di la thal sbyar te//
ma bdag kyang lus btud gus par phyag 'ats+tshal le// rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste// bsgribs med spyod pa mnga' ba 'phags pa byams pa de// rnam dag blo mnga' dpa med la// de yi rjes
su bsams te phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshong dpon gyib nor bzangs kyis khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyanapa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la//
de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa gzhan tshad med pa dag gis kyang mngon par bstod de/ shin tu btud nas phyag 'tshal te rab tu gus par bltas nas rimagror byas te mdzadus
nasamachod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i sgon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po byams pa la bltabar mos// byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang phrad pa ni dga' zhing sdod sdod pa las/ des byang chub sems dang 'a byams pa khang pa brtsegs pa de'i phyi'ol gyi phyogs gzhan zhig nas/ srog
chags brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri thadang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ lam ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po du mas
mdun du byas te/ g.yas g.yon nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 2 'jig rten gyimagon po rnams kyis phyag bya zhing/ yul de na gnas paganyen bshes su 'ong ba'i bram the brgya stong mang
bos bskor cing mdunadabyas te/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyirgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po legs su 'ong ba mthong nas/ dga' 'angs te mgu
zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas te/ thag ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la lus
thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas te/ 'khor kun l lag pa g.yas pa sabastan
nas yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bsngags te/ tshigs su bcad ng 'di dag skyasaso// ltos shig bsam pa yongs su dag pa 'di// nor bzangasanor rnams rab tu brtan pa'i bu// byang
chub spyod pa dam pa yongs tshol zhing// mkhas ba nga yi drung du'u bar 'ongs// legs par 'ongs sam snying rje byams byu khyod// byams pa'i dkyila 'khor yangs par legs 'ongs/
legs bar 'ongs sam blta na rab zhi ba// spyad pa spyod tshadub par mgyur tam// rnam dgangasam ldan tshur shog 'ongs pa legs// skye med yid ldan tshu24shog 'ongs pa legs// dbang
po ma zhum tshu shog 'ongs pa legs// mkhas pa spyod tsho dub pamed grang ngo// chos rnams thams cad rnam dbye'i don byung ba// 'grob thams cad rnam gdul rab brtson pa// bshesaganyen
thams cad khastanabakur rab zhugs pa// brtul shugs ma g.yobartan pa khyed 'ongs legs// dgeba'i lam gyis 'ong pa bder 'ongs sam// yon tan lam la gnas pa bder 'ongos
sam rgyal ba'i lam du zhugs pa bder 'ongasasam// lam rnams gang du'angangal ba'am gyur tam// yon tan rang bzhin tshur shog bder 'ongs sam// dge bas mngon brlan tshu'8shog bde/
ngosasam// mtha' yas spyod yul legs par bder 'ongs sam// 'gro ba kun na khyed mthong shin tu dkon//thong dang ma thob mnyam pa'i yid ldan pa// smad dang sdug bsngal m grags/
rnam par spangs// 'jig rten chos ba ut+pal pad+mo bzhin// yid la 'khrul med legs par bder 'ongs sam// g.yo dang sgyu bral bsam pa dge ldan pa// nga rgyal dregs med snod kyi dmar/
po khro dang 'tshig chad khengs shing 'gying ba med// blta na sdug pa khyoda mthong legs pa yin// tshu8shog phyogs kun spyod yul mngon gyur pa// tshul shagargyal ba'i mdzod rnams sgrub byed pa//
tshulashog rgyalaba'imadzod rnams 'phel byed pa// yid la dub med legs par khyod 'ongs sam// tshul shog dus gsum yul ldan 'ongs pa legs// chos kyi dbyings la mos pa'i dkyil
'khor ldag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan snying por byung// mkhas pa legs par 'ongs sam mi ngal lam/ tshur shog 'jam dpal ye shes pad+mo'o mchog/ tshul shog sprin dpal/
[@： ]/bas rnam spel ba// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyis btang ba tshul// khyod la bsgribs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan// ltos shig smon lamadra ba ci 'dra ba// chos
dbyings rgyas 'gangs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la lam bsgrubs// rgya che yangs byed mo'ababrangs 'di'i 'ongasaso// bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshol byed/
cing rdul dang bralapa'i spyodang 'gro ba'i phyig/ smon lam rlabs chen yongs su 'dribyed zhing// skyob pa'i yid med 'di 'dir 'ongasaso// 'das pa'i mgon pos gang la bslab mdzad de//
de bzhin ma byon rnams kyang slob 'gyur la// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i spyod par bya ba rnams// yongasasu dri phyir 'di ni 'dir 'ongs so// 'di ni bdag gi dge bshes chos sgrub// chos kun zhan
tan yongasasu ston byed pa// byang chub sems dapa'i spyod lam yongs sten pa// yin zhes samasagacigabasam nas 'di'i 'ongs so// byang chub sems dpa' bdagagi blo skye ba// sangs rgyas sras
zla babyang chub skyedabyed pa/ 'di dag bdag bshesasangs rgyas bsngags pa zhes// de ltar dge ba'i sems kyis 'dir 'ongasaso/ 'di dag skyed pas bdag gi ma lta bu// yon tan 'o ma sdud pasam
ma'adra// byang chub yan lag yongasasu skyongab yin// dge bshes 'di dag gnod pa rnam par zlog/ rga shi thar byed sman pa lta bu ste// bdud rtsi char 'bebasabargya byin lha dbang 'dra// zlob lta/
tsha bur dkar po'i phyogs kyis rgyas// zhi ba'i phyogs ston nyi ma gsal ba 'dra// dgra dang grogs la ri bo 'dra bas// rgya mtsho bzhin du mi 'khrugs sems dang ldan// yongs su skyong dang mnyan
pa 'dra ba zhes// de 'dra'i sems kyisanor bzangs 'di 'ongs so// 'jigasamad skyob pas dpa' bo lta bu ste// ded dpon magon dang skyabs su grub pa yin// 'di dag bdag la bde
stobasadamigs yin zhes// de 'dra'isams kyis dge bshes bsnyen bkur byed// chos kyi phyogs rnams rtag tu ston pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan ye shes ston pa yin// ngan song ngan/
'grothams cad sbyor bar byed// dge bshes 'di dag bdagal dge ba ston// 'di dag rgyal ba'i mdzod kun stobs pa yin// 'di dag rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod srungs te// 'di dag rgyal ba
kun gyi gsang 'dzin ces de ltar mkhas pa 'di'i dge bshes bsnyen// ye shes 'dun ldan 'di lasa rnam par dag/ gzugs dang longs spyod rigs phunasum tshogs// 'dilas
phun sum tshogs kun dkon ba min// bsam pa de 'dras 'di ni ba'i 'ongs so// bsam pa rlabs chen 'di la kun kyang ltos// mkhas pa'i dge bshes rnams la 'di rten cing// mkhas
pa 'di blo ci 'dra skyed pa ltos/ khyed kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya// 'di'i sngon gyi bsod nams dge ba'i rgyus// byang chub zhugs te 'jam dpal mthong gyur nas// de yi
a k+kA// gdams ngag rjes su mthun sbyong cing// skyo ba med pa ra rgyu ba 'di la ltos// 'dis ni dga' bde thams cad kun spangs te// lha rdzas lta pu'i khyim mang yongs
sums// ba bamam skyod pa rgya chen kun// yongs su ljongs shing bran ltar bshes gnyen sten// mkhas pa 'dis bsam pa ma sbyangs te// bdag gisame lus yongs su spang byas
nam sangs rgyas kun gyi bobrang 'gro bar 'gyur// despyir 'bras bu de 'dra'ang thob par 'gyur// 'disanargun dang nad kyis mnar ba yi// srog chags rmug bsngal brgya yisagatses pa rnams//
skye shi ma ban 'jigs rab sagadungs mthong nas/ de dag don dusnying rje'i sems kyis spyod// 'gro rgyud lnga yi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// sdugabasngal 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i 'gro mthong
u0fc4 nas sdugakhasngal 'khrul 'khor 'khor la 'angomang yi yi shes rdo sras ba 'di tshol la/ 'dod chags zhe sdang rtswa ldong tsher ma// ltachags rtswa mang yongs su 'dzings pa yi//
soms can zhing na longs su slang ba'i phyir// shes rab gshol brtan bzang po 'di la go/ gtimug ma rig thibs po'i bsam pa can/ 'gro ba shes rab mchog stor dmigs med
de la phyogs bde ston pa'i m yod pa// 'gro ba'i ded dpon bzang por 'di 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i go bgos rnam thar bzhon pa zhon// ye shes ral gris mya ngan dgra 'dzom
bas mi 'jigs stobs pa'i dpa' bor gyur pa 'di// 'gro ba rnams kyi 'o maston 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni chos kyi gru zab sbyor ba ste// ye shes rgya mtsho'i lam la bslabs
pa'o zhi ba'in chen mchog gi gling skyel ba// 'di ni khams gsum mtsho yi skya ba 'dzin// ye shes 'od zer smon lam dkyil 'khor can// sems can kun gyi gnas su snang byed
pa'i chos dbyings mkha' la 'od che'ab ldan pa// 'di'i khams gsum nyi mar 'cha' bar 'gyur// byams pa'i dga' ldan ting 'dzin dang bsil ba'i// sems can kun la
snyoms sems 'od bzang la// dka' po'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs rgyas pa'i// sangs rgyas zla ba 'di'i brgyu ra bar 'gyur/ bsam pa'i gzhi rten brten la rab gnas pa// byang chub
spyod pas rim gyis 'phags pa ste// chos kun rin chen 'byung gnas ldan pa yi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur 'o byang chub sems kyi klu yi dbang gis phyung// chos kyi
dbyings kyi mkha' la mngon par 'phags// dkar po'i 'bras bu'i lo tog 'de la byed pa'i// 'di'i 'gro bar chos sprin char 'bebs 'gyur// dag pa'i snying po dri kasum mun sel ba//
byams pa'i sbrum yod dran pa'i snod brtan pa// dri med byang chub sems skyed 'od bzang ba'i// chos kyi mar me 'di ni 'bar byed 'gyur/ byang chub sems nyi mar me'i snying rje
byams pa rdos pa mi g.yo bsam pa mkhregs// byang chub yan lag mthar gyisabyung ba yi// sangs rgyas sras su 'di'i yang dag skye// bsod nams snying po mngon
bar 'bal bar byed// ye shesasnying bo yongasasu sbyong bar 'gyur// 'di shes pa'i snying po 'char ba'abyed// smon lam ji bzhin snying po yang dag byug/ snying rdzabyams pas sprul pa 'di
'ab// sems can dgrol blo phan pa'ibasam ldan pa/ rnamadag yid na 'di'i bla des nga'i 'gro ba lhadang mir bcas dkon// 'di 'dra'i bsam pa rab tu rtsa brtan la/ 'di/
'dra'i sbyor babartan dus rnam 'phel cing// srid gsum yog bar byed pa 'di 'dra ba'i/ yang shis zhing chen 'bras bu 'byung ba dkon// 'di ni yon tan kun sgrub don du gnyer// chos namA
thams cad yongs su dri ba'amos// the tshom thams cad rnam par bsal donod/le lo med pa ri bshes gnyen thams cad ste/ 'di ni bdud kyi dkrugasam nyon mongs 'tsho// 'di ni lta ba'i drimasrid
pa sel// 'di'i 'gro ba thams cad dgrol labartson// mkhas pa'i di ni rtag tu khyad par chog/ yon tan lam la ma nor 'de gnas pag 'di ngan song thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur//
mtho salam yang na bar ston par 'gyur// thar pa'i lam du 'grob 'dzung bar 'gyur// 'di'i 'gro rgyud kun gyi sdug bsngal sel// 'din 'gro rgyud kun gyi bde ba stobs/ 'di ni srid pa
ma kun gyi zhags pa 'thug/ srid pa'i 'gro rgyud thams cad sel bar 'gyur/lta ba dog pa rnam par 'byed par 'gyur/ sred pa 'i 'khri shing dra ba gcong par 'gyur// chags ba'i 'byung
chags nye bar sbyong bar 'gyur// srid gsum lam yang yongs su ston pa'i 'gyur/ 'ji ni 'jig rten mgon dang skyabs yin te// 'di ni 'gro ba kun la 'od byed pa'o// rnam pa kun tu srid pa
sel 'a mkhas/ sa gsum kun 'dren par 'di 'gyur// nyon mongs gnyid log 'gro ba sad nga ra byed/ 'dod pa'i 'dam las mkhas pa 'di sgrol te// 'du shes chags las yong
su 'di yang 'grel// bcings pa kun las thar par byed pa la 'gyur// chos dbyings gzhi yi bye brag sna bar byed 7 dz+dzig kams kyi bye brag sbyong bar 'gyur// chos kun gzhi bye brag
ba'ol phyo// nor bzangs khyod ni dga' ba skyed par 'gyur/ mkhas pa khyod kyi skyel ba'i tshul dang/ ngag tu bye da pa med tshuladang/ khyod kyi bsam pa'i yon ldano
tshul las bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyug khyod kyis bdaganyid dge bar byas tshul gyis/ ring por nga yugs sangs rgyas kun mthong 'gyur/ ring bor mi thogs
zhing rnams kun 'gror 'gyur// chos kun ring por mi thogs shesapar 'gyur// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ sems can rgya mtsho rnam par 'grol bar 'gyur/// spyod pa rgya mtsho
g.yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// khyodakyi zhan tan rgya mtsho de 'dra'o// khyod kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor tshul las na// khyod ni yon tan rnams kyi snod du 'gyur//
khyod ni dag pa yang dag 'byung gnas 'gyur// khyodani rgyal ba'i sras dang mnyam par 'gyur// khyod kyi smon lam dkyil 'khor tshul lasani// khyod kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor pham par
byas khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs// na mongs dkyil 'khor khyed kyis dag par byas/ g.yashes rgyud ni rnam pa'i sbyong bar 'gyur// chos kyi rgyud ni
rab tu ba rjod bar 'gyur// las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rgyud// ring po ma thogs rnam par zlogs ngar 'gyug/ 'jig rten 'khorale srid pa'i 'khor ler rton/
shu bu'i lam rgyud lnga yi 'khor ler rmongs// 'gro kun sdug bsngal 'khor lo gcod pa yi// tshes kyi ler 'o dam pa skor ngar 'gyur//sangs rgyas rigs ni rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur//
chos kyi rigs ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur// dge 'dun rigs ni yongs su sdud par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas khyod 'gyur ro// sred pa'i dra ba rnam par zlog par
'gyur// ltaba'i dra ba thobs po de bzhin te// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dra ba 'gril par 'gyur// smon lamadra ba de ni khyod kyis sbyangs// sems can khams ni yongs su smin byed
[d ]'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ de yang shes khams rishin tu dag byed 'gyur// khyed kyi bsam nga 'i khams ni de 'dra'o// nor bzangs dga' ba 'phel
bar byed pa khyod// sems can kun la phan bdeduga'abyed 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'igs rgyud dga' byed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad smo na lam dga' byed 'gyur/
sems can kun gyi 'gro ba'i gnas ston pa// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan snang ston pa// chos rnams thams cad snang ba rab ston pa'i// blta na bzang ba'i rgyal ba khyod/
'gyur ro// chos dbyings snang ba' byed pa'i 'od ldan pa// sems can khams rnams bde byed 'od ldan pa// ngan song thams cad zhi byed 'od ldan pa'i// srid gsum sdug bsngal
zhi bar byed par 'gyur// mthe ros lamani nye bar ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas lam 'grol 'byed par 'gyur// thar pa'i lam du 'gro ba khrid par 'gyur// de 'dra'i lam ni
khyod kyis rnam par sbyangs// log pa'i lam ni rnam par zlog par 'gyur// skye bo 'phags pa'i lam la 'dul bar 'gyur// brtan pa'i blo gros le lo med pa khyod/ (migayong
byang chub lamanyi deltar rol// srid pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i lus can rnams// sdug bsngal mthar phyin bya bar khyod brtson pa// 'gro ba srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/
khyod kyi yon tan mtsho chen de 'dra 'o// yashes timi mchog gi 'od zer mchos// lus can nyon mongs rgya mtsho yongs bskamangashi// de dag na tun mtsho la dkong
byas nas/ ye shes rgya mtsho' rab tu 'god par 'gyur// blo gros rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam rgya mtsho
( la ring po mi thogs yongs su 'jug par 'gyur// mkhas pa khyod ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i mthus// zhing rnams rgya mtshomang por phyin par 'gyur// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mang po 'thong bar/
'gyur// chos mang rgya mtsho yongs su 'thung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sprin mang khrag khrig mthong bar 'gyur// mchod sprinashin tu rgya chen byed par 'gyur// chos kyi sprin mang khrag khrig
thos par 'gyur// khyod ni smon lam de 'dra'i sprin kyang byed/ sems can thams cad gnas mang rgyas 'gengs 'gyur// zhing rnams kun gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun
kyi gnas su phyin par 'gyur// khyod ni de 'dra'i phyogs su zhugs pa yin// khyod ni ting 'dzin gnas su 'jug par 'gyur// khyod kyis rnam tha'a gnas rnams thob par 'gyur// khyod ni mngon/
shes gnasal spyod par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas// nyi zla'agazugs rnams rab tu snang ba lta// sems can kun gyi gnas su 'char bar 'gyur// rgyal/
ba rnams kyi spyan sngar mngon byung 'gyur// khyod kyi 'byung ba'i lam chen de 'dra'o// 'jig rten kun la mi gnas spyod yul dang// nam mkha'i spyod yul bzang por khyod spyod 'gyur// khyod
kyi spyod yul rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// khyod kyi mngon shesaspyod yul de 'dra'o/ mig 'phrul dra ba'i bye brag gzhi mkhas khyod// zhing gi dra ba'i bye brag ji snyed kazhi/ 2ser po mkha' la rlags
pa med pa ltar// ring por mi thogs rgyas par 'gengs par 'gyur// chos dbyings 'byam klas khong du chud par 'gyur/ dwa'abyam klas 'jig rten khams su 'gro bar 'gyur// dus
gsum gshegs pa 'i sangs rgyas 'byamakyas kun/ mthong bar 'gyur gyis nor bzangasa dga' ba'i gyis// khyod kyis de 'dra'i rna mthar de lta bu// mthong la mthong zhing da dung mthong
bar 'gyur// debs mkhas pas skyo bar ma byed cig/ dga' yangs zang zing med pa nyams su leng// nor bzangs khyod ni yon tanasnod bzang ste// khyod ni rgyal ba rnams kyi
gdams ngag mthun// khyod kyis tshul 'di yongs su bzung bar nus// de bas rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dga mthong// sangs rgyas sras po gnas med spyod yul can/ gang
rnams mthong bar bskal pa khrag khrig tu// shin tu dka' na legs brjod mi smos pa// de dag spyod legs spyod tshakhyod kyisa mthong// de ltar 'jamadapal mkhon du mthong rgyu te/
de 'dra'i yon tan snod du gyur byas pa/ khyod kyis thos pargya rma bsam mi khyag/ mi yi srid par khyer na legs par 'ongs// nasong lam rnams/
thams cad rnam par zlog/ mi khom ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyangs// sdugabasngal chos rnams khyod kyis thams cad bo'o// mi dga' thams cad yongs su spangakhar gyis//
byis pa'i san khyod kyis rnam par bzlog/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan sa la gnas// ye shesas yid m pa yongs bskang zhing// sangs rgyas s rab ring po mi thogs
'thob// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho stod// sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i mdzod dang mtshungs// de yi tshad kyi smon lam gangs chen mtsho// khyod kyis btsal
zin shin tu dga' bar gyis// de ltar dbang po yongs sam skyel// bsam pa brtan zhing sbyor ba des pa'i rnams// gang dag 'di 'dra'i bshesaganyen stan byed pa// de dag ring por mi
smogs mgon par 'gyur// khyod kyi byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs kyis/ sems can mang po dul bar gyura mthong zhing// chos kun sgo yi byang/ baspyod pa la// nam ya nga yid gnyis
khyedapar ma gyur cig/ de ltar phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra 'di// sangs rgyas sras pos de'ang 'dir mthong ba// don chos yon tan dad pa phun sum tshogs// khyod kyi bsod nams
thun ldan bsam mi khyab// de ltar rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyun 'brel bar// rang rang so so'i smon lamabastan byas te// khyod kyis de dag ma lus mthun rtogs pa// khyod
kyis thob pa chen po ci 'dra ltos/ dbyang rlung sems dang 'i spyod pa'i gyur pa la// de 'dra srid pa brgyar yang dkon pas// de phyir rgyal sras de dag rgyun 'brel ba/ khyod la rnamatha'
tshul rnams yongs su ston// bskul nga khrag khrig phye bar 'gro ba gang/ bde gshegs sras dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur pa// de dag de rnams spyod yul mi shes te// de dag
yon tan snod du bdagam byas/ khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i tshul 'di thos pa'i gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul ba// 'gro ba kun dkon pa khyod kyis mthong//
de ltar nor bzangs dga' ba'i yid nga kyis/ khyod lasangs rgyas thams cad dugengs pa mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' khyod gzung phyir yang gnus// khyod kyang de dag rjes su
bstan la gnas// legs se nor bzangs khyod kyi 'tsho ba dge byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi chos la gnas// khyed ni rgyal sras yon tan rnams la slog/ bde bar
gshigs rigs rnam par 'phel byed 'gyur/ nor bzangs dga' ba rgya chen nyams su long// sangs rgyas mnyam med thams cad khyod kyi la// byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad khyod dang ldan// byang chub yan lag thams cang khyod kyi gnyen// khyod ni bde gshegs thugs las skyes pa'i sras// chos kyi rgyal po'i gos kyi
rgyud 'dzin pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rgyud 'phel bar byed// ring po mi thogs chos rgyal 'thob 'gyur gyis// nor bzangs dbang po tshim zhing dga' bar gyis// bas
rgyas kun gyidabang bskur dam pa yang// ring por mi thogs rmad byung thob da ra 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i sras dang mtshungs shing mnyam par 'gyur// khyod kyi spyod pa'i tshul mthun de 'dra 'o/ migang
ci 'dra'i sa bon 'debs byed pa// des de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur/ ]dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas nyams su long// sa ni de'ong khyed kyi dbugs kyang dngung// tshe gcig khyod kyis
gang rnams thob gyur pa// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig bsam yas pa// bskal pa khragakhrig byang klub spyod spyod pa//dedug gisakyang phun sum 'dim snyed/ 'di rnams thams cad mos
pa'i 'bras bu ste// brtson 'grus bsamang dag ni de bzhin no// pazhig spyod pa 'di 'drar dga' ba yang// nor bzangs spyod pa gang yin de la spyod// spyod pa thams cad smon lam byung ba
yin chos rnams thams cad mos las yongs su byung// nor bzangs de ltar khyod kyis yongs su bsgrubs/ rtag tu khyad par spyod pa btsal bar gyis// klu yi bsam pa ji snyed
babs byung gyur pa// de steng chur ba yongasasu 'bab par 'gyur// smon lam ye shes spyod yul ji snyed pa// de snyed byang chub spyod pa rgyas par 'gyur// nor bzangs bzang bo'i spyod ces bya ba 'di/
tshul 'di khyed la bstan pa 'di yin gyis// de shes gyis la dge bshes rang bzhin gyis// bsnyen bkur byed tshe 'jigs par ma byed cig/ lus rnams bye ba sngon chad khyod kyis kyang// 'dod pa'i/
don du don med zad byas soms// da ni byang chub yongs su skyol gyur na// brtul zhugs bazang bo brtul bas zhig ko 'dad/ 'khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba 'das byas te// 'dus byas sdug bsngal
thams cad nyams su myong// gang+ga'i bye snyed sangs rgyas mnyes ma byas// 'di 'dra'i tshul yang thos par ma gyur to// de lasad ni khom pa'i ming yang skyes// sangs rgyas byung mthong dage bshes
'di 'dra ste// byang chub mcho gis+yed pa'i ng thob par gyur// rnam dgasems su nga go tir mi 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// dge bshes de bzhin chos mnyan thos
par 'gyur// kalate bsam pa yongs su ma sbyangs// tshul 'di phyin chad thos par dka' bas// de bas dad dang mos dang bsam pa rnams// yongs su skyed la tham phu dud kyis//
the tsom lta ba yongs su skye longs la/ de yang dang yang du 'di 'dra'i tshul nyon cig/ gang gis spyod la 'jug pa 'di 'dra'adri// thos nas de 'dra'i smon lam mngon bsgrub pa// de dag mi yi
srid par legs par 'ongs// gang gis de 'dra'i mos pa sbyangs pa ni// de la bde gshegs thams cad mi dkon// de'i rgyal ba rnams sras dang skrun// de la
zhe chad bya tshubathe tsom med// gang zhig 'di 'dra'i tshul 'dir zhugs gyur pa// des na log par ltung ba thams cad spangs// des na sdug bsngal chos rnams thams cad bsal//
des ni yon tan thams cad bsdubar byas// lus nibor nas ring po mi thogs su/ yongs su dag pa'osangs rgyas zhing du 'gro// byang chub yes dpa'i gnas su 'jug par 'gyur// phyogs
bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/ nor bzangs khyod kyi sngon gyi rgyu phyug pas// da ltar byung la mos pa nges pa yi// khyad par don gnyer dge bshes bstenabyas pas/
chu lasaut+palabazhin de phyir 'phel 2 dge bshes thams cad 'dung bsam pa dang// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes bya'i bsam pa dang chos kun yongs su dri ba'i
bsam pa can// brtul zhugs bzang po ldan pa ngal gyis longs// chos kyin natan kun la 'ba gnas pa la ma rnams rjes su kun tshol rab gnas pa/ sangs
rgyas sras kyis m+mon lam rab gnas pa// yon tan chos rnams kun gyi snod khyod longs/mos pa phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra bas// khyod kyis nga la phyag 'dicas pa na/
sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor du mngon sum du/ ring po mi thogs yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur// skyo ba'i yid med nor bzangs legs pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi smo na lam
sems pa// brtul zhugs brtas khyod ring po mi thogs par// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mthar phyin 'gyur// ye shes spyod yul rnam thar mthar phyin pa'i// 'a
dpal go du nor bzangs khyod song ste// bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa mchog drisashig/ de tshul khyod 'jug de ni byed par 'gyur// de ltar byams pa chags med spyod yul gyis//
no'abazangs yang dag legs nga sa 'thags mthong nas/ 'khor rnams kun la mngon par bstan byas te// de yi yon tan legs mdzod 'di warjod do// 'di 'dra'i rjes su
bstan pa dam pa dang ga dmas ngag de'adra'izhir bzangs thos gyur nas// dga' ba'i shugs kyis dbang po mngon brnyan pas// mchi ma'i rgyud mang rab tu des kyang bkas//
dga' ba'i nyams ngag nyams su myong bar gyur// dbang po tshems shugs kyis dbugs kyang byung// nor bzangs langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas// byams pa de la bskor ba
rab tu byas/ de yal gtu 'jam dpal sems dbang gis// mi tog 'phreng ba rin chen mdzes pa dag/ byang chub sems dapa'i smon pas mngon 'thon pa/ yid du 'ong ba mang
po byung bar gyur// nor bzangs de tsha rab tu dga' gyur nas// dga' bar de dag byams pa de la gtol/ de de mi mgo la kun nasatsugs// byams
pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras// rgyal ba'i sras po nor bzangs legs so legs// de ltar khyod ni yongasasu mi skyo bsag gang dag 'jamadapa' ci 'dra ji bzhin du//
yon tan snod du khyed ni myur te 'gyur// thos nas nor bzangs dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa// 'dri 'dra'i dge bshes bdag dang phrad pa ni// srid pa brgya phrag bgrangs pa28shin tudakon/
bdag gis de ring 'di'i phyon shin tu legs/ yon tan kun gyi pha rol phyin gyur pa 'jam dpal khyod kyi byin rlabs bzang po yis// bdag gis bshes gnyen 'di dag dkon pa
rnyed khyodadang bdagadu myur du 'grogs par bo/ pa/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste//
bam po brgya bcu gnyis pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mdun du 'dug ste// thal
mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te// 'phags pa byams pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku tshe gcig gis thogs par bla med
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsten pa ste/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sku tsheg rig gis thogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa
thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa lags/ des ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyes pa lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par rab tu zhugs pa lags/
des n bzol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa lags// den bzod pa'i sgo thams cad du zhugs pa lags// des na byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu brnyed pa lags
de'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thams cad la rnam par rol pa lags/ des n ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrubs pa gas/ des n byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud
thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa lags/ des ni gzungs dang spobs pa snang ba'i tshul thams cad rab du brnyes pa lags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la
mnga' thob pa lags/ des zhi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad shin tu bsags pa lags/ dezhingashes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i tshul rnam par rol pa lags/ des
[n ]gna mngon bar shes pa chen po dang/ rig pa dang/ ya shes snang ba'i tshul bskyed pa lags/ de'i bslab pa thams cad la byung ba lags/ des/
ni byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa lags/ des ni smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa lags/ des n de bzhin gshegs pathams
cad kyi lung bstan pa rab tu blangs pa lags/ de ni thog pa thams cad kyis 'byung pa'i sgol mkhas pa lags/des de bzhonagshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par
blangs pa lags/ des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su bzung ba lags/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung ba lags/ des na/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigasang ba'i mdzod 'dzin palags/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' thams pa ga nga pa'i daklu 'khor thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa lags/ de ni
nyon mongs pa'i dpung thams cad rnam par dkrug pa la shin tu dpa' ba lags/den 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par las pa rnams kyi lam ston pa lags de nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis
thebs pa rnams kyi snya na par gyur pa lags/ den sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin pa logs/ de ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi dbang pa lags/ de na 'phags
[ba'i dang zog thams cad kyi grub lags/ de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bo lags/ de na 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la rgyu ba rnams kyi skye ba 'dzin pa lags/ des ni
sems can gdul ba'i thabs kyi mgon po bshal ba lags/ des 'gro ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi dbang po rnam par gzigs pa lags/ de ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la/
brtson pa lags de'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su bskyang ba la ga rdzong sa/ re ni byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la yang dag par 'grobar brtson pa lags/ de
ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs drung na gnas pa lags/ de ni 'khor gyi dkyil akhor thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa lags/ de'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas su
gzugs brnyan snang ba legs/ de'i 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags/ de ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das ba lags/ de ni sangs
rgyus kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa lags de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la sgrib pa med pa brnyes pa lags/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad la mchod par brtson pa lags/ de'isangs rgyas kyi chos M thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa lags/ de'i dbang bskur ba'i thabs thob pa lags/ de ni chos kyi
rgyal srid chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la dbang bskur ba lags/ de las na sangs rgyas kyi chos nyams cad/
[+ ]rab tu 'byung ba lags/ de na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba'i mthar phyin pa lags na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chung sams dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod
pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas nan tan du bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba/
dung sems can gyi khams ji ltar gnyer ba'i tshul bzhin du rim gror bgyid par 'gyur nga dang/ yi dam ji ltar bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du mthar phyin par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub
sams dpa'i spyod pa chen po brtsams pa grub par 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtan dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ba dang/ bdag dang/ sems can dang/ sangs
rgyas dang/ chos dang dge 'dun slu bar ma 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun ma gcod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs stong par ma 'byin pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i tshul yongs su 'dzan par 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyoms pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad
[z// ]la bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs zhe bar bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag tshong dpon gyi bu 'ad 'i da ltar nga la byang chub sems pa' skyed ba dang/
yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa 'dra ba la ltos/ bzod pa can dag tshong dpon gyi bu 'di ni brtson 'grus brtsam pa 'di lta bu dang 2 don du gnyer ba'i 'ad lta bu dang// mos pa'i yi
dam 'di lta bu dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa 'di lta bu dang/ brtson 'grus ma zlogs pa 'di lta bu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis ma ngoms pa 'di lta bu dang/ khyad par
yongs su btsal ba 'di lta bu dang/ mgo'i thod la ma 'bar ba lta bur spyod pa 'di lta bu dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bar 'dod pa 'di lta bu dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa 'di lta bu s dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yongs su tshol zhing yongs su dra ba dang/ bsan bkur ba byed cing/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas btang
nas grong khyer dpal gyi 'byung gnas zhe bar gzung ba nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad du brgyus te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen brgya rtsa bcu la yongs su du be byed cing/ tha ma nga 'drung 'di'i
bar du skyo ba thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas phyin te/ rigs kyi bu dag rnam pa 'di lta bur theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ yi dam chen po la yang dag par gnas pa
ngas// bsam pa chen po la rab tu rtul ba'i yidi dang ldan pa dang/ sAng rdzachen po' bgos pa'i nged dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab
pa'i blo gros can/ brtson 'grus chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu brtson pa// sems can gyi lam grogs mang pos yongs su bskyang ba la mngon par brtson pa/ 'khor ba'i rgyu
mtsho chen po las sems can bsgral ba la zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam chen po la zhugs pa/ chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham pa la brtson pa/ chos tshan
po dang bsod nams rin po che yongs su bsdu ba la rab tu rtul ba/ chos kyi mchod sbyin chen po'i tshogs bsags pa la brtson pa rnams kyi ming thos pa 'am/ gzugs kyi lus mthong pa
'am spyod yul du 'grogs pa 'am/ spyod pa dang skal ba mnyam pa nishan tu dkon no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi ngu skyes bu dam pa la drani 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab
pa'i don du byung ba ste/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byed pa dang/ ngan song thams cad yang dag par bsal ba dang/ ma khom pa'i lam thams cad rnam bar
bzlog pa dang/ lam nyam nga ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dang/ rigs pa'i mun pa nag po thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa thams cad las yang
dag par bzla ba dang/ 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang/ gnas kyi rten thams cad las rgyun du
bskyod pa dang/ rtan gyi gzhi thams cad las bskul ba dang/ 'gro ba rgyud thams cad du ma gnas par bya ba dang/ 'dod pa'i 'dam nas yang dag par gdon pa dang/ dga' ba'i 'dod
chags sngangs ba dang/ lta ba'i bcings pa gtub pa dang/ 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhon pa rnam par bzlog pa dang 2 'du shes kyi zhags pa ya nga dgu par gcad pa dang/ phyin ci log
ga lam nas rnam par bzlog pa dang/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsal ba dang/ bag la nyal ba'i zug rduyang dag par dbyung ba dang/ sgrib pa'i sgo glags gzhom pa dang/ sgrib pa'i ri
rnam par gtor ba dang/ srid pa'i dra ba nas gdon pa dang/ ma reg pa'i kun tu sbyor ba las dpyab dang/ srid pa'i chu bo las bsgral ba dang/ g.yo dang sgyu spang ba dang/ sems kyi rtog
pa gang ba dang/ ba tsom dang/ yade gnyas dang/ nem nur bsal ba dang/ mi shes pa'i chubo chen po las bsgral ba dang/ 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad rnam par smad pa'i
phyir rab tu zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni sims can rnams chu bo bzhi las yongs su bsgral pa'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par bsham par 'dod pa'o// lta ba'i
[© ]/'dam du bying ba rnams kyi ngos kyi rkang stags chen po dgod par 'dod pa'o// gti mug gi mun par 'thoms pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba dbyung bar 'dod pa'o//
'khor ba'i mya ngam du 'khyams pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam bstan par 'dod pa'o// nyon mongs pa'i nad chen pos gzir ba rnams la chos kyi sman spyin par 'dod pa'o// skye ba dang/
rgab dang/ 'chibs gtses pa rnams la 'chi ba med pa'i dbyangs sbyin par 'dod pa'o// ma gsum rab tu 'bar ba rnams la zhi gnas kyi chus rab tu zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa'o// mya ngan
dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ yade ma bde ba dang/ 'khrugs pas gdungs pa rnams la dbugs phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa'o// srid pa'i btson ras 'khor ba rnams la/
ya shas kyi mtshon chasbyin par 'dod pa'o// lta ba'i bcing bas glogs pa rnams la shes rab kyi mtshon chas bskyod par 'dod pa'o// khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyis 'khor ba rnams
sbyo la thar pa'i sgo bstan par 'dod pa'o// phyogs ma bde bar mngon par gzhol ba rnams la bde ba'i phyogs bstan par 'dod pa'o// nyon mongs pa'i chom pos gtses pa rnams la dbugs
phyin pa chen po sbyin par 'dod pa 'o// ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams la 'ju sa'i lag pa brkyang bar 'dod pa'o/ phung po'i gshed mas gtso ba rnams
0 la mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bstan par 'dod pa'o// khams kyi sbrul gyis kun nas 'khor ba rnams la 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'byung nga bstan par 'dod pa'o/ skya ma da
kyi grong stong ba na gnas pa rnams shes rab kyi snang bas gdon nga ra 'dod pa'o// mu stegs ngan pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i rje stags su gzung par 'dod pa'o[1]
bshes gnyen ma yin pa'i lag tu lhung ba rnams la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan par 'dod pa'o// byas pa'i rjes kyi spyod yul la mngon par mos pa rnams 'phags pa'i
chos la rab tu dgod par 'dod pa'o// 'khor ba' khyami la mngon par dga' ba rnams rgyun du bskyod de thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par 'dod pa'o// rigs kyi bu
dag de ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di ni sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros de lta bu s byang chub sems bskyed pa bar ltag par bya ba yongs su btsal ba la rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ theg
pa chen po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/ chos kyi sman thams cad la 'thung bas mi ngoms pa'o// tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
phyir rtag tu brtson pa'o// chos kyi sgo thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir ma gtong ba la brtson pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad spyad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus ma
kyi// gtong pa'o// smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir ma ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyan thams cad mthong bar bya bas
ma ngoms pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsan bkur bas lus la dub par 'gyur ba med pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su/
bstan pa la mthun par 'dzan pa'o// rabigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi 'jig rta nan sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu son lam 'dag pa de
bu'i sems can dkon no// de bas kyang gang bla na ni da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i tshul 'di lta bu s sangs rgyas
kyi chos yongs su sdud pa dang/ mos pa drag po 'di lta bu s byang chub sems dang 'a lam yongs su tshol ba dang/ don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu s byang chub sems dpa' baspyod pa
yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ nyon mongs pa 'ad lta bu s dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan kur byed pa dang/ mgo'i thod la ma 'bar ba ltar spyod pa 'di lta bu s dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi ngag dang 'gal bar ma byed pa dang/ lag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas nan tan du byed pa 'di lta bu s dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa dang/
sa mthun par len pa 'di lta bu s byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang/ khe dang/ bkur sti dang/ snyan pa don du ma gter ba 'di lta bu s byang chub sems dpa'i bsam
ba'i khams dang 'gal bar ma byed pa dang/ khyim dang/ longs spyod dang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ pha ma dang 2 gnyen bshes dang/ dngos po thams cad la ltos
ba mdu par yongs su btang ba 'ad lta bu s byang chub sems dpa' grigs yongs su tshol ba dang/ lus dang srog la 'phangs par ma rtsa be 'ad lta bu s thams cad mkhyen pa zhade la mngon
bar mos par byed pa de lta bu'i sems can na chos dkonano// rigs kyi bu dag 'das ji ltar cher skyes pa 'di gtsage la ji snyed cig thobapa dang/ khong du chud pa de na byang chub ngo mas dpal
de ma yin pa gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thob pa dang/ kheng du/
chud pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul kha 'am/
chos kyi dbyangs kyi yi shes la 'jug pa 'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa 'am/ spyod pa'i dri ba rgya cher bya ba 'am/ smon lam mngon par bsgrub nga yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
'a bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba 'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par
sgrub par bya ba dang/ yongs su dag par bya bo 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la yang dag par 'byung
ba med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi yon tan dang/ legs pa yang dag par yongs su brjod
ba byas nas/ de las brten te srog chags brgya phrag stong gas byang chub kyi yan lag gi bsam pa brtan par byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so//
rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams thams cad ngo ngas su bskyab pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thong
bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rages kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar
sems baskyed pa na khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten du khyod legs par 'chos so// khyed kyis sangs rgyas byung ba dgyes par byas so// khyod kyis dag/
ma/ ba'i bshes gnyen 'jam dpal legs par mthong ngo// khyod kyis bsam pa'i rgyud stod bzang por gyur to// khyod ni dege ba'i rtsa bas mngon par brgyan to// khyod ni dkar po'i chos kyis/
lags par brtan no// khyod kyis mos pa rlabs chen pa dang/ dge ba'i bsam po legs par shin tu sbyangs so/ khyod na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs par dgongs so// rigs
kyi bu khyod ni dege ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par gzung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu 'o//
'gro ba thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta'o// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu rten pas sa lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par byed pas chu
lta bu 'o// 'jig rten thams cad la rten pa med pas rlung lta bu 'o// lta ba'i de'i bar len nga 'a rtswa thams cad rab tu sreg pas ma lta bu 'o// sems can thams cad kyi gnas
snang bar byed pas nyi ma lta bu 'o// chos dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par byed pas zla ba lta bu 'o// chos kyi snang nga byed pas sgron ma lta bu 'o// mnyam pa dang ma mnyam
pa yongs su mthong bar byed pas mig lta bu 'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin nga ra byed pas la ma lta bu 'o// mu stegs ngan pa rnam par spong bas mu stags lta bu 'o//
wa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon nga ra gnas pas bzhon pa lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi sgo 'jug par byed pas sgo lta bu 'o//
ting nge 'dzin gyi khang pa na gnas par byed pas gzhal med khang lta bu 'o// chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa nyams su myong bar byed pa sa bza' shing gar ba lta bu 'o// 'gro ba thams
zlo cad yongs su skyob pas gnas lta bu 'o// 'jig rten thams cad la phan nga skud pas rten lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa thams cad spyod par byed pas gzhi
lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su srung bas pha lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ma lta bu 'o// thams cad las yongs su
skyong bas ma ma lta bu 'o// slob pa dang/ ma slob pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon pas rgyal po lta bu 'o// smon lam thams cad kyis khyod
zla par du 'phags pas dbang po lta bu 'o// yon tan thams cadu yang dag par 'du bas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'o// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas ra chen po lta bu 'o//
'jig rten thams cad rten pas khor yug lta bu 'o// ya shes kyi sman rnam par 'thal bar byed pas gangs kyi ri lta bu 'o// yon tan gyis sbos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas
wa/ spos kyi ngad ldang ba lta bu 'o// yon tan rgya che ngas nam mkha' lta bu 'o// 'jig rten kyi chos thams cad kyis bgis pas pad+ma lta bu 'o// soms dul zhang cang shes pas spung//
bo lta bu 'o// rgod pa thams cad dang bral bas rta cang shes lta bu 'o// theg pa chen po yongs su skyong ba' sngon du 'gro bas kha lo sgyur ba lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i nad sos
par byed pas rgyun lta bu 'o// ma dege nga' chos thams cad zad par byed pas sa 'a 'og lta bu 'o/ chos thams cad nges par khong du chud par byed pas rdo rje lta bu 'o/ yon tan
gyi dri zhim par byed pas spos kyi snod lta bu 'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mngon par dga' bas ma tog dam pa lta bu 'o// 'dod chags kyi gdung ba bsal bar byed pas kha
pa' tsan dan lta bu 'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas a ka ru nag po lta bu 'o/ nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad 'joms pas snyan gyi rgyal po 'alta na sdug pa
lta bu 'o// bag la nyal ba'i zug rngu thams cad yang dag par 'byin pas 'bral bar byed pa'i sman lta bu 'o// dbang po thams cad la dbang sgyur bas dbang po lta bu 'o// dbul
ba thams cad yongs su sel bas ngal bso po lta bu 'o// yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa byed pas dpal lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad mdzes par byed
pas lhab lhub lta bu 'o// zhes byas thams cad sreg pas bskal pa 'tshig pa'i mi lta bu 'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'phal bar
byed pas rtsa ba ma grug pa'i snyan gyi rgyal bo chen po lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad rnam par sal bas klu'i rin po che lta bu 'o// rtog pa thams cad sol bas nor bu rAni
bo chachu'adang lta bu 'o// don thams cad yongs su grub pas yadi bzhin rin pe che'i rgyal po lta bu 'o// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po
lta bu 'o/ yon tan thams cad kyi rkyen gyi char mngon par 'babs pas gnod sbyin gyi shing lta bu 'o// 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad dang ma 'dres pas gos rang ras can lta bu 'o//
rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas shang bal gyi rgyud lta bu 'o// sems can gyi bsam pa'i zhing rnam par spyod pas gshel bu lta bu 'o// 'jig tshogs kyi go cha brtol bas
mde'u thung lta bu 'o//sdug bsngal gyi 'bam nges par 'bags pas mda' lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i dregra las rnam par rgyal bar byed pas mdung lta bu 'o// tshul
bzhin ma yin pa yadi la byed pa 'gebs pas go cha lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i klad pa 'gems pas ral gri lta bu 'o// nga rgyal dang drags pa dang/ rlom pa'i gi/
cha 'dral bas ral gri'i so lta bu 'o// bag la nyal gyi gi chagashog pas mda' sta'u kha lta bu 'o// nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan sol bas dpa' bo'i ru mtshon lta bu 'o//
ma shes pa'i nge shang stsal bar byed pas lag cha lta bu 'o// sdug bsngal gyi shang rab tu gcod pas sta re lta bu 'o// gnod pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pas
mtshon cha lta bu 'o// pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yongs su srung bas lag pa lta bu 'o/ yon tan thams cad la so sor 'god pas rkang pa lta bu 'o/ pa rag pa 'phro'i
lang tog yongs su khel bas mgi mkhan lta bu 'o// 'jig tshogs kyi zug rngu yang dag par 'byon pas skam pa lta bu 'o// bag la 3la gyi tsher ma 'byin pas tshir zungs lta bu 'o/
'khor pa'i gtsanges pa las yongs su 'grol nga sa mdza' bo lta bu 'o// gnod pa thams cad sel bas nor bu lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dang na spyod pa thams cad kyis
'byung ba'i lam mngon par shes par byed pas gtsug lag lta bu 'o// bsod nams ma zad pas gter lta bu 'o// ya shes ma zad pas rgyu mge lta bu 'o// chos thams
cad kyi gdong ga gzugs brnyan ston pas me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bu 'o/ 'go ba med pas me tog puN+Da ri ke lta bu 'o/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang pasdu ba'i dngos po rgyun du 'bab
pas chu klung chen po lta bu 'o// chos sngon gyi char mngon par 'babs pas klu rgyal po chen po lta bu 'o// byang chub nga mas dpa' thams cad kyi sang rdzachen/
bo yongs su 'dzan pas 'tsho ba'i dbang po lta bu 'o// 'chab med pa'i dbyangs su phyin par byed pas bdud rtsi lta bu 'o// 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sdud tsang//
'dren bas kun nas 'khor ba' re lta bu 'o// 'khor ba'i chu la chub mngon par 'don bas mchal pa lta bu 'o// yon tan thams cad kyi dri zhim po 'dzan pas smos kyi snod lta
bu'o shani tu nad med par byed pas dug sman lta bu 'o// 'dod pas dga' ba'i dug mad par byed pas dug gi gnyen po lta bu 'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i dug thams cad
'byang bar byed pas sngags dang gzungs lta bu 'o/ sgrib pa dang bar chad kyi rtsa thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu 'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che
thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas rin po che'i klong lta bu 'o// chos dkar po thams cad 'byung bas rogs lta bu 'o// yon tan gyi chos thams cad skye ba'i sger gyur pas
'byung gnas lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshong pa thams cad kyis spyad pas tshong dus lta bu 'o// las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang dri ma thams cad yongs su sbyong bas chu'i
wa khams lta bu 'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sbyang rtsa'i gnas lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i tho brang du phyin/
par byed pas lam lta bu 'o// chos dkar bo thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas snod lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad ma snang bar byed pas chur pa lta bu 'o// byang chub
sams dpa' rnam par dgod pa thams cad ston pas gnas lta bu 'o// nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba dang ma 'dre bas rdob khab long lta bu 'o// rang bzhin gyis dra ma med pas bi
cha glu lta bu 'o// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang// 'jig rten gyi shes pa thams cad thal du brlab pa dang zal gyis non par byed pa an+d+rin la lta bu 'o//
nyon mongs pa'i gnyid kyis leg pa'i sems can sad par byed pas tho ras kyi rnga lta bu 'o// rtog pa med pas chu dang ba lta bu 'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la spyod pa' dge
ba'i tshogs zal du rlag par byed pas 'dzam bu chu rlung ga gser gyi rgyan lta bu 'o/ 'jig rten gsum las mngon par 'phags pas ra'i rgyal po lta bu 'o/ skyabs tshol ba yongs
sum be tong bas skyabs lta bu 'o// don ma yin pa 'dzom pas don lta bu 'o// nying dga' bar byed pas dbyig lta zu'o// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshaci par byed pas mchod sbyin
gyi yo byad lta bu 'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi gtso bo dang thu bor gyur pas nas rgan pa lta bu 'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzan pas gleng gzhi
lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad sbyad pas mdo lta bu 'o// 'jig rten thams cad skyong bas rjer lta bu 'o// sdug to thams cad rnam par zlog
pas bsrung ma lta bu 'o// nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin 'dren pas dbang po' mog 'phrul lta bu 'o// 'dul ba 'dren pas chu' zhags pa lta bu 'o// bag chags dang/ bag lan+dal
ba dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhob tu rlog pas dbang po'i me lta bu 'o// lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yan du bcas pa'i 'jagi rten rnams la mchod rten lta bu 'o// gis
kyi bu de ltar byang chub kyi sems na yon tan de dag dang/ yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ ragis kyi bu mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang/
sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed pa de snyad ru byang chub kyi sems la yon tan dang legs pa yod par blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ad las na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'byung ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rad las 'byung ngo/ rigs kyi bu de bas na
gang gas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pas shun tu bzung byas yon tan tshad
mad pa phun sum tshogs pa yan no// ragis kyi bu 'ad lta ste/ dpar na 'jags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa yod de/ de 'chang na 'jigs pa lnga mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar/
mas ma 'tshag go/ dug gas ma tshugs so/ tshon gyis mi chod do// chus mi khyer ro// du bas mi 'chi'i/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
kyi rtsa 'dang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod chags kyi mes ma 'tshag go/ yul gyi dug ka sa ma tshugs so// nyon mongs pa'i mtshon byas mi chod do// srid pa'i chus ma
khyer ro/ yongs su rtog pa'i du bas ma 'chi'o// rigs kyi bu 'du lta sta/ dpar na rnam par ma gtong ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa yod de/ de 'chung na gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i
'dzags pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi ye shas kyi rtsa 'ong ba 'a 'ang 'khor ba'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad ma 'byung ngo//
rags kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na chu zhes bya ba'i yod de/ de 'chang na nga tshor ba tsam gyis sprul thams cad 'byor ro// de bzhin du byang chub sams dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi
rtsa 'chang ba'i yon tan gyi dri tsam byas kyang nyon mongs pa'i sprul thams cad 'byar bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dpar na skyes bu gzhan gyis ma thub
pa'i rtsa 'chang na na/ ngaga' dekyil 'khor thams cad kyis ma tshugs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i rtsa 'chang
ba'ang bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis thub par dka' 'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rnam pa ra sel ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa yod de/ de bcangs na zug rngu thams cad 'byin
bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rnam par sel ba 'chang ba'i 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi zug rngu thams cad 'byung ngo//
rags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsa'i rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de bar ngs na nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
byang chub kyi sems rtse'i rgyal po chen po blta na na sdug pa 'chang ba'ang nyon mongs pa dang/ ma shes pa' nad nyams cad rab tu sel bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dbar na rtsi'i
shang chen po sbyor ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i shun pas rma la reg na thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang nas bshus pa de'i shun phrags kyang phyir skye'o// de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems
[o]kyis bon sa skyes pa 'a shang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'ang mthong ma thag tu/ rigs kyi bu dad pa rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rma yongs su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shang de la'ang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rma 'byung ba 'am/ nyams par ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'ad lta sta/ dper na rtsi chen po'i rnam pa rtsa ba ma grub pa/
zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mthus 'dzam bu'i gling gi'ang thams cad yan lag thams cad rnam par 'pha' lo/ de bzhin du byang chub kyi sams rtsa kA ma grub pa'i rtsa chen po'i mthus
kyang slob pa dang/ mi slob pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi shang rnams rnam par 'thal lo// 'di lta ste// dpar
na dga' ba 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa yod de/ de sul lus la thogs pa'i lus dang sems nad med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi dga' ba 'thob par
byed pa'i rtsi'ang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus dang sems nad mad pa yongs su spyod do/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dran pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba rtogs yod de/ debacas
na sems kyi dran pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nyams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa hran pa thob par byed pa'i rtsirang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i dran pa rnam par dag par byed do// rabs kyi bu 'du lta ste/ dparan pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i rtsa yod de/ de zos pa tsam
byas tsho'i tshad bskal par 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems pad+mo chen po'i rtsa zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa grangs med pa' tshe la dbang ga pha rol tu phyin pa thob
par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'ad la ts+tshA/ bar na snang ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba da te tshe bcangs ma deng ma ma yin pa thams cad kyis ma mthong ngo// de bzhin du byang chub kyi
sems kyi tsho ma stong bar 'gyur bar bcangs te 'dres pas rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud kyi yul thams cad ma snang ngo// rigs kyi bu 'ad lta// dper na
mtsho chen po'i nang na nor bu rin po che' rgyal po chen po rani po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de 'jig rten kyi khams gzhan du ma 'thos na rgya mtsho chen po la nyamal pas
'tshog pas mi thams cad kyis kyang ta latsam yong bskum par nus pa'i gnas mang skabs med do// de bzhin du bying tshub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nor bu
ran po che thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsam pa dang sems kyi rgyud la yod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa 'ga' zhig rnam par
wa chud za bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med de/ de na mi srid de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyed pa yongs su btang ba zhig tu gyur na na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
skam par 'gyur ro rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de mgul du btags na nor bu rin po che'i rgyan
thams cad kyang zalekyis non par 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa' rini bo cha chen po bsam pa'i rgyan du thogs pa'i byang chub sems pa
yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed pa'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ rigs kyi bu 'ad+dalta ste/ dpar na nor bu rin po che chen po chu 'dang zhes bya ba
yod de/ de chur bcug na 'dam dang rog pa thams cad rab tu dang bar byed do/ de bzhin du byang chub kyi saa9 pa 'dapal nor bu bain po che'ang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam dang rog pa thams cad
rab tu dang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'ang lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po chu dang 'grogs pa zhes bya ba thegs po sa na chung ma 'chi'i de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen
pa 'di kyi sems chu dang 'grogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po shog sa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i rgyu cha tsho shas cad 'chi'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpar
na nor bu rin po che klu'i nor bu'i go cha zhes bya ba yod de/ de lag na 'dug na dpa la sogs pa chu las 'tshob rnams klu'i gnas thams cad du 'dong yang klu'i
[H ]sbrul thams cad kyis ma tshugs so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa 'de du sems bskyed pa'i ye shes klu'i nor bu'i go cha'achang ba'i byang chub sems dang 'a yang 'dod pa'i/
gnas kyi khams thams cad du 'gro'ang nyams par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na nor bu rin po chu brgya byin mngon pa gas pa thogs pa'i lha'i rgyal bo brgyu
byin na lha' tshogs thams cad bral gyis gnon to// de bzhanyid du thams cad mkhyen nga 'di kyi sems bskyabyan mngon par chags pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po smon lam gyi
cod pan mgo la thogs pa'i byeng chub sems dpa' yang khams gsum l thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ rags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po 'di bzhin
gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i tshe ni 'i khongs pa thams cad kyis ga 'i jags so/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yadi bzhan gyi rgyal po ra nor bu rin po che chen po thogs
pa' byang chub sems dang 'a yang yo byad dang 'tsho bas bag smra ba thams cad kyis ma 'dzags so/// ragis kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che nyi mas mdzes pa na ti ma la
bstan na ma 'byung ngo// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nyi mas mdzes pa'i nor bu rin po che'anga shes rab kyi 'od zer gyis phog na ye shes kyi me 'byin to//
rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// dper na nor bu rin po che zla bas mdzes pa zhes bya ba la zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na chu'i rgyun 'byin to// de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyod pa zla bas
mdzes pa'i rin po che chen po'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcos pa'i zla ba'i 'od kyis 'og na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi chu'i rgyun 'byin to// rigs kyi bu 'di
lta ste/ dper na nor bu rini bo re yodi bzhin gyi rgyal po'i tsod pan thogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnams la gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems
snying rje chen po' nor bu rani bo che yadi bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa'i byang tshub sems dpa' rnams la'ang don song rung ngan 'gros gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do de rags kyi
du 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rani pe ni chen po 'gro ba'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba na/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar ma
'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi dam pa 'a nir bu rin po che chen po'ang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i/
smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bas nam yang byang bar ma 'gyur ro/ rags kyi bu 'ad lta ste/ dper na rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i nor bu rin pa
chachen po ni mun pa thams cad yongs su sol cang 'gro ste/ khyim gyi nang na gnas na'ang rab tu snang bar byed do/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa
'khor los skyab pa'i nor bu ran po che chen po'ang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel cing 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du 'gro ste/ 'dod pa'i khams na gnas na'ang mi shes
kyi snang ba chen po rab tu 'gyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na gang 'ang rung ste/ nor bu rin po che chen po an nA la'i 'od kyis phog pa de dag thams cad na
nor bu rani bo che chen po an+dan la' kha dog tu 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du soms bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po ane nA la'ang chos gang dang gang la
rnam par spyad pa dang yangs su btang ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ca'ang rung// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyod pas yongs su bsngos pa de dag thams cad kyang/

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar nanor bu rin po che ba zlum ni le brgya phrag stong du ma gtsang ba'i nang zhigen 'dug kyang/
dra che zhim pa thams cad dang lhan cig ma gnas te// de'i rang bzhin 'od gsal pani de bzhin du gsal zhing shan tu dri ma med do// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du se mas bskyed
pa'i nor bu rin po che bo cha rlu'ang bskal pa brgya phrag stong zhig tu 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gnas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi skyon thams kyis kun nas nyon mongs par ma 'gyur te//
chos kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba na de bzhin du shani tu dag par gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dperan nor bu rin po ma chen po dri ma mad pas rnam nga ra dag pa'i 'od ces bya
ban rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyad pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i 'od kyang so
so'i skye ba dang/ slob pa dang/ ma sgrib pa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas zal gyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na rin
po che chon bo me 'byung ba zhes bya ba na gtsage pu gnas kyang mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che mi 'byung ba lhag mthong
dang ldan pa gcig pu'ang tshul bzhin yadi la bya bas ma shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sal to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na rgya mtsho chen po nas khrus blangs pa'i nor bu rin
po tshe rani tang med pa tshong pa'i lag tu 'ongs pa na gling khyer du phyin na/ nor bu mchang bu brgya phrag stong yang kha dog dang ran tung gis zil gyis gnon to//
de bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po na gnas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyade du sems bskyed pa' nor bu rin po che chen po rani tang med pa smon lam gyi grur bcug ba na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dang po bskyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud la 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'a grong khyer du ma phyin kyang rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer du phyin na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
nor bu mchang bu lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas kyang
dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu na gnas pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim gzhal madra khang ga gzugs bar n gyi rgyan yongs su ston to// de bzhin du yon tan thams rgyud kyis yongs su
sbyangs ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'ang 'khor ba'i gnas na 'du bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' spyod yul las
rgyu ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i na zla dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi dekyil 'khor thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su ston to// rigs kyi bu 'ad la ste/
ba dper na ja snyad du rta zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar byed pa de srid du nor dang/ 'bru dang/ rin po che'i rnam ba dang/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ me tog dang/ spos rung/ 'phrang ba dang
gos dang/ longs spyod gang ji snyed nga de dag thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gyi rgyal po ba rini du ma chog go/ de bzhin du ja sI da dus gsum la thams cad mkhyen pa'i
ye shes kyi dbyangs kyi yul snang bar mdzad pa de sradi du lha dang/ ma dang 'a nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba' rtsa ba zug pa yod pa 'am/ ngo ga pa med pa
gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub tu song sa bskyur pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i ren du ma chog go/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po
cha chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni rgya mtsho'i rgyan thams cad yongs su ston do// de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bslad pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rgya
mtsho'i rgyan gyi dam pa'i ng thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul rgya ma tsho'i rgyan thamu cad yongs su ston do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che che na po yade bzhin kyi
rgyal po ma gtogs par lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar las lhag par 'phags pa gang yang med do// de ba'achi du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nor bu rin po che che na po yang bzhani
bar bya// gyi rgyal po ma gtogs par/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar las lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang med do//
ragis kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na klu'i tshogs grub par gyur pa'i sbrul 'dul ba na klu dang sbrul thams cad la dbang gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
pa'i nan tan kyi klu'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sbrul 'dul ba'ang nyon mongs pa'i klu dang sbral thams cad la dpang sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu 'ad lta ste dper na
dpa' bo lag cha dang ldan pa na dgra' 'khor gyis tshugs par dka' 'o// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyed po'i lag cha dang ldan pa 'byang chub sems dpa'i
thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis thub par dkar 'o// rigs kyi bu 'ad lta ste// dper na lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phyi ma srang
gcag gas na stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim pos rgyas par 'geng ste/ de zho gcig tsam la'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su gang bas
ran du ma chog go/ da bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyad pa lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po lhag pa'i basam pa gcig la gnas pa'i khams kyang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad
yon tan gyi dri zhim ngos rgyas par 'gengs te/ slob pa dang/ maslob pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyang zal rgyas gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na tsan dan ran

bo che chen po kha btsan dan zhes bya ba na gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lus thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar byed do// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyide ru sems bsnyad pa'i kha ba'i//
tsan don rin po che'ang nyon mongs pa'i kun tu rtog pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtamug gi gdung ba thams cad kyang rang tu sul to// ye shes kyi lus kyang rab tu sim par byed do//

rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na ra'i rgyal po rarab kyi drung du ji snyed cag lhabar 'dor ba de dag thams cad kyang gser kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang su'ang rung sta/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' drung du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa 'di kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi

bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shing sus kyang ma tshugs pa dang kun nas 'du ba'i shun phrags kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba de lta bu na/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga mi rtog ngas sha ka dang/ ma tog dza Da dang/ me tog su man la
sogs pa me tog ga rnam pa thams cad la'ang mad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa de du sems bskyed pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i smon lam gyi ngeshangag yon tan dang/ ye shes kun
thags kyi dri zhim po'i ngang 'byung ba de lta bu ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ma tog bar sha ka dang/ me tog dza ti dang/
ma tog sumana' tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ya shes mthong ba zag pa med pa dang ldan pa thams cad la'ang mang do// rigs kyi/

bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na shang sus kyang ma thub pa dang/ kun nas 'du ba kha 'bus par gyur na/ me tog stong phrag mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur par shes par bya'o// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi

ru sems bskyed pa'i shang kun nas 'du ba dge ba'i rtsa bas kha 'bus par gyur na/ lha dang ma grangs med pa'i byang chub kyi me tog zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i skya gnas su 'gyur bar shes
par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na shang kun nas 'du ba'i mi rtog gis 'a mo gcig tu bzos pa'i gos sam/ til mar las dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba de lta bu 'ong me tog tsam pa ka dang/ me tog

su ma nas nyami brgya phrag stong du bsgos pa' gis sam/ til mar las kyang ma 'byung ngo// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa 3di kyi sems kyi rgyud tsho gcig tu yongs su bsgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon

tan dang/ ye shes kyi dri zhim po'i ngang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi drung du ldang ba de lta bu ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bskos par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems lasakyang zag pa med pa'i

dge ba'i rtsa ba dang chos kyi ye shes kyi dri zhim po ma 'byung ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shang ga rags na la lar zhes bya ba rgya mtsho gnod pa dang bral ba nas skya ba yod do// de'i rtsa pa yan cha ma tog gi

bar du'ang dus thams cad du nam du'ang sems can rnams kyi te bar 'tsho bar ma 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin du snyang rje chen po dang smon lam gyi rtsa ba yang dag par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ya/nga thog ma

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nas zhe par bzung ba phyin chad dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i many+dzar thug gi bar du nam yang lha dang bcas pa' 'jig rten gyi nye bar 'tsho bar ma 'gyur ba med do// dgis

bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dngul chu'i riges gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod do// de ni srong gcig gnyis kyang lcags srang stong gsar du 'gyur ro// dngul chu srang gcig pu den lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba
ram lcags su bsgyur bar ma nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyod pa'i ro'i khams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa'i ye shes kyis bzung ba na las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgra'i
pa' lcags thams cad zad par byas te/ chos thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nying kyi kha dog tu byed kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ri'i khams gcig pu de na/ las dang nyon mongs

pa'i lcags thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba 'am/ zad par ma nusaso// rigs kyi bu pad lta ste/ dper na me na ji tsam du chung du zin kyang rkyen ji tsim dang phrad pa de tsam gyi me lce yongs su spyodado

[s/]u// de bzhan du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i mi ji tsam du chung du T+Tani kyang dmagis pa rgyachen po'atshogs kyi skyon ji tsam dang phrad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi 'od 'bro pa rab

[$+ ]tu dgye bas rnam par 'phel bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me mar gcig las me mar bye ba brgya phrag stong zhig lus kyang/ me mar de ni de snyed byung bas ma zid de mthar thug pa med do// de bzhin/
du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyed pa' me mar gcig las 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thugs bskyed pa'i
ma mar mang po 'bar yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rta sams bskyed pa'i mi mar gcig pu de na ri ser skya thams cad mkhyen pa 'ad du sems bskyed pa'i ma mar byung bas ma zad de mthar thug pa med do//
ragis[é] 'di lta ste/ dparan me mar gcig cig tsami mam khang bu nga lta bur bcug kyang rung ste/ bcug ma thag tu le stong du bsags pa'i mun pa'i ng rnam par selan+dari snang bar byed do//
de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyim thabs po ma rag pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa ji lta bu 'ang rung ste/ de'i rgyud du phyin na de phyin ma thag tu
bskal pa brgya stong brjod du med par bsags pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrub pa dang/ mun pa thams cad rnam par sel cing ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su skyong do/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper

[d]na me mar ni snying po jatsam pa de'i rkyen tsam du snang bar byed de/ mar gyi tshogs ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'bar ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyang pa'i mi mar yang/ byang

chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi snying po'i khyad par tsa 'dra ba de lta bur chos kyi dbyangs yongs su snang bar byed de sang rje chen pos spyod pa'i mar gyi tshogs ji srid du gnas pa de srid du/ sems can gdul
ba dang/ zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku don bsgrub pa la yongs su 'bar bar gnas so/// shan tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po cha
zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam po brgya bcu gsum po// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dpe na lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu chu klung ga gsar gyi rgyun lha ri rgyul po dbar sgyur
gyi mgo la thogs pa na/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha' bu thams cad kyis ma 'phrogs so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ru sems bskyad pa lha rjes kyi 'dzam bu chu klung ga gsar gyi rgyanonan
tan dang/ yon tan la rang tu gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma ldog pa rnams kyi smon lam chen po'i mgo la rdzogs pa na/ byas pa bu dad pa'i skye bo dang/ slob pa dang 2 ma skyol pa dang/ rang

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'a rdzogs so// ragis kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na ra dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge la re ltos na sing ga'i phrug gu skyes nas ring bo ma lon pa'i ng nyams su bde zhing rma2 2 ri dgas thams
[s]@#// cad na kun tu 'byor bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i sang ge chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nga ro byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzong pa phyung bas na//

[+ ]las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seng ge 'i phrug gu rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis nyams su bde zhing rta'i/ ngamagis pa la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ni kun tu 'byor ro// rigs kyi bu 'di/

lta lta/ dpar na seng ge 'argyus pa las rgyud du byas pa'i pa zung ga sgras na pa wang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'chad do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'i nga rol du phyin pa'i sku mngar ba'i byad
chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyus pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i sgras 'dod pa'i rgyud kyi dga' ba'i pi wang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'chad par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang
yon tan gyi gdam thams cad kyang yongs su 'gag par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu 'ad lta sta/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ba dang/ ma he dang/ ra' 'o mas yongs su gang ba' nang du seng ge 'i 'o ma
thags ga rug blugs pas/ 'om thams cad 'gyes par 'gyur te 'dur ma btub bo// de bzhin du bskal pa brgyaphrag stong du bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa kun gyi 'o ma'i chu mtshor yang de bzhin
gshegs pa skyes bu'i sing ga chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyod nga 'i 'o ma'i thogis pa gtsagi blugs pas thams cad ma lus par zad par 'gyur de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi gnas mi 'du'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na bya ka la bang ka' phrug gu sgo nga' spyabs nas ma byung ba la da re' mtha'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni//
gangs kyi re la gnas pa' bya'i tshogs mthu dang shugs thams cad yongs su tshogs pa thams cad la'ang med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' na la bang ka'i phrug gu las dang po pa 'khor
pa'i sgo nga' spubasan 'dug pa la sAng rje chen po dang/ byang chub kyi sems kyi nga ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do/ rigs kyi bu
'di lta ste/ dpar na nam mkha' lding chen po'i phrug gu skyes nas rang po ma lon pa la gshog pa'i rlung ga stobs dang/ mthu bdog pa dang dmag yongs su dag patshwa yon tan yod pa de lta
bu ni de ma yin pa'i bya lus tshad du phyin pa gzhan thams cad la rang mdaro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' snang chen po'i rogs dang/ rgyad du byung ba' sbyong tshul sams
dpa' nam mkha' ltang chen po'i phrug gu sems dang bo bskyed pa la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bslad pa'i gshog pa'i rlung gi stobs dang/ shugs bdog pa dang/ sang rje chen po dang/

lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mag yongs su dag pa'i yin tan yod pa'i ken thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas bskal pa brgya stong tshang bas byung ba thams cad la med do/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu chen po'i lag
[rg]// nas spyad pa'i mde'u thung gas na gi cha ji tsam du sra'ang brtol to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kartson 'grus brtan pa dang ldan pa'i lag nas spyad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa

[H ]nyid du soms bskyed pa'i mde'u thung gis kyang lta ba dang bag la nyal ba'i gi rma thams cad ma brtol ba mad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mthu bo che chen po khros te brngam pa'i dpral ba la thor

bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du 'dzam bu'i gling ga ma thams cad kyis kyang ma thub bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che chen po snying rje chen po bam pa'i sdig pa'i ngesam pa' gdong la thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du sems bskyod pa'i zer bu ji srid du gnas pa de srid du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis kyang ma thub bo// rigs kyi bu
'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon gyi mchan bu mabyang ba 'phong ga thabs la ma goms pa la 'phong ga gnas dang/ thabs kyi mthu dang/ khyad par bdog pa de lta bu na thams cad la byang
yang 'thong ma shes pa rnams la med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'acang shes las dang po pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sa la goms pa lasmon lam gyi ye shes dang mos pas spyod pa'i mthu'i
khyad par ca bdog pa de lta bu na/ byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad dang/ slob pa dang/ ma slob pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do// rigs kyi bu
'ad lta lta/ dpar na 'phong slob pa'i 'phong gi rgyus thams cad lan dang por rkang pa'i stangs la goms par bya ba la sngon du 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa 'di
kyi sa la slob ngas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la'ang/ dang por thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa' lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas pa sngon du 'gro'o//
rags kyi bu 'ad lta sta/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang/ yul thams cad yongs su ston pa'i bya ba thams cad na deng por sngags kyi dngos grub mngon par bsgrub pa yade la byas na/
'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la'ang
dang po sems bskyed par smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni yongs su grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i sngags dang/ rig sngags thams cad ni gzugs med la bstan
du med pa yin yang/ mas bskyed pas skya me'i sprul pa dang/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su ston to/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ng gzugs/
mad la/ bstan du mar de chos kyi dbyings thams cad sems bskyad pa la dbang sgyur ba tsam gyis chos kya rebyangs thams cad yon tan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyis rnam par sgrub bo// rigs
[s] ]@#// kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dparan bya la' mgi gas blta ba tsam gyis byi ba thams cad kun tu 'byor ro// de bzhin du byang chub sams dpa'i thems cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems
[H ]bskyed pa' lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba tsam gyis las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'dzam bu chu klung ga gsar gyi rgyan btags na rgyan thams
cad zil gyis gnon to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems 'dzam bu chu klung ga gsar gyi rgyan thogs pa 'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan zil
gyis gnon to// za'i dro rlag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na rdzob khab long ga rgyal po'i khams ji tsam du chung yang lcags sgrog sra ba thams cad zhagis par byed do//
de bzhin du sems thag ba nas baspyad pa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyad pa'i khams ji tsam du chungayang lta ba'i rnam pa dang/ marag pa dang/ srid pa'i sgrog thams cad zhags
par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dpar na rdzob khab long ga khams gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der lcags phal pa thams cad 'gyes shing ma gnas la ma 'du'o// de bzhin du
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i khams kyang las sam/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam grol ba gang dang gang du byung ba de dang de dag gi las dang

[c/ ]nyon mongs pa thoms cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad kyang 'byar zhing ma 'khod ma 'du'o// ragis kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na chu srin gyi tshal gyi zolags/
ma gcig zos pa'i zhi pa na tshu'i srog chags thams cad kyi 'jages pa dang bral ba yin de/ chu sran gyis sos btab kyang lus la ma tshugs so// de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chug kyi
