sams kyi chu gcig zos pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a yang 'khor ba'i las dang/ nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par

khong du chud par bya ba'i nang na 'dug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya ba'i lam gol bar ltung bas gnod par ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na bdud rtsi'i chu 'thus pa'i skyes bu ni
gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad kyis ma 'o'i// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa'i ng/ nyan thos dang rang sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi sar ma 'chi'o// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje che na po'i smon lam las kyang rgyun 'chad par ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'dalta ste/ dper na bsku bsgrub pa'i skyes bu na mi'i gnas
thams cad rnam par spyod kyang ma kun gyis ma mthong ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i shes rab dang/ smon lam gyis nye bar brkan pa bdud kyi yul thams cad la rnam
par spyod kyang bdud thams cad kyis ma mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po chen po la rten pa'i skyes bu ni sa ngo ma rabs thams cad kyis ma 'jigs so//
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa chos kyi rgyal po chen po la rten pa rang// sgrib pa dang/ bar chad dang/ ngan song thams cad kyis mang jigs so//
ra'i sa kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa phug gi khyim na gnas na sa' gseb thams cad rlon gyis yongs su gang bas ma'i 'jigs pa mad do// de bzhin du byang chub sams kyi rgyud byang chub kyi
sems kyi dge ba'i de bas mngon par brlan nga la'ang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi mis 'jigs pa med do// rags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpang na dpa' bo
la rten pa'i m ni dgra thams cad kyis ma 'jigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyod pa dpa' bo la rten pa'i ng sbyod pa ngan pa'i degro thams cad
kyis ma 'jags so// rigs kyi bu 'a di ltasta/ dbar na lha'i debang bo brgya byin rdo rje'i lag cha thogs pa na lha ma yan gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub srems
dba' mas cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa brtan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje'i lag cha thogs pa' nga bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jom mo/
rigs kyi bu 'ang lta sta/ dper na rtsa ri'i bcud 'thus pa'i skyes bu ni tsho shin tu ring bar gnas so// nyam chung bar ma 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/
mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyed pa'i ri'i bcud kyi tshigs 'thungs pa'i ng bskal pa grangs med par 'khor yang yongs su skyo ba med la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
dpar na sman gyi rogyur ro cog thams cad du chu na sngon du 'gro ba ste/ gang la'ang skyon du ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byung chu sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi tshogs sbyar ba thams cad du
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyod pa na sngon du 'gro ste/ gang la skyon du ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dparan ma'i don du bya ba thams cad lan srog gi dbang po sngon du
'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag bar byung ba la'ang byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes du srog ga
dbang po dang bral ba ni las thams cad la mthu med nga sa pha ma dang/ gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis kyang nye bar 'tsho bar byar med do/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa
ted du sems bskyed pa dang bral ba'ang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par bya ba la mthu med pas/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan gyis nye bar 'tsho bar byar
ched do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na rgya mtsho chen po na dug thams cad kyis gdug par ma nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyed pa rgya mtsho
chan po'ang las dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas su sams bskyed pa'i dug thams cad kyis gdug par ma nus so// rigs kyi bu 'a di lta ste/ dpar na nya ma'i de khyil
'khor na skar ma thams cad kyi 'od kyis thub par ma nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyed pa'i 'o ma dkyale 'khor yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skar ma sbrams cad
kyi yon tan zag pa med pa'i 'od kyis ma thub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ des na rgyal po'i bu skyes nas yun rang du ma len pa'i ng blon po 'a mchog tu bya ba nas rgan pa thams cad rigs su
rigs dang ldan par skyes pa dang dbang gas zil gyis gnon to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs

su skyes pa'i las dang po pa'i ng/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod spyod pa'i nyan thos nas rgan pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi sing rje chen po'i dbang gas zal gyis gnon te// ragis kya bu 'di

lta ste/ dper na blon po ji tsam du nas rgan pas kyang rgyal bu gzhon nu dza tsam du chung ba la'ang phyag bya dgos so// rgyal po'i bus kyang blon po rgan po la rim gro ma bya ba ma yin no// de bzhin du/
[}]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ji tsam du rgan la/ ja tsem du tshangs pa'i spyod pa rang du skyod spyod pa rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la gdud par bya'o/ byang chub sems
dpas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro med par bya ba ma yanano/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po'i bu thams cad kyis ma dgos par bya ba zhag na'ang rgyal po'i
mtshan dang ldan na/ rigs kyis btsun pas rgyal po'i blon po dam par bya ba thams cad dang yang ma mnyam me/ de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' las dang nyon mongs pa'i tre par len pa
thams cad kyis non pa'i ng thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i mtshan dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis btsun zhing che bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mchog tu phyin pa thams cad
dang yang ma mnyam mo/ rags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na nor bu rin po che yongs su dag pa na mag la rab rab kyi skyon yod na yongs su ma dag par snang ngo// de bzhani du thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rin po che rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i ng sems can dad pa'i mgi mngeshes pa'i reb rab kyi skyon dang ldan pa rnams la yongs su ma dag par snang ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
sta dper na rtsa'i gzungs sngags dang rtsa thams cad bsdus te byas pa na rog gam/ mthong ngam/ 'grogs na'ang sems can gyi nad rab tu zhu bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems
kya sems kyi smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi lus dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshigs dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs kyi sngags dang/ rtsa thams cad las bsgrubs pa byang chub kyi sems
dang ldan pa na thos sam/ mthong ngam/ 'grogs sam/ rjes su dran pa'i tshul gyis kyang sems can gyi nyin mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ rags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper

na gos dang bar mtshan nyid can na 'e dam gyi nyes pa thams cad kyis ma gos so// de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi gos dang ba'i mtshan nyade can na 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa 'dam gyi skyon thams cad
kyis kun nas nyon mongs par ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dbar na shang gi gzugs mgo gzer gyis btab pa na yongs su 'gyes par ma 'gyur de bya ba thams cad kyang byed do//
de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon pa'i ye shes kyis lus kyi spyi bo byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam gyi gzer gyis btab pa'i ng byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la mthu
yod do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi ye shes las lus su grub pa yin pas yongs su 'gyes par ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi ba 'di lta ste/ dper na gzar drang ma ldan
pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni shang ga yan lag de nyid yin yang dgos pa bya ba'i mthu med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa 'a lhag pa'i thisam pa
dang ma ldan na/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs de nyid yin yang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa la mthu mdu ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la/
rin po che a ka ru nag po glang po'i sdong po zhes bya ba yod pa des bdugs ma thag tu rgyal po 'khor 'os sbyar ba'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyang nam malo' la gnas par
'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bslad pa a ka rus bdugs pa'i byeng chub sems dpa' deg pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang khams gsum pa thams cad las rnam
par 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshes/sa pa' ma shes nam mkha' spyod yul 'dus ma byas pa thams cad kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rdo rje na ren po che ma rabs
kyi 'byung khung nas ma 'byung ga/ rdo rje'i 'byung khung ngam/ gser gyi 'byung khung nas 'byung ngo/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyad pa rdo rje lta bu 'ang sems can gyi bsam pa'i

dge ba'i rtsa ba ma rabs kyi rin po che'i 'byung gnas nas ma skye ste/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su skyob pa'i snying rje chen ngo 'a rdo rje'i 'byung khung ngam thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lhag/
par dmigs pa'i gsar gyi 'byung khung chen po nas 'byung ngo// rages kyi bu 'ad lta ste/ dpar na shang gi lagis rtsa ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i rtsa ba mthar thug pa ma dmigs mod kyi/ shing
tsa @#// rnams la yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma togashAn tu rgyas pa dra ba lta bur gyur pa snang ngo/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sams bskyed
ba' rtsa ba'i mthar thug pa'i ng ma demagos mod kyi/ 'jig rten rgya skyed gnas thams cad du'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams dang/ ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa'i
ma togashin tu rgyas pa smon lam chen po'i dre bar gyur pa'i ng yongs su snang ngo// rigs kyi bu 'ad lta ste/ dper na rdo rjen snod ngan pa'i gzhi la 'dug na mdzes par ma snang ngo// snod ma brdol
pa ma gtogs par snod rdol ba dang bu gcan gyis gzung bar ma nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i sdorje chen po'ang sems can mos pa zhan pa'i snod dang/ sor
snacan nam/ tshul khrims ngon pa can nam/ gnod sems can nam/ le lo can nam dran pa 'khrugs pa 'am shes rab 'chal pa'i rnams la ma mdzes te/ byang chub
sems dpa' lhag pa' bsam pa rin po che'i snod ma gtog par sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa log pa la zhugs pa blo ma brtan pa'i snod kyis kyang gzung bar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu
'ad lta ste/ dper na rdo rjen rin po che thams cad 'bugs so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rdzong sangs rgyas kyi chos rani po che thams cad thugs par
ca khong du chud par byed do// rigs kyi ngu 'ad lta sta/ dper na rdo rjen brag thams cad shages par 'jom mo// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyad pa rdo rje'ang lta ba'i rnam pa
thams cad kyi bragshegs par 'jom mo/ ragis kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na rdo rje rin po che na chog kyang thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i gser gyi rkyen tral rgyas gnon to// de bzhini

du thams cad mkhyen pa 'di tu sems bskyod pa rdo rje rin po che bsam pa log par zhugs pas chag par gyur kyang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi gsar gyi rkyen zil gyis gnon to//
rogs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje ran po che na chag kyang/ 'phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du thoms cad mkhyen pa 'de du sems bskyed pa rdo rje ni po che nan tan med
pas chaka par gyur kyang/ 'khor ba'i 'phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel do// ragis kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rdo rje'i khams na ji tsam zhig tu chung yang nor bu dang rdo thams cad gcog pa'i
ma chen 'di do/ de bzhin du dmigs pa ji tsam du chung ba la zhugs kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje'i khams na mi shes pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa' mchan
nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rdo rje rin po chen skye bo ma rabs kyi lag tu phyin par ma 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa 'di du sems bskyed pa rdornga rani po tshe'ang
ma rabs kyi bsam pa dang ldan pa dge ba' rtse ba ngan ngon can gyi lha dang mi'i lag tu phyin par ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dpar na rin po che yongs su brtag pa

[+ ]la cha mkhas pa'i skyes bu na rdo rje rin po che'i yon tan nyams su myong bar ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shes rab 'chal pa'i ngeng tshul dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag kyang byang chub kyi sems rdo rjer po
rgyu chen po'i yon tan la ma mkhas pas kyang/ de'i yon tan gyi khyad par nyams su myong bar ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'ad lta ste/ dper na rdo rjen zhu bar ma nus so// de bzhin du

thams cad mkhyen pa de kya rgyur gyur pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje yang zhubar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu 'ad lta// dpar na rdo rje'i lag cha chen po na gzhan dun mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/
ltar khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu stobs kyi shugs drag po ma gtogs par stobs po che chen pos kyang bzung bar ma nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa 'di du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i lag cha
chanapo'ang gzhan du na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu'i stobs kyis brtan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa'i mthu bo che chen po'i stobs ltar khyad par du 'phags pa//
stobs kyi shugs chen po'i rab tu thob pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas stobs po che thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung bar ma nus so/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mtshon
[o/ ]chathams cad kyis ma tshugs pa gang du'ang rdo rjes mi tshugs pa med de kha ma 'bab bo// de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba 'am/ dus gsum gyi bskal par spyad par

sdug stal dang 'grogs par bya ba gang du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang ye shes kyi mtshon chas rdugs pa/ de gang la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rje rje'i mtshon
cha chen po thogs pa' byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba'i yadi med pas na ma bzod pa med de kha ma 'bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rdo rjen gzhan du na rdo rje 'di las gyur pa'i
gzhi ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gang gis kyang gzung bar ma nus so/ de bzhan du byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i smon lam gyi tshogs rdo rje ni gzhan du na lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems/
bskyud pa rdo rje brtan pa'i sa'i gzhi ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzung bar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i snod de
rje'agazhi sra zhing gsab mad pas chu gsang du 'dzag par ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dege ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje gsob med pa yongs su bsngos pa la gzhi can
la gnas pa'i ng srid par skyod pa thams cad kyis zad par ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na rdo rje'i gzhi la rten nga 'a las chen po na 'jig par ma 'gyur ro// dma' bar
ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byung chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje sla ba'i gzhu la rten pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnams kyang khams gsum thams cad du 'jig par ma
'gyur/ dmar bar ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na rdo rjen chus bangs pa 'am/ rul bar ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje'ang las dang
rgyu nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi chu'i bskal par gnas kyang rul bar ma 'gyur/ bas par ma 'gyur ro// rtags kyi bu 'di lta ste// dper na rdo rjen mi thams cad kyi drod kyis kyang tshig par mi 'gyur
yongs su gdung bar ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen ba nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje'ang 'khor ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi mi'i drod thams cad kyis ma tshig go/ nyon mongs pa thams
cad kyi mi gdung bas gdung bar ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sAng po byang chub la bzhugs shing

bdung rgol du bzhug pa mdzad pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams kyi gdan na/ gzhan du na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jag rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i lte
ba' sa' gam gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis gzung bar ma nus so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang/ sbyad pa
spyod ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ bzod pa la 'jug pa dang/ sa thob par byed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ lung bstan pa
gongs su nod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad nye bar rton pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang/ chos kyi sman chen po yongs su 'dzin
pa rnams kya dege pa'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang/ shugs dang drag shul de dag kyang gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa 'di du sems bskyed ba smon lam thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje sla ba'i lte ba can ma
gtogs par/ sams gzhan gyis yongs su gzung bar mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nA yon tan de dag dang/ gzhan tshad med pa nas

yon tan gyi khyad par brjod du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang yon tan gyi chos de lta bu dang ldan par gyur
to ldan par 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskyod de/ yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa yongs su tshol ba na khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo// rigs kyi bu khyod na re ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bya ji lte nan tan du bya zhes zer ban deragi kyi bu khang ba brtsig pa chen po
rnam par snang mdzad kyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi nang du song ste ltos shagi dang/ der khyod kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
bar bya ba dang/ bslabs nas kyang yon tan ji lta bu yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba shes par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi ba nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces smras so/ 'phags pa pho brang brtsegs pa'i chab sgo dbyer gsol nang du mchi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khang pa brtsigs pa
rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po' yi drung du phyin te/ lag pa g.yas pas sa gol gtogs de rgyu byung ba dang/ de'i sgo de'ang rang bye bar gyur pa dang/ des sbas pa/rages

kyi bu da khang pa brtsegs pa 'di'i song zhig de nas tshong dngo na gyi bu nor bzangs ngo mtshar chen po thob par gyur te/ long pa btsugs pa de'i nang du phyin pa dang/ phyin ma thug tu sgo de'ang rang ched par
gyur to// des mthong ba khang ba btsugs pa de shin tu rgya che zhing yangs la/ rgyar dpag tshad brgya stong mang po dang ldan pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshod kyis gzhal ba/ 'khor thams cad du nam
mkha'i dbyangs ltar yangs pa/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyi rgyan grangs med pas brgyan pa/ rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mu tig gi 'phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu

sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa// rin po che'i 'phrang ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nga/ mu tig dmar po'i 'phrang ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nga/ seng ge 'i

chu tig gi 'phreng ba grus med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ seng ge 'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa// zla ba dang zla gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dar gyi lta

lha sna tshogs grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dar gyi ba dan sna tshogs grangs mang pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nga/ rin po che mang po grangs mang pa'i 'od kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gsar gyi

dra ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa// rin bo che'i snam bu grangs mad pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gsar gyi lcags pod rin po ches smras pa grangs med pa'i rkye na gyis brgyan pa// dral bu sgra snyan pa

'byung ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa// rin po che'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dri ba bskyod na yad du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba grangs med pa'i skyon gyis brgyan pa// lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po'acher mngon par
'bab pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi 'phrang ba'i lta lta mngon par sbyangs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyisabargyan pa gam yo nas sbos kyi snod nas bdug spos 'thul ba'i yo byad/

grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ pu shu'i dra ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ skar khung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
rta babs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ba gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ma long ga dkyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa//

[+ ]/ rin po che'i pha gu grus mad pa gtams pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'atshoge pa grangs med pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i ka ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dzani po che'i

gos kyi spun grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ni po che'ishang grangs mad pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'akhri 'phang grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i lam grangs med pa'i

rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che grangs med pa'i ba dan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan ba/ sa'i gzhi rgyan sna tshogs grangs med pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ rin kho chu grangs med pa las brtsigs pa'i khang pa'i rkyen gyis

brgyan pa/ rin po che'i khra grus med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i bu mo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i snam bu grangs mang po bting ba'i 'chagasa' rgyan gyis brgyan pa/

'dzam bu chu klung ga gsar gyi chu shing ga ka pa ni tu rnam par phye ba grangs mang pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis gzugs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ byang chub sems pa'i lus

gras med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa grangs med pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i srog shing 'dzin pa grangs

med pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ rdzing bu grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog puN+Da raka grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i them skas grangs med pa'irgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i

stegs bu rnam par bkod pa grangs med pa' rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rani po[]sna tshogs grangs med pas smras pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od grangs med pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan gyis

brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad rnam par phye ba grangs med pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ khang pa 'artsegs

pa de 'azhing na'ang khang pa brtsigs pa gzhan brgya song 'di lta bu'i rgyan gyi lhab lhab kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dun grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa nas/

yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i bar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gang bar mthong ngo// khang pa btsugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la/ de ltar tshad med de nam
ma kha'i mdzod du gyur pa// kun nas kun tu spa bar 'khod par mthong ngo// des khang pa brtsigs pa rnam par phya bde dag thams cad kyang dmigs pa gcig la phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang/ than tshun
ma 'dzangs pa dang/ phan tshunasal sal por 'dug par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du de la snang bar gyur te/ dmags pa gcag la ji lta ba de bzhin du dmagis pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la'ang
snang bar mthong ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying bo'i yul dang/ rnam par
'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa de lta bu dag mthong nas/ dga' ba'ashugs dpag tu med pa rnam par 'phal ba'i spro ba dang/ mos pa chen pos lus dang sems mngon par brlan pa dang/
'du shesakyi rnam pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i yod dang/ skyob pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang rmos pa thams cad dang rnam par bral ba dang/ 'khrul pa med pa'i phyogs
la rab tu gzhol ba dang/ sgra thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i dran pas rnam par dmagis pa'i rna ba dngaldan pa dang/ yid la bya ba'i rnam par 'khrug pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/ rnam par
thar pa sgrib pa med pa' tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blo dang/ dmags pa thams cad la sgrub pa med par mge ba tu 'gro bar gyur nas/ phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad la mngon du bltas pa'i lus kyi phyag
bya bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs thams cad du khyab pa dang ldan pa'i lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas so/ de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis phyag bya yi thag tu/

byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du bdag nyid phyin par shes par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad du'ang rnam par 'phrul
pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i yul can rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po'ang mthong bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsigs pa la lar na byang chub sems dang la byams pas thog ma rags na gang du skyes
te mang bya zhes bya bar gyur pa zhig gse dge ba'i rtse ba gang dang/ yongs su bskal ba gang dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang gis yang dag par bskul ba dang/ tsho'i tshod ni ji tsam zhig tu/ bskal

pa'i ming na ci zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa na gang la/ rgyan na ji ltakhu zhige dang ldan pa'i zhing du/ 'khor na ji lta bu zhig tu/ smon lam gyi khyad par na ji lta bu zhage mngon par bsgrubs te/ bla na

cha du ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam gyi sems bskyod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// shes par gyur to// khong du chud par gyur to// de'i tshesems can de dag dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i sku tsha'atshad dang/ 'a tshod ji sridi tsag tu gyur pa de tsam gyi dus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug par yang shes par gyur te/ bya ba de dag thams cad
kyang mthong bar gyur to// khang pa btsugs pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thog ma gang du byams pa'i ting nge 'dzan thob par gyur pa dang/ dus gang nas bzung sta/ de'i mang byams pa zhes

bya bar gyur pa de dag mthong bar gyur to// la lar na gang du spyod pa spyad pa dang/ la lar na gang du pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang/ la lar na gang du bzod pa la zhugs pa dang/ la lar
@#// na gang dus non pa dad/ la lar na khe nga du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rgyun yongs su bzung ba dang/ la lar na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bzung ba dang/ la lar ni

gang du ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang/ la lar na gang du blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang/ rnam pa na ji lta bu zhagi tu lung bstan pa dang/ lung du sus
bstan pa dang/ yun na ji srid cag gis lung bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa la lar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor los sbyar pa'i rgyal por gyur de//
sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa mthong bar gyur to// la lar na 'jig rten gyi mgon por gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi phan pa dang bde ba thams cad kyis sems can rnams la ke
bar sdud pa dang/ la lar na brgya byin du gyur te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba las sems can rnams rnam par zlog pa dang/ la lar na tshangs par gyur te/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i
dga' ba sems can rnams la yongs su rjod pa dang/ la lar na lha'i dbang po rab mtshamar gyur te/ tshud mang pa'i yon tan sems can rnams la yongs su rjod pa dang/ la lar na lha'adebang po
rab dga' ldan du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gas thogs pa'i yon tan rjod pa dang/ la lar na lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' bar gyur te/ lha'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa'
0 thams cad kyi sprul pa'i rgyan yongs su ston pa dang/ la laran lha'i rgyal po dbang skyar du gyur te/ lha rnams la chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba yang dag par ston pa dang/ la lar na bdud du gyur
te lha rnams lo phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ma rtag par ston pa dang/ la lar ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i gnas su skyes te/ lha ma yin gyi 'khoran nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa dang/ rlom pa thamA

cad rab tu spang ba dang/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba dang/ chos kyi ye shes kyi skya slob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa mthong ngo// khang pa brtsigs pa la lar ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten
mthong bar gyur te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba thams cad snang bar byed cade/ sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal
ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo// khang pa brtsegs ba la lar na yi dgas kyi gnas mthong bar gyur te/ de na byang tshub sems dpa' byams pa sems can ya degs kyi

gnas su skyes pa rnams la kha zas dang btung ba mang po nye bar sgrub cing bkres pa dang skom pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo// khang pa brtsags pa la lar na byol song gi skye gnas na skya ba'i skya mched
rnam pa tha dad ba sna tshogs kyis byol song ga skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can mang po 'dul ba mthong ngo// khang pa brtsigs pa la lar na rgyal po chen po'i khams su gtogs pa'i lha'i
'khor na 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo// la lar na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor na/ la lar na lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i 'khor na/
la lar na lha' rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi 'khor na/ la lar na lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i 'khor na/ la lar na lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi 'khor na/ la lar na bdud kyi 'khor na/ khang pa
brtsags pa la laran tshangs pa'i dbang po'i 'khor na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo// la laran klu dang lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor na/ la lar na gnod sbyin dang srin po'i
'khor na/ la lar na dri za dang ma 'am rtsa'i 'khor na/ la lar na lha ma yin dang gsod 'phrog ga debang po'i 'khor na/ la lar na nam mkha' lding ga dbang po chen po'i 'a khor na/ la lar rnami'i/
'khor na/ khang pa brtsigs pa la lar na lha dang/ glu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra ze dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rnam mkha' ldang dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang ma ma yin
pa'i 'khor na/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo// la lar na nyan thos kyi 'khor na/ la lar na rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor na/ la lar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor na/
khang pa brtsigs pa la lar na byang chub sems dpa' sems thog ma bskyod pa las dang po pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo// la lar ni spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams la//
la lar ni bzod pa thob cang phyir ma ldog pa rnams la/ la lar na tshe gtsagi gas thogs shang dbang bskur ba rnams la/ khang pa brtsegs ba la lar na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la
gnas pa rnams la sa'i khyad par yongs su brjod pa mthong ngo// la laran sa bcu la gnas pa' bor rgya byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sams dpa ra byams
pa sa thams cad kyi khyad par yang dag par bgro ba byed pa mthong ngo// la lar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ la lar na bslab pa thams cad la mngon
du 'jug par bya ba kun tu mtha' yas pa dang/ la lar na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug pa rgya chen po dang/ la lar na rnam par thar pa'i tshul zab mo dang/ la lar na bsam gtan dang
ting nge 'dzan dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa// mngon par shes pa zhi ba' yul gyis rgyus par dgang ba dang/ la lar na byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa dang/ 'dul ba dang/ thabs kyi sgo la
'jug pa dang/ la lar na smon lam mngon par bsgrub pargya chab dang/ khang pa btsugs pa la lar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa skal ba maskrun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
'grogs shang 'jig rten la phan par bya ba'i don du bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang/ gtsug lag gi khyad par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde par 'gyur ba dang/ 'byor pa rnams lang/
glu// dag par 'gro ba mthong ngo// la lar na byang chub sems dpa' tsho gcig gis thogs pa rnams dang 'grogs shang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi shes la dbang bskur ba'i sgo yang
dag par 'gro ba mthong ngo// khang pa brtsigs pa la la na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'chag pa byed cing/ lo brgya stong du mar ma stong brtson pa mthong ngo// la lar na lung 'bog pa dang kha
tshe1 rton bya pa la brtson par/ la lar na chos kyi sa rab tu brtag pa la brtson par/ la lar na dem pa'i tshes 'gro ba la brtson par/ la lar na rim pa' ris bri ba la brtson par/ la lar na byams
pa la mnyam par bzhag par/ la lar na bsam gtan dang tshad med pa thams cad la mnyam par bzhag par/ la lar na rgyas pa' skye mched dang/ rnam par thar pa thams cad la mnyam par
bzhag pa dang/ khang pa brtsags pa la lar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo//
khang pa brtsegs pa la lar na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa yod pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po mthong ste/ de dag gi lus thams cad dang ba sbya'i sgo thams
kha sprul pa thams cad kyi spyani mang po 'byung ba mashong ngo// la lar ni lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas na lha' ris kyi spron mang po 'byung ba mthong ngo// la la'i ni lus
[4/ ]dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas na klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang//
'jig rten gyi mgon po dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba' sprani mang po 'byung ba dang/ la la' lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas na khams kyi rgyal po' sprin mang po 'byung ba dang/ la la' lus
dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni rgyal bu gzhon nu'i spran mang po 'byung ba dang/ la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas na tshong dpon dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag gi ljin mang po dang//
la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang po dung/ la la'i lus dang ba stsa' sgo thams cad nas na de bzhin gshegs
pa' sku'i spyan mang po dang/ la la'i lus dang ba 'a sgo thams cad nas na sems can thams cad du sprul pa'i sbrani tshad mang pa 'byung ba mthong ngo// la la lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas

na tshes kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba thos par gyur to/ 'ad ltar byang rtsubasams dang 'a yon tan bsngags pa'i sgo dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyan pa'i sgo dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/
brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ smon lam dang/ stobs dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang/ bsam gtan dang/
[s/ ]@#// tshad med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzan dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ gzungs dang/ spobs pa dang/ bden pa dang/ tha dad pa yang
[+ ]dag par shes pa dang/ zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang/ rten cang 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ brten pa dang/ chos kyi mdo dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/
yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyu thag
pa'i gtam dang/ theg pa chen po'i gtam dang/ sa dang/ bzod pa dang/ spyod pa dang/ smon lam gyi sgo dang/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa'i sgra mang po 'byung ba thos so/
khang pa brtsigs pa la lar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dus par mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga rnam pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs skye ba dang/ rigs
rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sku rnam par phya ba tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sku rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ zhing rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ chos bstan pa rnam
pa tha dad pa dang/ 'byung pa'i sgo rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa rnam pa tha dad pa nas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang ma lus par
mthong par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i stong pa de' dbus su khang pa brtsegs pa gcig cagi gzhan pas rma la yangs shang/ khang pa
brtsegs pa gzhan thams cad kyi rgyun ma lus pa thams cad pas kyang ches lhag par 'phags pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa zhig 'dug par mthong sta/ khang pa brtsigs pa de'i nang
na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dug pa mthong ngo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dang/ 'dzam bu'i ging bya
ba phrag brgya dang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya'akhod par mthong ngo// 'dzam bu'i gling de dag thams cad na'ang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa pad+mo'i nang nas skya ba dang/ brgya
byin dang tshangs pas yongs su blangs pa dang/ gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas pa dang/ sang ga'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa dang/ gzhon nu'i sa thams cad/
yongs su ston pa dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang/ bza' shing gi ra bar 'gro ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs te mngon par byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang/
dka' ba'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang/ zas za ba dang/ snang bo byang chub tu 'gro ba dang/ bdud rgol du 'jug pa dang/ byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ byang chub kyi shang la mag ma
ka@#/ 'gabs pas lta ba dang/ tshangs pa chen pos gsol ba gdab pa dang/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i yul sna tshogs yongs su

bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ tshul dang mang rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa tha dadapa dang/ tshul tshod sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang/

sbyo sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'i tshul bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ spyod pa dang smon lam brjod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ chos bstanatsang rnam par dgod pa dang/
sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ ring bsrel bgo ba dang/ bstan pa gnas pa'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing/ lha' gnas su 'gro ba mthong ste/ de dag thams cad na'ang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs nyid rkang pa'i drung na 'dug par rang gis shes par gyur to// de 'khor rgya
dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ bya ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang/ tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la dran pa ma nyams pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad
khong du chud pa'i yi shes kyis la gnas pas/ khang pa brtsigs pa de dag gi dril dang/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang/ rol mo dang klu la sogs pa' demags pa ji snyid cig yod pa de dag thams
cad las chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsam gyis ma khyab pa 'byung ba thos par gyur te/ la la lasan byang chub kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ la la lasan pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang/ smon/
lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ la la las nas tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ la la las na mngon par shes pa bsam gyis ma khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ la la las ni
de bzhin gshags pa' mchod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ la la las na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ la la las na de bzhan gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin tshad med pa
rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgra gang du ji skad du brjod pa thams cad thos par gyur to// la la las ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug nga 'i sgra thos te/ 'jig rten gyi
khams che ge mo zhig ces byang chub sems dpa' mang dang che ge mo zhig gas chos kyi sgon cha gamo zhig ces bya ba thos/ dge ba'i bshes gnyenan che ge mo zhig gis yang dag par bskul/ de bzhin gsheg
ban che ge mo zhig ga zhangs kyi drung du/ bskal pa'i mang na 'di zhes bya bar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'ad lta bu zhig tu/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/
dge ba'i rtsa ba ni 'ad lta bu zhig bskyad nas/ de bzhin gshags pa'i yon tan na 'di lta bu dag cagi thos te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa na 'di lta bu dang/ smon lam gyi rnam pa na 'di
'dra ba zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ des bskal pa na 'ad snyid cag tu byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa 'di snyed cag ga bla na med pa
[H ]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// mtshan na 'di zhes bya/ sku tshe'i tshad ni 'ad tsam zhag su/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan dang/
rkye rgyan phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra ba dang/ smon lam gyi khyad par 'di lta bu zhig dang/ sems can rnam par gdul ba 'di 'dra ba zhig dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
'khor kun nas 'dus pa 'dadri ba zhig go/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa 'ad snyid cig tu dam pa' chos gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi don na 'di tsam
zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i sgra thos so// la la las ni 'jig rten gyi khams chage mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang dang chag mo zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ gtang
bar dka' ba 'di lta bu yongs su gtong ba brgyan byad do// byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhig na tshul khrims srung ngo// bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan
la snyoms par 'jug go/ shes rab kyis rnam par dbye ba brtson no// byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhig na dmapa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don du rgyal po'i srid yongs su gtong bar byed do//

bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mang dang che ge mo zhig gas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'a bstan pa bzung ste rmas sna bar byed do// chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ngo// chos kyi mchod sbyin
byad do// chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgrung ngo// chos kyi rnga rdung ngo// chos kyi dung 'bud do// chos kyi char 'babs so// de bzhani gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin te// de bzhin gshegs
pa' mchod rten rgyan pa byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rgyan pa byed do// sems can la bde ba'i yo byad kyis sdud do// dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod srung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra thos so//
la la las ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan che ge mo zhig dbang skur ba ming dang che ga ma zhig gas 'khor 'di lta bu zhig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'di lta bu zhig dang/ bskal pa 'ad lta bu zhig la/ sku tshe'i tshad 'datsam zhig dang/ chos bstan pa 'di lta bu dang/ sems can 'dul ba 'ad 'dra ba dang/ 'di lta bu'i smon lam gyis
mngon par 'tshang rgyu bas/ da ltar bzhugs shange 'tsho skyong ngo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du dril dang/ dril bu g.yer ka' dra ba dang/ rol mo la sogs pa'i dmags pa thams cad las//
dus dbu// chos kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i sgra thos par gyur te/ sgra de dag thams cad thos pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen pos mngon par

par gyur to// la lar na spyod pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar na smon lam gyi sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur te//

gar la lar na mngon bar shes pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar na rig pa dang ye shes snang ba'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar

thos kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs bar n rnam par dmags pa dang/ la lar na rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmags pa dang/ la lar ni de

na rnam par dag pa'i zhing ga gzugs bar n rnam par dmigs pa dang/ la lar na kun nas nyon mongasashing rnam par dag pa'i zhing gi gzugs bar n rnam par dmigs pa dang/
la lar na rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa' zhange ga gzugs brnyan rnam par dmags pa dang/ la lar na sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs

bar n rnam par dmags pa dang/ la lar na sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song dang/ ya degs kyi gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmagis pa

chub sems dpa' grungs mad pa dgos pa sna tshogs la brtson pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur tu/ la la ni 'chag pa dang/ la la na bsam gtan byed pa dang/ la la ni lta ba dang/ la la ni
soms can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa dang/ la la ni gtsug lag gi tshul sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi don du 'gyur ba bskyab pa dang/ la la na lung nod pa dang/
la la na kha ton byed pa dang/ la la na ya gi dra ba dang/ la la ni dro ba yongs su 'dra ba dang/ la la na phung po gsum pa'i bshags po dang yongs su bsngo ba labartson pa dang/
la lan smon lam mngon par sgrub par byed par mthong ngo/ ka ba de dag las kyang rin po che'i rgyal po ma cad kyi 'od kyi dra ba mang po 'byung ba mthong ste/ la la las ni
'a dog sngon bo dang/ la la los ni kha dog sar po drang la la las ni kha dog dmar po dang/ la la las ni kha dog dkar po dang/ la la laMm nu shel gyi kha dog dang/ la
la las ni gser gyi kha dog dang/ la la las na in+d+ra nI la'i 'a dog dang/ la la las na 'ja' kha dog dang/ la la las ni 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar kyi kha dog dang/ la la
las na 'di thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i kha dog dang de lus dang sams kyi bde bskyed pa blta mchog tu mdzes pa mthong bar gyur to// 'dzam bu chu gling ga gsar gyi chu shing gyi ka ba de

gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ la gnas spos dang bdug spos dang/ byug pa dang/ lag nas nor bu rin po che'i dra ba dang/ lag nas rin po chesna tshogs dang/
gsar gyi lcag pod sna tshogs dang/ lag nas mu tige sna tshogs kyi se mo do dang/ lag nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do mngon par sbyong ba dang/ lag nas rgyan thams

bar mthong ngo// mu tige ga 'phrang ba de dag las kyang spos sna tshogs kyis dra zhim por byas pa'i chu yan lag brgyud dang ldan pa'i char gyi rgyun phra mo 'bab par mthong ngo// rin po che/
bama'i 'phrang ba'i dri ba de dag las kyang mar ma'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba mang po mthong bar gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de dag kyang rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis mdzes par

brgyan pa'i snying po dang ldan par mthong ngo// rdzang de dag nas kyang rin po che'i me tog pad+mo dang/ ut+pa la dang/ ku mud dang/ buNAr kegrangs mad pa mngon par 'thon par mthong ste/
la la na mtho gang 'khor ba tsam/ la lan 'dom gang 'khor ba tsam/ la la nadi shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam ste/ de dag la'ang gzugs sna tshogs kyi rgyan mang po 'khod par mthong ste/
daltar bud med kyi gzugs dang/ skyes pa'i gzugs dang/ khye'u'i gzugs dang/ bu mo'i gzugs dang/ brgyabyin gyi gzugs dang/ tshongs pa'i gzugs dang/ don zhabum bamkhyen

dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang 2 byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa mang bo sbyar te//
lus 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod pa mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung du bcas te bzhugs pa dag kyang mthong
ngo sa chen po'i gzhabartud+ma las grub pa mig mangs ris su 'dug pa'i mig mangs ras re re nas kyang gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa mang po mthong bar gyur te/
la la las na zhing ga gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs/ la la las ni byung chub sams dpa'i gzugs bar n rnam par dmigs pa/ la la las ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
brnyan rnam par dmagos par mthong bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsigs pa de dag gi rgyan dang lhab lhab ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mge mangs ris re re la gzugs bar n du snang bar

tsam byung ba dang/ la la las na lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang ma 'am ci dang/ lta

sgyur ba dang/ mi'i dbang po'i lus phyed tsam byung ba dang/ la la las ni rgyal bu gzhon nu dang/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang/ blon po dang/ skyes pa dang 1 bud madra dang/
khya'u dang/ bu mo dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan ma'i lus phyed tsam byung ba mthong ste/ la la'i lag nas na mi rtog gi 'phreng
ba sbyong ba dang/ la la'i lag nas na rin po che'i 'phrang ba mngon par sbyong ba drang/ la la'i lag nas na rgyun thams cad mngon par thogs pa dang/ la las na lus 'dud cing thal/
mo sbyor te/ mag ma 'gabs par lta zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang/ la lan mngon par bstod pa dang/ la lan mnyam par gzhag pa dang/ la lan gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang/

ba dang/ la lan nor bu rin po che rnam bar snang ba'i kha dog tu 'dug pa rang/ la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang/ la la na ma rtog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu 'dug pa dang

kyis mag mangs ris sna tshogs su bris par mthong ste/ rin po che'i mag mangs ris de dag thams cad las kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
ram pas ji ltar spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ram par mthong bar gyur to// mag mangs ris la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
go byin pa mthong ngo// la la las na mig sbyin pa dang/ la la las ni lag pa byin pa dang/ la la las na gtsug gi rin po che byin pa dang/ la la las ni thor pag dang

can yongs su skul ba dang/ spos dang byug pa gsol zhing 'bru mar gyi dri zhim pos byug pa dang/ dril bu dang me tog gi 'phreng ba gsol ba la sogs pa drang/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod
pa rnam pa thams cad la brtson pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang/ gso sbyin gyi yan lag brgyad dang/ sangs
rgyu rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs btsal ba dang/ rab tu 'byung pa dang/ chos mnyan pa dang/ lung mnod pa dang/ kha ton bya ba dang/ tshul bzhin yid la bya ba la
sems can 'gong bar byed pa dang/ chos kyi gtam bya ba'i phyir sang ge'i stan la 'dug cing/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par 'grel pa dang/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams
bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan zhing/ lus kyi 'du byed thomadog bde la snyoms pa dang/ gnyid mad de ma dga' ba thams cad yongs su bsal bas dga' ba dang bde ba rgya chen po
nyams su myong ste yun kyang ring mo zhig lon pa snyam nas nyin gcig gam/ nyin bdun nam rba zla ba phyed dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ lo gcig gam ( lo brgya 'am/
de bas kyang rang ba zhig lon pa tsam du shes par gyur nas sad na de thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyang/ byang chub sams dpa'i byin rgya
rlabs dang/ khams gsum pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyis chung ba' 'du shes 'gags pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te 1 byang chub sems
dpa' 'du shes kyi rnam pa yangs shing che ba dang/ sgrib pa med pa la gnas shang 1 byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan gyi yul khong du chud la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul la 'jug pa
pasam kyis ma khyab pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i blo dang ldan pas/ rgyan rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// shes par gyur to// nyams su myong bar gyur
to rnam par dpyad par gyur to/ mtshan mar byas par gyur to// dmags kyis rtogs par gyur to// bdag khyod kyang de dag na 'dug par shes par gyur to// 'di lta ste//
sa la gnas te/ mtha' yas pa'i rgyan dang yul rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta sta/ dparan skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i
[+ ]rnalam du gzugs kyi demagos pa'i khyad par sna tshogs mang po zhig mthong bar gyur te/ 'di ltar khyim dang gzhal med khang mdangs dga' ba 'am/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs
dang yul mdangs dga' ba/ma/ bkra' shang ga ra ba dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal mdangs dga' ba 'am/ shang dang/ chu klung dang/ rdzong dang/
ri mdangs dga' ba 'am/ gos dang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba'i longs spyod nyams su bde ba 'am glu dang/ sil snyan dang/ rol mo'i sgra snyan pa sna tshogs kyis rtsa ba nyams
su dga' ba zhagi mthong ngas/ pha ma dang/ gnyen bshes dang/ bdag nyid 'grogs par shes par gyur pa 'am/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ ri'i rgyal po ra reb dang/ lha'i gnas
thams cad dam/ 'dzam bu'i gling dag na bdag dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar gnas par shes par gyur la/ khyim mam/ gnas de'ang shin tu yangs shing yon tan dang rgyan thams cad
kyis yongs su brgyan par mthong ste nyin par zhig yin par shes kyang nam de'ang rang ba dang thung bar bye brag mi 'byed la/ rmi lam yin pa tsam du'ang ma shes so// bdag nyid kyang/
bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan zhing/ lus kyi 'du byed zomadog bde la snyoms pa dang/ gnyid mad de ma dga' ba thams cad yongs su bsal bas dga' ba dang bde ba rgya chen po
nyams su myong ste sgra yun kyang ring mo zhig lon pa snyam nas nyin gcig gam/ nyin bdun nam zla ba phyad dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ lo gcig gam 1 lo brgya 'am//
de bas kyang rang ba zhig lon pa tsam du shes par gyur nas sad na de thams cad kyang rjes su dran no// de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin rgya
rlabs dang/ khams gsum pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyis chung ba' 'du shes 'gags pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te// byang chub sems
dpa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa yangs shing che ba dang/ sgrib pa med pa la gnasashang 1 byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gyi yul khong du chud la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul la 'jug pa
bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i blo dang ldan pas/ rgyun rnams par sprul pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// shes par gyur to// nyams su myong bar gyur
to/ rnam par dpyad par gyur to// mtshan mar byas par gyur to// dmigs kyis rtogs par gyur to// bdag nyid kyang de dag na 'dug par shes par gyur to// 'di lta ste/
tham// bar n ma nad pa sams kyi rgyud tha ma byung bar gyur te/ de ma thag tu skyo ba'i sems nye bar gnas nas/ las kyi sladi pa mngon du gyur na/ las ji lta bur byas
shange bsags pa'i rnam par sman pas las ma dge ba'i rkyen gyis na sems can dmyal ba dang/ phyol song ga ste gnas dang/ ya dgas kyi phu la lam gshin rje' ma lag chu gtems
ba thogs pa gshe zhi khro ba dag kyang mthong bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i dred mo dang/ 'o dod kyi sgra'ang thos par gyur la/ ba tsha chu de dag mthong ste/ spu gri'i sa gshibs
pa'i ri de dag dang/ lcags kyishal ma la'i sdong po de dag dang/ ral gri'i so'i nags tshal de dag kyang mthong bar gyur tum/ sems can dmyal ba de dag kyang kun nas 'bar zhing yongs su
'khar ba dang/ rab tu 'bar ba dang/ lcags kyi bum pa gcige chu 'bar ba de dag kyang mthong bar gyur la/ gnod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang gnod par bya zhing/ tshor ba de dug kyang
nyams su myong ba tsam du shes par gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba pa de dag kyang ma'i gdung bas sdug bsngal ba zhig tu mthong ngam/ bdag gis myong bar gyur tam/ las dag pa'i
tshogs kyis lha'i khang pa dang gnas shig mthong bar gyur tam/ lha'i 'khor dang/ lha mo'i tshogs dang/ rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te/ bza' shing ga ra
ba dang/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang/ chu klung dang/ rdzing dang/ rin po che'ar dang/ yadi bzhin gyi shing dang/ longs spyod mang po mthong ngam/ nyams su myong bar gyur te/
tshe'i yun kyang de dang mnyam par shes par gyur na// de na 'di nas kyang 'phos pa med/ der yang skyes pa med de/ mi snang bar ma gyur bzhin du/ las kyi yul bsam gyis ma khyab pas
bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag shesashang mthong la nyams su myong bar rung ngo// de bzhin du tshong dbon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyi yul bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i
phyir rgyan rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dpar na skyes bu 'byung bo'i gdon gyis non pa ni/ gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mthong ste//
ci dris pa de dag gi lung yang ston to// de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis 1 byang chub sams dpa' ye shes dang byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus rgyun de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to//
'di lta ste/ dper na klu'i khang par phyin pa'i skyes busan klu'i 'du shesa rnam pa la zhugs pas/ nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ zla ba phyed dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ lo
gcag gam/ le brgyar yang 'du shes kyi rnam pas shes to/ klu'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang bral nas/ mi'i 'du shes kyi rnam par na yud tsam las ma lon par mthong ngo// de bzhin/
du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes kyi rnam pas ma btang ba'i blo dang ldan pas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byan gyi
rlabs kyis yud tsam gcig pu de'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por shes par gyur to// 'ad lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal mang khang 'gro ba thams cad na
rgyan gyi dam pa phul zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du dmags pa thams cad dang ma 'dres par gsal
bar snang ngo// de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyang/ rgyun de dag thams cad dmags pa thams cad du phun tshun ma 'dres pa dang/ phan tshun ma 'dzangs par gzugs
rab tu byung ba ma thong ngo// 'ad lta ste/ dper na rgyas pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la rnam par spyod pa'i dge slong na gcig pu gnyis su med par khang du 'am/ 'chag
sa 'am/ 'dug pa'i gnas na 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ 'jig rten thams cad rgyas pa'i skye mched gang la snyoms par zhugs pa' yul bzhin du bsam gtan pa'i yul
bsam gyis mi khyab pas mthong zhing nyams su myong ngo// de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyang yul gang la zhugs pa'i tshul bzhin du[？ ]skyon de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes
te nyams su myong bar gyur to// 'dalta sta/ dpar na dra wa'i grong khyer rnams kyi rgyan dang lcab lhub thams cad nam mkha' dbyings la byung ba na yongs su snang yang/ rtsa 'ang skyab par ma
'gyur ro// 'ad lta ste/ dpar na gnod sbyin gyi gzhal med khang mi'i khang pa na 'dug pa 'am/ ma'i khang pa gnod sbyin gyi khang pa'i khongs na 'dug pa na phan tshun tha ma ded de 2 las kyi yul
rnam pa ji ltar dag pa'i tshul bzhin snang ngo// rad lta ste/ dpar na rgya mtsho chen po la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rgya'i gzugs brnyan ltar snang
ngo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po na sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ rtsi'i mthu dang/ byin gyi rlabs kyis gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad dang bya ba thams cad kyang yongasasu ston
do 4de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs ye shes sgyu ma bsam gyis ma khyab pa la zhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang
dang byin gyi rlabs kyi yi shes chos thams cad shes pa'i sgyu ma'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mthus rgyan gyi yul rnam par sprul pa de dag mthong bar gyur to// de nas byang
'ang pa brtsogs pa de'i nang du song ste/ byin gyis brlabs de dag brtul nas/ tshong dbon gyi bu nor bzangs la se gol gyi sa byas te/ 'di skad ces
smras so// ragis kyi bu 'ad na chos rnams kyi chos 'di yan gyis longs/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad na rnam par bsgrubs na nye bar 'grub pa'i mtshan nyid de/
[+/ ]byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rang bzhin de lta bu sta yongs su mgrub pa'o// sgyu ma dang/ rmi lam dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bu 'o// de nas tshong
sbyidapon kyi bu nor bzangs se gol gyi sgra des ting nge 'dzin de las langs par gyur pa dang/ de la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub
sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mthu dang rgyu mthun pa mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems
dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mdangs dga'i ba mthong med/ khyod kyis byung chub sems dpa'
spyod pa yongs su bsdu ba mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung pa'i sgo thos mod/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyun tshad med pa mthong mod//
khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa'i khyad par mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
[p/ ]byas mod/ khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang bde ba myong mod/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis brlabs
ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis dgongs pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mthus mthong ngo// 'phags pa rnam nga ra thar pa 'di'i mang ru zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'ad ni dus gsum gyi dmags pa thams cad la shes pa rab tu zhugs pa'i dren pa nyams pa med pas brgyan pa'i sang po zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam
par thar pa 'di lta bu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag na tshigatsag gas thogs pa'i byung chub sems dpas thob po// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa
rgyan de dag gang du mchis/ smras pa/ gang nas 'ongs pa der ro// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ gang nas mas/ smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis
byan gyi rlabs mngon par bsgrubs pa las 'ongs so// de na byin gyi rlabs de 'di la gnas shing gang du'ang song ba mad la 'phos pa mad do// phung por gyur pa med do// tshogs su
gyur pa med do// brtsegs par gnas pa med do// dngos por gnas pa mad do// yul na gnas pa ma yin no// phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
klu/ 'dapar na klu rnams kyi sprin gyi dra ba na lus la'ang ma gnas/ sems la'ang ma gnas nang na'angam gnas mod kyi/ klu'i sems kyi dbang dang/
klu'i dbang bsam gyis mi khyab par char gyi rgyun tshad med pa bskye ban med pa ma yin te snang ngo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang nang na gnas pa'i ng ma yani/ phyi rol na
gas pa'i ng ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin kyi rlabs kyi dbang dang/ khyod kyi snod bzang ba'i phyi'i mi snang ba'ang ma yin no// rags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar
na sgyu ma'i mkhan pos ni yul shrams cad yongs su bstan kyang 'ongs pa med/ rshig kyang gang du'ang 'gro ba medu de/ 'pho ba med mod kyi/ sngags dang rtsa 'amathus yongs
su+om snang ba ma ya nino// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyun de dag kyang gang du'ang song ba mad/ gang nas kyang 'ongs pa mdu la/ gang du'ang phung por gyur pa med mod kyi/ byang chub
sams dpa' ye shes skya ma bsam gyis ma khyab pa la shani tu bslabs pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlangs kyi rang/ ye shes kyi dbang gis yongs su ma snang ba ma yin
no nor bzangs kyis [”]smras pa/ 'phags pa shul ji sridi tsag nas gshogs/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gro ba na 'ongs pa med par 'gro'o//
[z ]g.yo ba dang gnas pa med par 'gro'o// gnas dang rten med par 'gro'o// sha 'pho dang sa ba med par 'gro'o// gnas pa dang 'pho ba mad par 'gre'o// g.yo ba dung lta ba/
med par 'gro'o// ltos pa dang gnas mad par 'gro'o// las dang rnam par smin pa mad par 'gro'o// ma skye ba dang ma 'gag par 'gro'o// rtag pa med pa dang chad pa mad par
'gro'o/ gzhan yang rages kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni 'dul ba'i sems can la lta bas sAng rje chen po'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni
sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su skyob pas byams pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni gang du dga' bar skye bas tshul khrims so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi 'gro ba na sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam mo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni thams cad du bzhin yongs su ston pas mngon par shes pa'o// byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas g.yo ba med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba na lus dang
sems yongs su ma gtong bas len pa dang 'dor ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba na sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bsanga shes rab dang thabs so//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba na mig yor dang/ gzugs brnyanudang/ sprul pa lta bu yin pas sprul pa yongs su ston pa'o//
[+ ]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod lam ji sridi nas 'ongs shes khyod kyis smras pa na/ rigs kyi bu nga na tshor sa yul 'phreng ba stobs kyi grong rdal khang khyim can zhes bya ba de na/ tshong dpon
sa skyong zhes bya ba 'ge yod de/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos la bzhag nas tsho' sa'i mi rnams la snod kyi tshul bzhin du chos bstan pa byas te/ pha ma dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim
bdag gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams sbag pa chen po la yang dag par bskyal nas 'dir 'ongs so// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi tsho'i sa gang 'gas/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tsho'i sa sta bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi si mas
na byang chub sams dpa' rogis su spyad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tsho'i sa'o// lhag pa' bsam pa na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rigs su skyod pas/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi tsho'i sa'o/ sa la gnas pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs su skyod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// smon lam mngon par bsgrub
pa ni spyod pa'i rigs su skyod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tsha'i sa'o// snyade rje chen pon bsdu bas dngos po thams cad kyi rogs su spyad pas/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi tsha' sa'o// yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du chos rtog par bya ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rolo tu phyin pa'i rigs su spyad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshi2
sa'o theg pa chen po ni thabs mkhas pa'i rigs su skyod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshi' sa'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par
'chang rgya ba'i rigs su spyod pas 1 byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tsho'i sa'o// thabs dang shes rab ga/sa na ma skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i rigs su skyod pas/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi tsho'i sa'o/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi nan tan ni 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su skyed pas/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tsho'i sa ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rma'i sa'o// rags kyi bu thabs mkhris pa ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi pha'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma'o/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na 'o ma'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na mi ma'o// bzod pa'i
pha rolatu phyin pa na lhab lhub dang rgyan to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa na spyod pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa na spyod pa rnam par dag par byed
[+ ]pa'o[：]dge thu'i deshes gnyen rnams na bslab pa la spyod du 'jug pa'o/ byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad+ha na grogs po'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad naganyen bshes
so/ byang chub sems dpar thams cad ni 'u nu po ro bya nga chub kyi sems ni rigs so// nan tanAn rigs kyi chos so// sa'i gnas na rigs kyi gnas so// bzod pa thob
pa na rogs su rigs dang ldan par skyes pa'o// smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa na rigs kyi gzhung thob pa'o// spyod pa rnam par dag pa ni rigs kyi chos kyi rjes stags pa'o//
theg pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba na rigs kyi rgyun ma gcod pa'o/ de dbang bskur nas tshe gcig gis thogs pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras kyi thu bo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
nyid du yang dag par bsgrub pa ni rigs kyi rgyud yongs su drug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byis pa tha dadra pa'i skye bo'i sa las shan tu 'das pa yani/ byang chub
sems dpa'i skyon mang por zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su yang dag par byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa yin/ dkon mchog
pa00 ]gsum gyi roges rgyunam gcad pa la zhugs pa yani/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs yongs su bsdu ba la mngon par brtson pa yani/ rigs dang rus kyis yongs su dag pa yin/
gnad kyi rgyud kyis smad du mad pa yin/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ bdud dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye
dgu'i nang na rigs la smos pa'i skyon thams cad kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi rogis dam par skyes la/ smon lam chen po'i lus dang ldan pas rigs
kyis btsun pa yani/ rigs kyi bu rgyud kyi rigs de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams na chos thams cad gzugs bar n lta bur yongs su shes pas/ 'dzag/
rten gyi skye gnas thams cad smad pa med pa yin te/ srid pa'i skye gnas thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes pas/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye zhing gnas pa thams cad kyis
kun nas nyon mongs par ma 'gyur ro// chos thams cad bdag med par khong du chud pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul bas yongs su ma skyo'o//
byams pa chen po dang sang rje chen po'i lus dang ldan par sbyar/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pas ngal bar ma 'gyur ro// 'khor ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su rtogs
bu/ @#// pas bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas skyid lug par ma 'gyur ro// phung bo thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pas/ skye ba dang/ 'cha' bo dang/ 'dza
ba yongs subastan pa thams cad kya'i dub par ma 'gyur/ khams dang skye mched chos kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin du rab tu rtogos pas/ lul thams cad kyis rnam 'byung ngo// 'du shes kyi
rnam pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis mos bar m 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad la rnam par rtse bas bdud kyi yul
khams cad kyis ma gos so// chos kyi lus su byung bas nyon mongs pa thams cad du smos su med do// skya ba la dbang rab tu thob pas 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par khongs su
chud pa yan no// ragis kyi bu de ltar nga ni'ajig rten gyi khams thams kyi skye gnas kyi khongs su tshud pa' lus dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs dang mnyam pa'i kha dog gi khyad
tshe par dang/ sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i nges pa'i tshig gi bye brag dang/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mang rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi chos
ba dang mnyam pa'i spyod lam dang/ 'gro ba rnam par gdul ba thams cad dang mnyam pa' 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ sems can rnam par dag par bya ba thams cad dang
tsamatshamanyam pa'i tshe dang/ rigs su skye ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ byas pa' spyod pa thams cad dang mnyum pa'i bya ba 'jug pa 'a sgo dang hra sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa mas/
cad dang mnyam pa'i yongs su shes par bya ba la 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi sprul pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus yongs su bstan cing brjod pas/
chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang sta/ sngon skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa'i sems can byang chub kyi sems stong bar gyur pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ 'dzam
bu'i gling du skyes pa'i tshe yongs su bstan pa dang/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di'i yul 'phreng ba stobs kyi grong rdal khang khyim dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di'i bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa rnams
dang pha ma dang gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams rnam par gdul ba dang/ bram ze'i rigs dang rgyud kyi khyad par gyis rags kyis nga rgyal can du gyur pa 'di dag nga rgyal medra par byas te/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyod pa'i don du 'di'i skyasaso// rigs kyi bu de ltar ng lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'din thabs rnam pa 'di lta bu s sems M can bsam pa'i tshul ji lta bu dang
ldan pa dang/ rnam pa ji lta bur 'dul ba rnams yos su sman par bya ba dang gdul ba byed tsang/ khang pa btsugs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po
cakhag glu/ 'di ni 'dug go/ lang nas sha 'phos kyang bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs
[+ ]pa' lha'i bu skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ 'dod pa'i khams nas yongs su 'das pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang/
ya shes dang/ sprul pa'i rgyan yongs bstan pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i srid pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'du byed thams cad ma rtog pa 'di du bstan pa dang//
lhar skyes pa thams cad kyang mthar rgud par 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ ye shes chen po'i chos kyi sgo 'chi 'pho'i rnam pa zhes bya ba tshe gcig gas thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
rnams dang yang dag par bgro bar bya ba dang lhan cig yongs su smin par gyur pa'i rnams der skya bar yongs su bsdu bar bya ba dang/ de bzhAni gshogs pa shAkya thub pas bkye ba' ped+ho
rnams kyang kha dbye ba'i phyir/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su skya ba yongs su ston to// dus la bab la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni thams cad mkhyen pa 'di kyang thob par byed kyis/
ngas byang chub thob nas kyang rigs kyi bu khyod dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par bcas pas da dung yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//song rigs kyi bu da dung yang
[ro/ ]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dang sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil
'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang/ ji ltar mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ ji ltar smon par bya ba dang/ ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang/ ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ ji ltar
yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang/ ji ltar khong du chud par bya ba dang/ ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dris shig dwang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la ston pa ra 'gyur ro//
de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong la rang
mad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni tshod med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sams dpa' yon tan gyi khyad par thams
cad mngon par bsgrub pa ni tshad med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa na/ sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khragabargya phrag stong gi yum lta bu 'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa ni u0f7a/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong la gdams ngag ston pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs
[r ]@#// su sman par bya ba dang gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa 'o// 'aN+Dam dbal gzhon nur gyur pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su mang gi 'khor los
[+ ] rnam par rgyas par gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa'o// 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa// chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta bzhin
du mthong ba ste/ chos zab mo'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa na/ rnamapar thar pa thams cad kyi tshul thams cad la rang du song ba'i spyod yul dang ldan pa
ste byang chub sems dang 'a spyod pa kun tu bzang bo la zhugs pa'o/ 'gis kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa' rigs su spyad pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
yongs su 'phel bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshigs mang bo rab tu sgrub pa'o// yang dgapa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o// yon tan thams cad la yang dag par
skul ba'o// smon lam chen po'i dra ba thams cad du 'jug pa'o// smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad la rab tu gzhog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba
thos par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dang 'a bsam gyis ma khyab pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'o// sngon gyi tsho'i gnas su skal pa mthun par sbyong pa'o// rigs kyi bu de bas
na khyod da ltar yang 'jam dpal gyi rkang pa'i drung na 'dug gas/ yon tan gyi gdams pas thams cad thob par bya ba dang yongs su skyo ba ma skyed cig/ yongs su skyid lug par ma byed
cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nor bzangs khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji snyed cig mthong ba dang/ spyod pa'i sgo ja sod tsag thos pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i tshul ji snyed
cig la zhugs pa dang/ smon lam gyi khyad par ji snyed cig khong du chud pa de thams cad kyang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs su blta ste//
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyas/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te byang chub
sams dpa' khyams pa'i drung nas song ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer bskyartsa bcu kun tu brgyus te/ phyogs kyi gnas yid bde ba mngon du
'gyur ba zhes bya ba zhig na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la somasangashang rnam par lta bas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar mos shing
[H/ ]smon la phrad par dga' bas sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dpag tshad brgya rtsa bcu bzhi'i pha rol nas lag pa brkyang / tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzungs grong khyer yade bde ba mngon du 'gyur ba na 'dug pa'i spyi bor gzhag ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// dad pa'i dbang po dang/
ldan pa/ sems skyo ba can bsam pa zhum pa can/ sbyor ba bor ba/ brtson 'grus ldog pa// yon tan cung zad kyis dga' bar rtse grwa 2 dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la zhen par
gnas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam mngon pa bsgrub pa la ma mkhas pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyis yongs su ma bzung ba/sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis ni chos
nyidi 'ad lta bu yongs shes par bya ba dang/ tshul 'di lta bu dang/ spyod yul 'di lta bu dang/ gnas 'di lta bu yongs su shes par bya ba dang/ rnam par shes par bya ba 'am/
khong du chud paMr bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ yid ches par bya ba 'am/ brtag par bya ba 'am/ rtog par bya ba 'am/ thob par bya bar ma nus so zhes te/ des de la
chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag nga ra bstan pa dang/ yang dag par bsal ba dang/ gzengs bstod pa dang/ dga' bar byas te// chos kyi sgo grangs med pa dang ldan par byas nas/
ye shes mtha' yas pa'i snang ba chen po thob par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang/ spobs pa dang/ dang nge 'dzin dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ye shes mtha' yas
pa'i byin gyis byin du brlabs par byas te/ kun tu bzang bo'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag nas/ bdag gi yul la'ang rab tu gzhag ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi
drung nas song ngo// shin tu rgyas pa chen po' mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/// shan tu
rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong bos brgyan pa'i le'u ste/ bam po brgya bco lnga pa ste tha ma// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/
dge ba'i bshes gnyen stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shan tu phra ba sed bsan bkur ba// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs bsags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzan pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi drung du bsam pa mnyam pas 'gro nga
glud/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dga' bar bya bas yade ma debyung ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan
[+ ]pa' tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba/ snying rje chen bo'i bsam pa rgya mtsho lan Na lam par tshud ba'i skang po dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po'i tshul gyi sprinagyis 'gro ba thams
cad rnam par snang bar byed pa/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs rnam par 'phel nga'i lus dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa rgya chen po la rab tu zhi bar rnam par
srod pa/ sgo thams cad nas lhag par 'phro ba'i gtong ba'i mog dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan dan rab tu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshagrwa
pa thams cad kyi mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa// thams cad mkhyen pa 'di kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phal bas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
sems dang bsam pas shani tu sbyangs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad
tshakyi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho khong du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba/ 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du gzugs brnyan
yongs su ston nga 'a spyod yul dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtshol zhugs pa// bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong
pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thams cad rnam par 'phal ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
lam snang ba rab tu thob pa/ phyogs thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba rab tu thobapa 3chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ nang gi
tshul thams cad la snang ba rab tu grub pa/ sems can 'khyam klas pa thams cad kyi don bya ba la rgyud dang mthun pa med par rjes su song ba/ sgrub pa'i g.yang sa'ar thams cad
rnam par 'thor ba/ sgrung pa mad pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa sa' gzhu kun tu gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can la rab tu
zhi bar rnam par dpyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul rjes su tshol ba de bzhin kasheg4pa thunas cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la rnam par dpyod cing 'dug par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po kun tu bzang po'i mang thos pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
ka/ klu/ spyod pa thos pa dang/ smon lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang/ tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang/ gnas pa'i khyad par shes pa dang/ mngon par bsgrub pa/
rang 'byung ba'i lam gyi khyad par thos pa dang/ kun tu bzang po'i sa' tshul gyi rgyud thos pa dang/ sa'i tshigs sngos pa dang/ sa thob par byed pa'i shugs thos pa dang/ sa yongs su gnon/
ba thos pa dang/ sa la gnas pa thos pa dang/ sa sngon du 'dor bas rnam par gnon pa thos pa dang/ sa'i spyod yul thos pa dang 2 sa'i byin gyi rlabs thos pa dang/ sa la yang dag par
gnas pa thos nas// byang chub sems dang 'a kun tu bzang po mthong bar dga' zhing sgom ste/ rnam mkha'i dbyangs ltar shin tu yangs pa'i sems mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen
du 'phags pa dang/ zhing gi 'du shes shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems chos thams cad las sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul can dang/
thogs pa med pa'i sems phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i sims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gnon pa dang 2 shani tu rnam par dag pa'i
sems snying po byang chub kyi rgyan lhag mthong gas yongs su dag pa dang/ shin tu rnam par phya ba'i sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang/ shan tu yangs pa'i
du ]sams sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su snyan par bya ba dang/ gdul ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang/ shani du che ba'i sems sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su yang dag par/
byed pa dang/ tshad med pa'i sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas ma zlad tsang mthar thug pa
med ba' sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dang/ ma bskangs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma 'dres pa'i mthar thug pas/ snying po byang chub rdo rje dam
pa' sAng po can de la pad+mo'i stan rin po che thams cad kyi lhun can zhig la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge 'i khri la mngon par bltas te 'dug go/ de nas tshong
dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de lta bu'i bsam pa dang/ yade la bya ba la brtson par gnas pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyan dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba mthun pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur bar sngon gyi ltas bcu byung ngo// bcu gang zhe na//
