'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma khom pa dang/
@# ngan song dang/ ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bsal bas rnam par drag nga ra gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad pad+mo'i tshal gyi rgyan ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par
[+ ]dag pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad semam can thams cad kyi lus dang sems dga' zhing sam par byed pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
thams cad rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin du kun tu gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhange thams cad sems can gyi khams kun mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rab tu brgyan
par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi sprin gyis kun tu khebs par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems dad phan pa'i sems dang/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan par kun nas
gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snying bo byang chub kyi rgyan rgyas brgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
thams cad sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yadi la bya ba la brtson par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu //
bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi ltas snang ba
chen po bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba rnams las shin tu phra ba re re zhing yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi 'od thar gyi dra ba mang po rnam par snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba'i de las kyang/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'thon te/ kha dog gcig pa dang/ kha dog sna tshogs dang/ kha dog brgya stong du mar chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur te//
'jig rten kyi khamas+sacad kyi rdul shAn tu phra ba rnams las rdul shan tu phra bar re las kyang rani po che thams cad kyi sprin/ re bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs
par byed pa mang po 'then te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba rnams las rdul shan tu phra ba re re
las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'khor lo dang dkyil 'khor gyi sman mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba rnams las rdul shani tu phra ba re re las kyang/ spos dang/ ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ bdug pa'i
sngan mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i yon tan gyi chos rgya mtsho'i spron thams cad sku 'brug sgra rab tu sgrog cing/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyangs thams
cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdulangashani tu phra ba rnams las rdulashAn tu phra ba re re las kyang nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ skur ma'i sprani mang po
'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'gyed cing/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
rdul shan tu phra ba rnams las rdul nyan tu phra ba re re las kyang/ lus thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'i mar me' sprin mang po 'thon nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ltar rab tu
snang bar byed cing/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shan tu thu bo rnams las rdulangashani tu phra ba re re las kyang nor bu rin po
rgya'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur snang ba'i sprani mang po 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gangs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba rnams las rdul shAn tu phra ba re re las kyang/ 'od zer gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dbyings su snang ba'i sngon mang po 'thon te ka
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ smon lam gyi sbyin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rtsal shani tu phra ba rnams las rdul shan tu phra ba re re las khyad/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba' s+sani rgya
mtsho'i sems can thams cad 'don pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub pa mang po 'thon te chos kyi dbyings thams cad
rgyas par 'gengs par skyur to// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to// de nas tshong
dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis sngon gyi ltas su snang ba bcu po de dag mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i skabs na ci/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas
brtan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis na brlabs/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snang ba na yang dag par skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
@#// po'i spyod pa la na mngon du gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi byin byas na byin du brlabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
yul la na mngon par mos/ byang chub sams dpa'i spyod yul rlabs po che la shin tu nges pa'i stobs dang shugs ni rab tu thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babrang po mthong na thams
cad mkhyen pa 'di thob pa dang 'dra bar na sims/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba la dbang po na mngon du gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya
ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po ni thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang na ldan/ phyogs thams cad du mngon
du gyur pa'i debang po'i 'khor lo dang/ kun tu lha bas yul yongs su gnyen pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus dang/ sangs rgyas ma lus pa' zhebs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' kun
tu bzang bo 'dug pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i sims de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmagis par bya ba la yang dag par btang ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a kun tu bzang po'i dmigs pa
yongs su btsal ba dang ma 'bral ba'abasam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sAng po dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig byang chub sems
00 dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lam la zhugs pa dang/ nam mkha' ngebyangs ltar yangs pa'i bsam pa dang/ snying rje chen po'i rdo rje thogs ba' lhag pa'i bsam pa dang 1 byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
po'i rjesasu 'brang bar smon pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mar thug par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ yongs su gnon pa'i rtsa la rnam par dgapa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
spyod pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang 1 byang chub sams dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sa la gnas pa'i ye shes la rnam pA spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la yang dag par
gnas pa dang ni ldan pa des/ byang chub sams dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa 'di rjes su thob pa 1 dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/
bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i yul dang ldan pa mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul can/ tshu med pa' ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam par blta ba/
'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang na mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhani
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshon na 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis na yongs su bskor/ byang chub
[s/ ©]// sams dpa'i dge 'dun namadun du byas shang/ sang ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying bo can zhig la 'dug pa mthong sta/ des de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad chos
ba 'a sgo re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdulashAn tu phra ba snyad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin mang po 'thon nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// nam mkha'
mthas gtugs pa thams cad rab tu snang bar byas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo/ 'des de'i lus las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad kyi rtsal shani tu phra ba snyad kyi sprani mang po kha dog sna tshogs can mang po 'thon do/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dga' ba dang/ mos pa'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par
'phal bar byed pa mthong ngo// spyi bo dang/ phrag pa'i lhun gnyasi dang/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kyang/ spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi char kha dog sna tshogs su 'jug pa mang po mngon par
'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang sta/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ me tog
thams cad kyi sman gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba sed mang po mngon par 'thon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/

mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re las kyang/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi smyan mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba snyang mngon/
par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyangs nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi mag+ga' klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ spos kyi shang gi sngon gyi rgyan gyis brgyan nga ra byas te spos dang/ phya ma
dang bdug pa'i mdzod zad ma shes pa'i char rab tu 'gyed cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skya 'khor gyi dekyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab par byed
pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams thad las ba snga'i sgo re re nas kyang gos sna tshogs kyi spyan mang po mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa
thams cad kun nas yog par byas nas brgyan par mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ dar sna tshogs kyi lta ldi'i sprin dang/ 'thung ba sna tshogs
kyi sngon dang/ mu tig sna tshogs kyi sprin dang/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra pa snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo// ba sbur bu ga thams cad las bsgyu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can thams cad
kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rin po che' shadi ga spran sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba seng mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi
[+ ]dbyings nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ rin po che 'deshang las rin po che'i mdzod rnam par 'phro pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu rin po che'i char chen po mngon par 'bab par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i
ris kyi smyan sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
rgyas par 'ge ngas ba mthong ngo// ba spu bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ tshangs pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha' ris thams cad sprul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon te/
mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams
thams cad du gtogs pa'i lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sngon mang po mngon par 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mang po yang dag par 'dzin par mthong ngo//
ba spu 'a bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sger re nas kyang/ sams kyi skad cig rer la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga wAni dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang 'dra ba sos
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdulang+kan tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mthar klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gnas med pa dang/
skyabs med ba dang/ rton med pa rnams kyi gnas dang/ skyabs dang/ rten du gyur pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ sems kyi skad cig re re
la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su dag pa'i sngon/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba steng mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyangs nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang sta/ sems can mos pa rlabs po che rnams yongs
su dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo// ba stsa'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ sams kyi skad cig re re las sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs pa/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba skad kyi sngon mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste// kun nas
@#// nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo// bo sbu'abri ga re re' ba sbya'i sgo thams cad las/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs
rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba snyad kyi wAni mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyangs nam mkha' dbyangs
kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par dag ba sgrub ba mthong ngo// ba sba'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo
de las kyang/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi sman sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shAn tu phra ba sad mngon par 'thon nas/ sems can gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings
kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed cing/ blunamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can thams
cad yongs su sman par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ sems kyi skad cig re re labyang chub sems dpa' lus kyi sngon 'jig rten gyi khams/
thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba med mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyang sanam mkha'i dbyangs kyis glas ba thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dge/
ba 'a rtsa ba rnam par 'phal bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mang po rjod par byed par mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/
byang chub sems dpa' las kyi sbyin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba snyad mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas
par bkang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'phyas smras pa thams cad du bya chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas lte bar bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon
par bsgrub pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprinas nigs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdulangashani du phra pa snyad mngon par
'thon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad
mngon par rjod pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba skya'i skye re re nas kyang/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems
dpar kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sman thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'byung bas/ dga' ba'i shugs rnam nga ra 'phel bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdulashani
tu phra bsnyad kyi char mngon par 'thon nas/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo// des de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re las kyang/ mngon bar rdzogs

thar 'tshang rgya pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ston pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag nga ra 'byung ba'i chos kyi spyanerman po rnam par 'phar bar byed pa/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdulangashin tu phra ba sedu mngon par 'thon par mthong ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi banor bzangasakyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i tshu
'phrul gyi yul de lta bu mthong nas dga' rangs de/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba bskyed nas/ de bas kyang shas cher byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la sems sem/
pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' kun tu bzang po'i yan lag re re dang/ yan lag rnam par phye ba re ra dang/ lus kyi cha re re dang/ lus kyi cha rnam par phye ba re re dang/ yan lag gi phyogs
re re dang/ yan lag gi phyogs rnam par phya ba ra re dang/ lus re re dang/ lus rnam par phye ba re re dang/ ba spu'i bu ga re re dang/ ba spu'i bu ga rnam par phye ba re re nas/
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'di rlung ga phung po dang bcas/ chu'i phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ ma'i phung nge dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang
[p? ]bcas/ gling dang bcas/ chu klung dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ ri rab dang bcas/ khor yug dang bcas[）]grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs dang/ yul dang
khams dang/ rgyal po'i gnas dang bcas/ nags tshal dang bcas/ khang khyim dang bcas/ skya bo'i tshogs dang bcas/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang bcas/
byol song gi skye gnas dang bcas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ lha ma yin rgya 'jig rten dang bcas/ klu'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ nam mkha' lding ga 'jig rten dang bcas/
ma 'i 'jig rtan dang bcas/ lha'i 'jig rten dang bas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas gzugs kyi khams kyi yul dang bcas/
gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ rten dang bcas/ dbyibs dang bcas smran dang bcas/ glog dang bcas 2 skur ma dang bcas ]
nyin zhag dang bcas/ zla ba da dung bcas/ zla ba gcig dang bcas/ dus dang bcas/ lo dang bcas/ bsal pa bar ma dang bcas/ bskal pa dang bcas
par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong bar gyur to// shar phyogs la ji
[s]rgya// lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho
[+ ]nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na'ang/ 'og dang stong gi phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang 2 sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub
sams dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas par gzugs bar n kyi tshul du mthong bar gyur te// des ma mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ga
nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mtshan re re lasasangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
thams cad dang bcas/ sems can dang bcas/ khang khyim dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas/ bskal pa dang bcas par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du phyi ma 'a mtha' mur thug
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mar zug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad mthong bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang/ ma chen po'i mtshan re re dang/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas shin tu rnam par phye ba dang/ phan
tshun ma 'dres par mthong bar gyur to/ byung chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i yang/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na seng ge 'i khri ni
po cha' bad+mo chen po'i snying bo can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di lta bu bongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhan du/ shar phyogs na'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal
gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i dpal na/ rnam par rtsa ba 'di 'di yongs su ston cing 'dug par mthong ngo// shar phyogs na ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'jig/
rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po seng ge 'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug rung/

rnam par rtsa ba 'di nyid yongs su ston pa mthong ngo// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i 'dzag rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung na/ seng ge 'i khri rin po cha' pad+mo chen

po'i snying po can la 'dug tsang/ rnam par rtse ba lad 'di yongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul ngashan tu phra nga dge la rdul shin tu phra nga re re
sas rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar che ba dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drungan/
seng ge ' khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i sang bo can la 'jug cing/ rnam par rtse po 'di nyid yongs su ston pa mthong ngo// de'i lus re ste las kyang dus gsum du byung ba'i dmags pa
thams cad gzugs bonan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon par bstan pa mthong ngo// zhing thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad
dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon du bstan pa mthong ngo// sems can thams cad kyi
sgra dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ gdams ngag yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul thams
cad dang/ byang chub sams dang yang dag par bsdu bya thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa dag kyang thos par gyur to// des de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam nga ra rtsa ba de lta bu dag mtheng ste thos nas/ ya shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa bcu thob par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
[e ]sems kyi skad cig gcige la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgong pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob pa gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'gro ba la tha ma dad pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cadi rim gror bya ba' ye shes
pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su zhus pa/
rab tu byung ba'i yi shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nges par rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i yi shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyod pa thob par gyur to//
tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs te/ chos kyi tshig gcig shin tu bstan pa' ya shes kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// chos rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i yi shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi
[n]@#// dbyangs kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi a shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyod pa thob par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa
[+ longs su bsgrub pa 'a ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// skad cig gcig la byung chub sems dang da ra kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon sum du rang
tungashes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyod pa thob par gyur te/ de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyod ba dang ldan pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
kyi spyi bor/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang sta gzhug par gyur to// de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la/
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa gzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la des ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba sud la zhugs par
gyur te/ dang nge 'dzin re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shan tu phra ba skad sngan chad ma mthong ba dag la'ang zhugs par gyur to// de'i thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shan tu phra tha snyad kyang tshogs su gyur to// de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhingathams cad kyi rdul shani
ba tu phra ba byung bar gyur to// thams cad mkhyen pa 'di la rab tu gnas par bya ba chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shani tu phra ba snyad kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur to//
smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra ba skad la'ang zhugs par gyur to// thams cad mkhyen pa 'di du 'byung ba'i lamar ngas rgyas kyi zhing tham cad/
kyi rdulashan tu phra ba sed kyis kyang byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phrab sed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to//
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi cha la shin tu phra ba snyad kyis kyang rnam par 'phal bar gyur to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ya shes snang ba sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shAn tu phra ba snyad kyis kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// ji ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po// bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pa bskyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor bzhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa bskyang zhing/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to/
de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shan tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi de bzhin gshegs/
pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa bskyang zhing/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi ba la bzhag par gyur to//
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'obs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu btsang po'i lag pas reg ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis chos kyi sgo mang bo la zhugs
par gyur pa de bzhin du shA kun tu bzang po'i lus thams cad las 'phros pa' lag pa'i spyan mang pos reg pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu nor bcas kyis kyang chos kyi sgo mang po la tshul sna tshogs
kyis zhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ jigs
kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/ smras pa// 'phags pa mthong na de tsam du bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen namkhyen
thang ngo// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mngon par 'dod cing/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rnal
[o] ]ni tu phra ba skad cig tu rnam par spyad de/ bskal pa chen po de dag re re la'ang byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba byed cing/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
pa' yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shani tu phra ba skad cig bsnyen bkur to// bskal pa chen po de dag re re la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams yongs su sdud pa byed tsang/ mchod
sbyin chen po gtang ba thams cad dang sbyar// 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par grags pa/ sems can thams cad la bstabs pa dag kyang mchod sbyin du byas so// bskal pa chen po
de dag re re la'ang thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi chos la mngon par smonatsang/ gtang ba dang/ gtang ba chen po dang/ shin tu gtang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa' yang
brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed cig byas so// bskal pa chen po de dag re re la'ang lus dang srog 'phangs par bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gces par bya bas lus brjod/
du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig yongs su btang ngo// rgyal po'i sridi chen po'ang yongs su btang ngo// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs dang/ yul dang/ khams dang/ rgyal po'i
gnas dag kyang yongs su btang ngo// sdug cing yid du 'ong la gtang ma khra ba' 'khor gyi tshogs dag kyang yongs su btang ngo// bu dang/ bu mo dang/ chung ma dag kyang yongs su btang ngo//
cha[@]// rang ga lus dang sha dag kyang yongs su btang ngo// bdag gi lus las khrag dag kyang slong ba rnams la yongs su btang ngo// rus pa dang rkang dag kyang yongs su/
[A ]btang ngo// yan lag dang nying lag dag kyang yongs su btang ngo// sna dang rna ba dag kyang yongs su btang ngo// mge dag kyang yongs su btang ngo// rang ga kho nas lce'i dbang po
dag kyang yongs su btang ngo// bskal pa de dag re re la'ang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing/ bla na med par gyur pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngul mngon par

smon cing/ rang gi mgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed cig yongs su btang ngo// bskal pa chen po re re la jalta ba de bzhin du/ bskal pa chen po/

rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rdul shin tu phra ba skadu las/ bskal pa rgya mtsho re re la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
rdul shan tu phra ba skad cig la dbang po dam par gyur te rim gro byas so// bkur sti byas so// bu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// na bza' dang/ bshes dang/ gzims chadang/ stunagyi skyon
sman dang/ yo byad dag kyang dbul ba byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la yang rab tu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gdams ngag thams cad la'ang rab tu zhugs so// de dag gi khostan pa'i ng
yongs su bzung ngo// rigs kyi bu desnyad kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bskal pa la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang ma mthun pa'i sems bskyad du ma dren no//
de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang khong khro ba dang ldan pa 'a sems bskyed pa 'am/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems sam/ bdag yongs su bskyang zhing yongs
su bzung ba'i sems sam/ bdag dang gzhan du dbye ba'i sems sam/ byang chub kyi lam dang 'bral bar bya ba'i sems sam/ 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su skyo ba'i sems sam/
zhum pa'i sims sam/ sgra'i pas mgo rmongs pa'i sems bskyad du ma kren te/ gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems ye shes gzhan gyi ma
thub cang brgal bar dka' ba'i sang ngo dang ldan pa bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de lta sta/ nga' sngon gyi sbyor ba phunasum tshogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas pa'i sbyor ba dag
dang ngas sAng rje chen po'i sems rab tu thob ste/ sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su sman par bya ba dang/ yongs su sbyang bar byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang/ sangs
rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba' sbyor ba dag dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don du bla ma la rim gror byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i don du lus
yongs su btang ba'i sbyor ba dag dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i don du rang gi srog su btang ba'i sbyor ba de dag na bstan par byas na/ bskal pa rgya mtsho thams/
cad kyang zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ngas na chos rgya mtsho de snyed cag las kyang/ tshig dang yi ge 'ga' tsam yang sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la brtson pa dang/ rang ga

sams kyi rgyud nges par shes par bya ba la brtson pa dang 2 pha rol gyis chos mngon du thos par bya ba la brtson pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i yang shes snang ba thams cad rab tu brjod pa la brtson pa dang/
'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thams cad rab tu brjod pa la brtson pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi lakhor ba'i bde ba yongs su bskyud pa la brtson pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi yon tan yang dag par bsngags pa la brtson pas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su btang bas ma nyos pa 'am/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bas ma 'os ba las

gang yang med de/ dre ltar nga ni sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya na/ bskal pa rgya mtsho sas rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snang zad
par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas rnam pa de lta bu ' tshigs kyi stobs dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyud bsags pa'i stobs dang/ mos pa mchan 'a stobs dang/ yon tan la nan tan
[d ]du bya ba'i stobs dang/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ja lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba'i stobs dang/ shes rab kyi mag gi stobs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyin gyi rlabs kyi
stobs dang/ smon lam chen po'i stobs dang/ sang rdzochen po'i stobs dang/ shani tu sbyangs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung
ba'i stobs kyis 2 chos kyi lus yongs su dag pa dus gsum du tha dad pa thob par gyur to// bla na med pa'i gzungs kyi lus 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'gro
ba thams cad kyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhun du/ rnam par dmags pa thams cad du rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu gzhol ba thams cad du rab tu gnas pa///
rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du ston pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba'ang yongs su sbyangs so// rigs kyi bu ngas lus thob pa phun sum tshogs pa bskal pa
rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas yongs su grub pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos 'byung bar dka' ba mthong bar dka' ba 'ad la ltos/ rigs kyi bu nga ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyod pa'i

sems can rnams kyi rna lam du'ang mi 'ong na mthong bar lta ci zhig smos/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag pa'i mang thos pa tsam gyis bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par
'gyur ba yod do// mthong ba tsam dang/ reg pa tsam dang/ rjes su 'brang ba tsam dang/ rmilam du mthong ba tsam dang/ rmi lam du mang thos pa tsam gyis kyang/ blan med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ba yod de/ sems can la las nange nyani zhag gcig tu dran par byas n yongs su smin bar 'gyur ro// la las ni zhag bdun dang/
la las ni zla ba phyed dang/ la lasan zla ba gcig dang/ la las na lo gcig dang/ la sa na li brgyadang/ la lasan bskal pa gcig dang/ la las ni bskal pa brgya nas/ la las

na bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i ya nga brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad du nga rjes su dran par byas na yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// la las ni tsho gcig tu nga rjes su dran par byas

na yongs su sman par 'gyur ro// la las na tsho'i rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phru ba seng du nga rjesasu dran par byas na yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/

la lasan tshog tsi tu nga rjes su dran par byas na yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// la lasan 'arkyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shani tu phra bsnyad kyis yongs su smin
par 'gyur ro// sems can l la ni nga'i 'od mthong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ la la ni 'od zer bkye ba mthong bas/ la la na zhing bskyod pas/ la la na gzugs kyi lus bstan pas/ la

la na dega' bar byas pas yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar thabs kyi tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhang ga rdzul shin tu phra ba skad kyis/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub las phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang gas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thos pa de dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skya'o// gang gis nga'i lus yongs su
dag pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag na de'i lus lta bur skye bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu nga'i lus rnam par dag pa 'di la ltos shig/ de nas tshong dbon gyi bu nor babras kyasi/ byang chub sems dpa' kun

tu bzang po'i lus la bsams pa dang/ ba spu'i bu ga re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas skye bas yongs su gangab mthong ngo// zhing rgya mtsho re re na'ang de bzhin
gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho kun nas bskor ba mang po bzhugs pa mthong ngo// zhing rgya mtsho'i dag thams cad kyang gzhi sna tshogs dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs dang/ rgyan sna tshogs
dang khor yug sna tshogs dang/ sprin sna tshogs dang/ nam mkha' sna tshog sakyis kun nas khabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba sna tshogs dang/ chos kyi 'khor le sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang ldan
par mthong ngo// ba spu'i bu ga re re la ji lta ba bzhin du/ ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa thams cad dang/ mtshan thams cad dang/ dpe byad bzang bo thams cad dang/ yan lag dang nying lag thams
chag @#// cad la'ang de bzhin te/ zhang rgya mtsho re re nasakyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa'i sngon sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba skad byung nas/ phyogs bcur 'jag rten/
spyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang// blun mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can yongs su snyan par mdzad pa mthong ngo/ danas tshong dpon gyi ba nor bzas
wA byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'i gdams dag dang/ rjes su bstan pas rjes su bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te/ sems can yongs su smin par byed par gyur to// de ltar tshong dpon gyi ba nor bzangs kyis/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
tu phra ba sod cig gi drung du phyin te/ mthong ba dang bstan bkur bas la shes kyi snang ba drang/ dgo pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa de dag gis byang chub sams dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ste/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba bsags par gyur ba de'i brgya'achar yang nye bar ma 'gro'o// stong gi char yang ma yani/ brgya stong gi char yang ma yin/ bye ba brgya stong gi char yang ma yin te/ grangs dang/ chudang//
bgrang ba dang/ dpar bya ba dang/ rgyur bya ba tsam du'ang ma phod do// des dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ba'i bar der/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtshog tsagi nas gca tshu brgyud pa dza nyid cig la zhugs par gyur pa de dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa' yang brjod du mad pa'i rdul 'an tu phra ba snyad kyi
bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ba spu'i bu ga re rer sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mang po la/ sams kyi skad cig gcig gas zhugs par
gyur te/ ba stsa'abu ga re rer ji lta ba de bzhin du/ ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa thams cad la'ang/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
ba'i tshul shan tu phra ba snyad rnam par gnon pa/ phyi ma'i mthar mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs pas zhugs kyang/ zhing rgya mtsho
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mthar phyin bar ma gyur te/ zhing rgya mtsho'i lhun dang/ zhang rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang/ zhing rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang 2 zhing rgya mtsho yongs su 'grub pa
dang/ zhing rgya mtsho'ajig pa dang/ zhang rgya mtsho rnam par phyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtshog cig nas gag tu brgyud pa dang/ sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho'i sku dang/

sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang/ sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang/ sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho khongs su 'byung ba dang/ sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshog g nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang/ byang
[+ ]/chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i lus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i byi brag dang 1 byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor/
rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dmyal 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su 'byungab dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dekyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i 'jig pa dang/
sems can gyi khams la 'jug pa dang/ sems kyi skad cig re rjes sems cu na gyi dbang po shes pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi dbang po shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/
sems can yongs su sman par bya zhing gdul ba drang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la rnam par gnas pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa
rgya mtsho'i mthar yang phyin par ma gyur te// de zhang la lar na bskal par rnam par spyad par gyur to// zhing la laran bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
mad pa'i bar du spyad par gyur te/ zhing de dag nas kyang g.yos pa med do// sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang zhang rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jugatsang/ sems can
[rnams kyang bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sman par byed par gyur te/ des de ltar mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po' skyed pa dang/ smon lam/
rgya mtsho mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyade dang/ zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyus par dgang ba mnyam pa 'di dang/
spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyaba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan bas rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang//
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mnyam pa nyid dang/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ dbyas brjod pa mnyam pa nyid rung/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho
thams cad kyi sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid rung stobs dang ma 'jigs pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dung/ byams pa chen po dang sAng rje chen po
mnyam pa 'di dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bskal pa dang/ bskal pa 'byam klas pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
[©]// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i jul shan tu phra ba sad po de dag brnan te/ mngon par brjod pa'i phyir chags su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smon lam btab pa/
[+/ ]ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// dus gsum gshegs pa ma ya sing ge kun// bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yade dang bas phyag bgyi'o//
bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gi/ rgyal ba thams cad yod kyis mngon sum du// zhing ga rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo//
rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par// thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang
bar mos// de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshosgra kun gyi// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad
bdag gis bstod// me tog dam pa 'a phreng ba dam pa dang// sal snyan rnams dang byug pa 'a gdugs mchog dang// mar me'i mchog dang bdug pa dam pa yas// rgyal ba de dag
la ni mchod par bgyi// na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang/ bye ma'i thur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang// khyad par can gyi rgyan mchog thams cad kyis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod
bar bgyi// mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dgags// rgyalab kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi//
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yad kyis kyang// sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags//
phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang ma slob dang// 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams gang la yang// de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rer// gang rnams
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim pa sangs rgyas m chags bsas// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khor lo ban med pa bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'da' ston gang
bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal pa zhing ga rdul snyed bzhugs par yang// bdag gas thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang/
rdzasasu ya reng bskul zhing gsol ba ya/dge ba cung zad bdag gis rusesags pa// thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu ya// 'jig rten dag na gang

bzhugs mchod par gyur// gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub dam par sangs rgyas spyon// phyogs bcu gang+gAr zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur//
@#// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang// sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur/

'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// mthun par gyur cadi ri'ang grub par shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag na bed spyod chung// 'gro ba kun tu skya ba dran par gyur// tshorabs kun tu sha 'pho skye ba na// rtag tu bdag

na rib tu byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te// bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing// tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par// rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha
ya skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum dag dang ma yi skad rnams dang// 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par// thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to// nges shang pha rol phyin la rang
brtson te// byang chub sems na nims kyang brjed ma gyur// sdig ba gang rnams sgrub par gyur bdag/ de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las//
grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang// ji ltar pad+mo chu ma rmogs pa bzhin// ni na nam mkhar thogs pa mad ltar spyod// zhing rgya khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par ]ngan song sdugs
bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing// 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad// byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing// sems can dag ga spyod dang
ba ba/ mthun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur/ bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa// de dag dang na rtag tu 'grogs
par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang na sems kyis kyang// spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad// bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag/ bzang po spyod pa
rab tu ston pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis rnams kyang yid ma dbyung// sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams// mngon
sum rtag tu bdag gas rgyal ba blta// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu ma skyo bar// de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i tshes 'dzin cang//
byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po spyod nga rnam par sbyang ba yang// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi/ srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na/
bsod nams ye shes dag nu ma zad rnyed// thabs dang shes pa dang 'dzin rnam thor dang// yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur// rdul gcig stang na rdul snyad zhing rnams
zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar ma lus thams cad/
phyogs su yang// sgra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyad kyi// sangs rgyas myamacho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang// bskal ba rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung
gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyi// rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyas// sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par ba@#//
dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dang/ labor 'a tshu rnams rang/ de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mdzad la// blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/
ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cung 'jug par yang// skad cig gcig gas bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi// gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag/ skad cig ma shas kyisan zhugs pa'i slad//
dus gsum gshegs pa ma yasang ge dag/ de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta// rtag tu de dag ga na spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug/ gang
ra nga dus gsum dag ga zhing gi rgyan// de dag rdul gcig stong du mngon par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug/
gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor// mya ngan 'o das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi 'o//
kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang// kun nas sgo ya thag pa'i stobs dag dang// kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang// kun tu khyab pa byams ba dag gi stobs/
kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang// chags pa med ra ra gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gsi// byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par
byed las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing// nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobasa rnams stobs med rab khyid cing// bzang po spyod pa'i stobs
na rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing// sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par 'grol// chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs

par byed// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing// smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed rung// bskal pa rgya mtshor ma skye spyad par bgyi// gang yang
dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal pa ya// byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams// bzang bo spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// de kun bdag gas ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi
sras kyi thu bo pa// gang ga mong na kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir// dge ba'i 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing//
spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang// bsngo ba bzang bo mkhas pa tsa'adra ba// de 'dra bdag kyang de dang mtshungs pa ra shog/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad
pa'i phyir// 'jam dang la kya ni smon lam spyad par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du ma skyo bar// de ya bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod ba dag na tshad yod ma gyur
cagi yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang// de dag 'phrul pa thams cad ratshal bar bgyi// nam mkha' mthar thug
gyur ba ji tsam par// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te/ 'dzatsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa// bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo// gang yang
phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen u0f8brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul// lha dang ma yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang// zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul
ba bas// gang gas bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos gang// lan cig tsam yang dad pa brgyad pa na// bsod nams dam pa'i
ma chog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pa// des ni ngan song thams cad slus par 'gyur// des na grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang/
ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong// de dag rad pa rab rad bde bar 'tsho/ mang tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ong// kun tu bzang po de yang nu dra par// de
dag rang bor ma thogs de bzhin 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po dag ka stag pa rnams/ gang gas mi bas dbang gis byas pa dag de yas bzang po'i spyod pa 'di
brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar gyur// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang// rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud par
mu stegs mang pos de ma thub// 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang rtsa chod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro// song nas sems can bstan phyir de 'dug///
byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu skor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad btul/ gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'ad// khachang ba dang na ston dum klog
pa ya da ya rnam par sman pa sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nya ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang// kun tu bzang po de yang de
bzhin te// de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing// dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags
pa des// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ad kun kyang// bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chiba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams cad daka
na phyir bsal te// mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas// bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro/ der song nas ni smon lam 'di deg kyang// thams cad ma lus mngon du gyur par
shog de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bskang// 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes//
snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du// lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni nge dag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/ sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis// blo
stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams su yang// sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// ga tu rgyas pa chen po' mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ byang chub
sems dpa'i sde snod kyi nang nas sdong pos brgyan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs chen po las/ nor bcas kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i spyod pa phyogs gcig pa
lta ja sAd pa rdzogs so/// lo tsa ba bai ro tsa na rak+ta skus zhu che na bgyis te gtan la phab pa'o//
